etext:
1a1
1sku dang ye shes thams cad 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas mdud pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
1b1
1rgya gar skad du/ nA ma kA ya dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha d+hI ya/ bod skad du/ sku dang ye shes thams cad 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas mdud pa zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba'i mchog la phyag 'tshal
1b2
1lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba'i snying po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi snying po chen po/ pad+ma stongadang ldan pa'i ge sar gyi snying po
1b3
1chen po'i 'bur gyi lcog la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas ma dang byang chub sems dpa' yab yum du bcas pa'i sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin gyi gnas la bzhugs
1b4
1pa rnams dang thabs cig go// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po de/ 'bur gyi lcog las bzhengs te/ mu tig dkar po'i gzugs la zhal dang/ phyag
2a1
1dang/ zhabs dang rgyan la sogs par bzhengs nas yang pad+ma stong dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang/ sgo bzhi yang pad+ma'i sgo dang/ rta babs dang/ them skas dang/ rgyan
2a2
1la sogs pas brgyan pa na/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dang/ mu tig gi rang bzhin dkar la 'tsher ba dang/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sku dang phyag mtshan du rdzogs
2a3
1pa'i rigs lnga yab yum du bcas pa/ sems dpa' dang sems ma sgeg pa'i tshogs su bcas pa/ 'byung ba bzhi'i sgo bar bcas pa dang/ thabs cig tu zhugs so// de nas byang
2a4
1chub thig les// kun tu bltas sam gzigs pas/ dug lngas gdung bar gzigs te/ thugs rje'i dbang gis mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhugs so// de las sangs rgyas spyan dang/ mA ma
2b1
1kI dang/ na bza' dkar mo dang/ dam tshig sgrol ma dang/ kun tu bzang mo rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo// kye gzu mkhan gzu bo chen po ston pa'i dpal/ khams gsum zug rngus zin pa'i nad
2b2
1pa la/ thugs rje'i spyan gyis yang dag gzigs gyur la// 'tsho ba'i sman gyis nad pa'i sman pa mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ba'i mchog de mnyam par bzhag pa las bzhengs nas/
2b3
1'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdag ni ye nas mngon sangs rgyas// 'phral la rgyas pa ma yin te// ngas bstan lung 'di nyan 'dod na// nyan pa po yi blo la rtogs// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas rdo rje sems
2b4
1dpa' nyid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho bcom ldan mngon sangs rgyas/ khams gsum thugs rjes drongs mdzod la// mdzad pa'i don gyis thams cad sgrol// de ltar mdzad na dam tshig yin// zhes
2b5
1gsol to// de nas dgyes pa chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang// da ltar nga yi bstan pa 'di// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang// slad kyis byon pa'i sangs
2b6
1rgyas rnams// 'gro don smon lam btab pa yis// 'gro ba'i don ni 'di ltar mdzad// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo
3a1
1rjer bsgom// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas mdud pa'i
3a2
1rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag/ dgyes pa chen po'i phrin
3a3
1las te// gang zhig gdung ba'i nad kyis zin// gso ba'i sman pa khyod nyid de// nad rnams kun gyi sman pa mdzod// ces gsol to/ de nas yang byang chub sems kyi thig le dgyes pa chen po des/ phrin las la
3a4
1mngon par dad ste/ zhu ba po'i don gyi zhu ba brod pa skyed pa'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa' kun gyi rgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' gtso/
3a5
1khyod kyi zhus pa ya mtshan che// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// bcom ldan 'das la yi rang ba dang dga' ba dang ngom pa bskyed de/ yang 'di skad zhus so// kye ma ho rin chen phung po
3a6
1khyod// 'gro ba kun bskyed yid bzhin tshul// chos rnams phung po bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ thig le byang chub kyi sems kyis 'di skad
3b1
1ces bka' stsal to// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis na// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// mthar thug rang bzhin don dam mo// phyi yi rlung dang nang gi rlung// gsang ba'i rlung dang
3b2
1mthar thug rlung// de rnams dngos po thar pa'i rlung// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang gi rlung// drag po mthar byas blta ba'i mchog/ lta stangs chen po bcu drug ste// rus sbal 'gros dang seng ge'i blta// stag gi
3b3
1mchongs pa pho rog sogs// dal dang 'grel ba'i rlung rnams dgog/ rlung zhes bya ba'i las rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ba'i khug rna'am// rlan phog pa yi rlangs pa'am/ drod phog pa yi chu thigs
3b4
1bzhin// gang la gang zhig gnas pa de// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'o// de nyid dal bar gyur pa yis// nam mkha' nyid la nam mkha' thim// dal ba'i rlung rnams dgag pa'i thabs// bltas pas mthong ba ma
3b5
1yin te// sems kyis sems la blta ba'o// de ltar mthong ba gang yin pa// mthong ba med na mthong ba'i mchog/ de ni lta ba'i blta ba de// ltas pa de nyid lta ba'i mchog/ shes pa chen po'i rang bzhin no// de
3b6
1bzhin shes rab snying rjes ni// theg pa chen po kun gyi rgyan yang yin// blta ba kun gyi mchog kyang yin// chos rnams kun gyi snying po yin// zhes gsungs nas// bden pa gnyis kyi mtha' la bzhugs so// de
4a1
1nas rdo rje sems dpas yang/ bcom ldan 'das byang sems kyi thig le la bzhus pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po// rlung zhes bya ba'i rgyu dang rkyen// thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel ba
4a2
1rnams// gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsol dang// grangs dang gnas dang rten pa rnams// 'byung ba'i khungs dang 'dug pa rnams// gang lags bcom ldan bka' stsol dang// zhes gsol pas/
4a3
1bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi thig les/ yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyud rnams kun gyi nang nyid nas// smras pa bden pa mchog yin te// rgyu ni 'byung ba bzhi yin la// rkyen ni phrin las rnam pa
4a4
1bzhi// thabs ni 'byung 'jug gnas dang gsum// 'brel pa dal dang brel ba'i rlung// rlung zhes bya bas las kun byed// ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// grangs ni rnam pa gang yin pa// nyi khri
4a5
1chig stong drug brgya'o// chos dang longs spyod 'khor lo rnams// gnas dang rten pa kho na'o/ khams gsum gnas pa'i 'dug sa'am// rtsa gsum gnas pa'i rang rgyud ni// 'byung ba'i khungs su 'dug
4a6
1pa'o// longs spyod skye ba'i 'khor rnams kyis// chos rnams thams cad gtan la 'bebs// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa'i
4b1
1sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las rlung bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig le byang chub kyi sems dgyes pa chen po des/ byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
4b2
1snyoms par zhugs so// de la rdo rje sems dpas yang zhus pa/ kye ma byang chub rdo rje la// mnyam gzhag ting nge 'dzin la gnas// rtog ge pa yi bsam pa yis// mnyam bzhag chos sku las bzhengs nas// rtsa yi
4b3
1las rnams bshad par gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'phyangs ma dang ni mchong ma dang// spyi khyer ma dang dga' byed ma// rgyan chen
4b4
1dang ni sems ma rnams// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis la// sa rnams chu rnams me rnams dang// rlung dang nam mkha' rten rnams dang// brgya rtsa brgya dang brgyad cu gnyis// sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu drug dang// bdun
4b5
1dang gsum du gang gyur pa// mdud pa thams cad srong byed pa// 'khor lo kun gyi drang srong mchog/ ces gsungs so// de rnams dkyil 'khor gang yin la// 'khor lo kun gyi rnam pa ni// ji snyed rnam pa mang po
4b6
1yang// bdag po rnam pa bzhi la 'dus// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dang// bde ba chos kyi 'khor lo dang// sprul pa grags pa'i 'khor lo dang// gtso bo
5a1
1rnams kyi 'khor lo bstan// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las rtsa'i rang bzhin rang
5a2
1bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan dgyes pa chen po mchog/ sems can dga' ba
5a3
1bskyed pa'i phyir// gsang ba mthar thug gtum mo rnams// dgyes pa chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des/ 'khor ba'i skyobs skyabs kyang 'khor yug
5a4
1chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag/ legs so rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso// legs so rdo rje
5a5
1sems dpa' che// legs so rdo rje sems dpa' kun// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas shing// rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod pa rnams// gtum mo gtum mo 'dod pa la// gtum mo'i tshogs rnams bshad par
5a6
1bya'o// phyi yi gtum mor gang gsungs pa// kun 'dus 'brel ba'i gtum mo yin// phyi yi mchog tu gang gsungs pa// 'bar 'dzin dang po'i gtum mo yin// nang gi mchog tu gang gsungs pa// 'khor lo srog
5b1
1shing gtum mo yin// gsang ba'i mchog tu gang gsungs pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i gtum mo yin// de rnams mchog tu gang gsungs pa// sems rnams chos rnams lta ba yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo
5b2
1rje sems dpas// dgyes pa chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltar thams cad lags pa na// bye brag rnam grangs bstan du gsol// zhes zhus te/ phyi yi gtum mo gang lags dang// nang gi gtum mo gang
5b3
1lags dang// gsang ba'i gtum mo gang lags dang// mthar thug gtum mo gang lags rnams// bye brag de ltar bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas yang dgyes pa chen pos/ srog me'i 'khor lo zhes bya
5b4
1ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bde ba'i don la mnal lo// de las bzhengs nas 'di skad gsungs so// gang zhig sha dang lus rnams la// 'khor lo'i rnam pa 'di yin te// 'bum phrag khri dang
5b5
1'bum stong dang// de dang nyi khri chig stong yod// thams cad pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi// yi ge a yi rang bzhin yin// keng rus tshogs kyi gtum mo yin// sum brgya drug cur bstan pa yin// de yang pad+ma 'dab bzhi
5b6
1la// g.yas pa dpa' bo thabs yi ge/ g.yon pa shes rab ma'i yi ge/ dbus su yi ge a rnams so// gsang ba'i gtum mor gang gsungs pa// char yang rlung gi gnas na yod// dbyibs ni phub kyi bdud khu
6a1
1ste// yi ge lnga yi byin rlabs kyis/ kha ba lta bu bzhu btul byed// 'dzag pa'i gtum mo gang bar byed// de yis thams cad 'bebs 'gyur te// baM dzra nyA ba Ta A+oM/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi rtsa rnams
6a2
1dang// dbus kyi rtsa yi 'gro sa rnams// rgyud pa'i sgo nas g.yas pa de// 'bebs pa'i sgo nas g.yon pa'o// 'dzin pa'i sa ni rnam bzhi ste// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba
6a3
1 yis// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// srog gi go ru shar ba dang// snying gi dbus su bsgom par bya'o// gang zhig de ltar rnam phye bas// gtum mo'i tshogs rnams rab tu bshad// ces gsungs so// de
6a4
1 nas yang 'di gsungs so// bskyed pa'i rdzogs par gsungs pa ni// 'khor lo bzhi yi mtshan nyid de// sprul pa'i 'khor lo drug cu bzhir// sprul pa'i yig 'bru dkar po 'god// oM/ de ltar chos kyi sku yin
6a5
1 pas// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// dbus su thugs kyi snying po ste// chos kyi yig 'bru mthing ga'o// hUM/ phyogs bzhi yab la mtshams bzhi yum// b+h+rUM traM hrI ha/ maM laM pyaM taM/ longs spyod 'khor lo 'dab
6a6
1 bcu drug/ dbus su longs spyod yi ge ser// aM/ 'dab ma'i phyogs bzhir 'byung ba bzhi/ A rA mA bA/ bde chen 'khor lo drug cu gnyis// sa bon kha bltas gnas pa'o// haM/ mi shigs kha ni 'og tu
6b1
1 bltas// de ni 'dzag pa'i gtum mo zhes// smras pa yang dag mchog yin no// de ltar gtum mo'i bye brag ni// grangs su ji snyed brjod pa yang// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bstan// mthar thug gtum mo gang
6b2
1 yin pa// de ni rang byung ye shes te// thig le chen po yi ge gtum mo yin// de ltar gtum mo'i bye brag ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyis shes par gyis// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku
6b3
1 dang gsung thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las/ gtum mo'i tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas dgyes pa chen po'i thig le byang chub kyi
6b4
1 sems rdo rje zhes brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gang lags/ zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag
6b5
1 tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// steng dang 'og gi tshul gyis ni// rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rtsa ni bzhi bcu rtsa gcig yod// rtsa yi gtso bo brgyad dang ni// steng dang 'og dang bcu po ni/ khro bo bcu yi
6b6
1 rang bzhin no// dbus kyi rtsa chen gang yin pa// bcom ldan dbus kyi gtso bo'o// de ltar rnal 'byor pa yi lus// yi ge a ni sdom gnas pa'o// chos nyid rtsa dang ye shes rtsa// rang rgyud rtsa dang yon tan
7a1
1rtsa// thabs dang shes rab rtsa rnams ni// hUM chen la sogs khro bo rnams// rim pa bzhin du dgod dang gnas// de ltar rten rnams gang yin la// sgra 'byin la sogs bcu rnams gnas// de ltar
7a2
1bcu po gang yin la// phra men pho mo sgo ma gnas// de yi rten la mo rnams so// sgo ba bzhi po gang yin la// pu shud mgo can la sogs pa'o// de ltar rnal 'byor gang shes pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa rdzogs pa
7a3
1ste// thabs ldan rnams kyis de shes na/ rdzogs pa nang gi dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud
7a4
1pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa nang gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas/ dgyes pa chen po la 'di skad zhus so// kye ma'o dpa' bo thugs rje can// sangs rgyas bya ba
7a5
1ji lta bu// ye shes bya ba gang la bgyi// mdud pa zhes ni ji lta bu// thams cad ces ni gang la bgyi/ zhes zhus pas/ dgyes pa chen po thig le byang chub kyi sems kyi smras pa/ sems can thams cad bde rgyur
7a6
1cing// dga' ba thams cad bskyed par bya'o// thams cad rang bzhin byang chub sems// tshad med bzhi ni sngon du btang// bden pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis// brjod las 'das pa sangs rgyas yin// grangs las
7b1
1'das pa gnas gzhan yin// dpe las 'das pa mtshon du med// spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni// sangs rgyas dngos po kho na'o// de na sangs rgyas mdud pa'o// med pa ma yin yod pa min// rtag pa ma yin chad pa
7b2
1min// 'ong ba ma yin 'gro ba min// yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min// de ltar rnam pa kun shes na// thams cad thams cad mdud pa yin// bden pa gnyis kyi bye brag la// shes shing rigs pa ye shes
7b3
1yin// rig pa mchog gi gnas yin no// de nyid rang byung ye shes te// mdud pa zhes ni de la bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang bka' stsal pa/ bye brag sangs rgyas ji snyed pa// bsdus pas sangs rgyas rnam pa
7b4
1lnga// de yi mdud pa gang yin pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yin// ye shes mdud pa ji snyed pa// rang byung ye shes mdud pa yin// tha snyad bye brag ji snyed pa// don dam spros
7b5
1bral mdud pa yin// de ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang// rlung gi bye brag ji snyed pa// mi shigs thig le'i mdud pa yin// rtsa yi bye brag ji snyed pa// kun 'dar ma yi mdud pa yin// sems nyid bye brag ji snyed
7b6
1pa// dga' ba dang po'i mdud pa yin// phung po'i bye brag ji snyed pa// rnam par shes pa mdud pa yin// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ gang la ci byas mdud pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'di
8a1
1gsungs so// dbang gi bye brag ji snyed pa// bzhi pa'i don nyid mdud pa yin// gtum mo'i bye brag ji snyed pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i mdud pa yin// 'khor lo'i bye brag ji snyed pa// chos kyi 'khor
8a2
1lo'i mdud pa yin// dam tshig bye brag ji snyed pa// rtsa ba'i dam tshig mdud pa yin// skye ba'i bye brag ji snyed pa// skye ba bdun pa mdud pa yin// bud med shes rab rang bzhin te// de yi bye brag ji snyed
8a3
1pa// pad+ma can de mdud pa yin// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi// rtog pa bsal phyir mdud pa yin// chos kyi sku las ma rtogs pa// rtog pa gzhan rnams 'dul ba'i chos// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa
8a4
1yin// dngos po kun la mi rtog pa// chos kyi sku nyid mdud pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs par thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud
8a5
1las/ sku dang ye shes kyi mdud pa thams cad bkrol ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang rdo rje sems dpas dgyes pa chen po la/ kye kye sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs
8a6
1rgyas// rnal 'byor ma 'ongs phan don du// dbang gi rim pa bshad par mdzod// ces zhus pas/ dgyes pa chen po nyid cho 'phrul dbang gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs so// de nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal
8b1
1to// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis na// rta dang glang po ma he dang// rnga mo ri bong khal rnams bzhin// phan dang nus dang blta dang zhugs// spyi yi dbang dang nang gi dbang// gsang ba'i dbang dang thabs kyi
8b2
1dbang// ji ltar gsungs kyang rnam pa bzhi// bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dang// shes rab ye shes mchog dbang dang// de bzhin bzhi pa'i dbang du gsungs// dang po dbang gi bskur sa ni// sems can
8b3
1rtog pa zlog pa'i phyir// dmangs kyi rigs la bum pa bzhag/ bram ze'i rigs la gsang dbang ste// rje yi rigs la shes rab dbang// de bzhin rgyal po bzhi pa ste/ rim pa de bzhin shes par bya// gal te cha
8b4
1rkyen gcig gyur na// gang la dmigs pa de bzhin bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pas// bcom ldan 'das la mu tig dkar po'i me tog gis mchod cing/ bskor ba
8b5
1lan du mar byas/ phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// rnal 'byor gcig gi don byed na// gsang ba dang ni gsang chen dang// ye shes snying po'i don chen dang// de bzhin bzhi pa ji ltar bskur// de nas
8b6
1yang dgyes pa chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// yan lag lus ni bshan pa ste// dra ba can la bum pa sbyin// ngag gi las ni bram ze ste// 'jig rten can la gsang ba sbyin// sems kyi las ni rje'u ste// lhan
9a1
1cig skyes la shes rab dbang// yon tan phrin las rgyal po ste// kun ka tshogs la bzhi pa bskur// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'di skad ces ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// bum pa'i dbang
9a2
1zhes bya ba la// bdag po'i dbang dang rnam pa lnga// gsang ba'i dbang zhes bya ba la// lus dang yig 'bru'i sbyor ba dang/ rtsa dang yig 'bru'i sbyor ba dang// rlung dang yig 'bru'i sbyor ba dang// sems dang yig
9a3
1'bru'i sbyor ba dang/ gang yang gang du gzung bar bya// gsang ba de ni dam pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang zhes pa// shes rab ma yin mtshan nyid de// lus kyi ri bo dgon pa 'dra// ri bran ca co chu yis
9a4
1spras// chu mig bkod ma dgu dang ldan// spros dang ldan pa'i dri dang bcas// rtsi shing nags tshal spos kyis brgyan// lo grangs cu drug bcu gnyis dang// bcu dang nyi shur shes par bya// mig ni dkar nag phyed pa
9a5
1dang// smin ma phra la dkyus ring dang// sna rtse drang zhing sked pa phra// ring thung ma yin tshad ma'i lus// smad dang stod ni ldan par mnyam// pad+ma zab la ge sar ring// nu+u ma sra zhing sha rtsi dkar// ngag ni 'jam la
9a6
1gzhon nu 'dra// dad pa che la mang du thos// de lta bu ni yongs su bzung// 'byung ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyis// bsdu ba rnam bzhi'i don dang mthun// de la dga' ba lus kyis skye// bde chen 'khor lo'i rang
9b1
1bzhin ni// rgyal ba kun phyi byang chub sems// kha ba lta bu'i rang bzhin de// mkhas pas spyan drang gnyis med bstim// dga' bzhi lus kyis bskyed pa yin// mtha' gnyis mi 'gro ba yi dbang// sprul pa'i
9b2
1'khor lor phyin pa'i tshe// dga' ba dang po zhes su bshad// rdo rje'i 'chang gzung nang du phyin pa'i tshe// mchog tu dga' ba zhes su bshad// bum pa'i nangadu phyin pa'i tshe// rang bzhin dga' ba zhes bya'o// de las
9b3
1'das na bral ba ste// srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la
9b4
1la yi dngos grub stsol// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de// bum pa'i dam tshig gang yin pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa brtag pa dang// rmongs pa rnams la mi bya ste// snod kyi lo ka
9b5
1gzhal yas khang// bcud kyi 'jig rten lha yi mchog/ de ni bum pa'i dam tshig yin// gang zhig gsang ba ston pa la// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di yin te// bud med shes rab rang bzhin te// tsaN+Da li la rtag tu
9b6
1bsgom// zas lnga rtag tu bza' bar bya// spyad par bya ba'i mchog yin no// ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ni// mo rnams kun la spyad pa dang// dga' ba rtag tu bsten par bya// sems kyang d+hU tir blta bar bya// ye
10a1
1shes snying po'i dam tshig go// de lta bu dang mi ldan ni// dbang dang dam tshig kun las 'das// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// sngags pas bya ba gang yang med// sngags pa sngags pa zhes
10a2
1bya ba// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag dang/ khyad par dam tshig gang yin dang// shin tu dbang gi dam tshig dang// rtsa dang rlung gi dam tshig dang// byang chub sems kyi gzhag pa rnams/ gang zhig bzhag pa sngags pa
10a3
1yin// de la mchog gi dngos grub babs// myur du bla na med pa thob// de ltar bla ma lung ldan la// gser la sogs pa'i yo byad dang// rang gi lus dang nor gyi dbyig/ ma sring mo rnams brgyan pa dang// grong
10a4
1dang grong khyer bcas pa rnams// dmigs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// de dang mnyam pa kho nar dbul// de ltar 'bul byed slob ma la// bla ma lung ldan des kyang ni// bzhi pa'i don nyid sbyin par bya// chos dang
10a5
1lam dang thabs rnams dang// rang bzhin dang ni de rnams yul// rnam pa drug po bsgrims la gtad// de ni bsam pa'i khog yin pas// gang zhig de la mi gnas na// dmus long lam mkhan byed pa ste// gyur na
10a6
1'bras bu 'byin mi nus// de ltar gang la mi gnas na// sa bon me yis tshig pa bzhin// tA la'i shing ni mgo bcad bzhin// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs
10b1
1pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa// sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las// dbang gi gleng gzhi dang/ dbang skur ba'i gnas dang dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun
10b2
1pa'o//// de nas dgyes pa chen po des 'bur lcog las rdo rje'i lam du byon nas/ de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lor bskor ba lan gsum mdzad nas/ de nas thugs kyi 'khor lor phyin te/ bskor ba lan
10b3
1gsum mdzad nas de nas longs spyod kyi 'khor lor phyin te/ yang bskor ba lan gsum mdzad/ de nas bde ba chen por bskor ba lan gsum mdzad/ de nas 'bar 'dzin dang po nas byang chub kyi sems kyi thig
10b4
1le de 'og min rdo rje'i dbyings su 'od zer gyi tshul du gshegs nas/ der khro bo'i gar dgu dang bcas nas kI la ya chen po de zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dur khrod kyi chags dang ldan par bzhengs te/
10b5
1longs spyod kyi 'khor dam pa rigs lnga yab yum la sogs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod pa yis// rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni// bskyed pa'i rim pa rmang nas
10b6
1brtsigs// zhes gsungs so// de nas seng ge rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// dngos po med las dngos por grags// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med
11a1
1pa'o// dngos po'i tshig la dngos po ste// ri rtse gangs phugs g.ya' rtse'am/ brag dang chu 'thab dur khrod dam// sdong gcig shing ngam brag nag gam// yang na nyams dga'i gnas su bya'o// sa yi
11a2
1ro rnams med pa ru// sngon gyi las rnams tshang byas te/ maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi brtsigs// skyang nul chag chag go ma ye// tshon dang srad bu byin gyis brlabs// gnam thig sa thig gsher thig gsum// bye brag
11a3
1so sor shes par bya// shes rab ma yis thig skud bzung// mtshams dang steng 'og tshul bzhin bya// thig chen rnam pa brgyad du btub// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad e ru bcas// zla gam gsum dang rtsibs dang
11a4
1bcas// bar khyams sgo khyams gnyis su btang// sgo rgyan ya phub rta babs dang// dra ba dra phyed dra ba dang// rgyan gyi rnam pa thams cad bya'o// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// rnam par rgyal ba la sogs
11a5
1pa// shar nas brtsam ste dgod par bya// dbus kyi e la bdud 'dul te// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon sta zur bzhi// steng 'og khro bo phra men bzhi// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o// de yi 'khor lo'i gong ras
11a6
1las// phra men byin po dgod par bya// zla gam la ni sras mchog gsum/ khyams la ko'u seng spel mar dgod// sgo bzhir srung ma bcu gnyis dgod// lcags ri la ni dbang phyug ma// de ltar dkyil 'khor
11b1
1rdzogs pa dang// byin gyis brlabs pa'i phur bu kun// bye brag so sor shes par bya// dang po chos skur byin brlabs dang// de nas sprul skur byin gyis brlabs// de nas longs skur byin brlabs dang// sku
11b2
1mchog sprul sku mngon byang chub// de nas byin brlabs dbang bskur bya'o// mtshams kyi phur pa mnga' gsol ba'i// phur pa bcu yang byin gyis brlabs// sgrub pa'i phur pa re re la// dar gyi cod dpan re re
11b3
1btags// spyan drang bzhugs gsol gnyis med bstim// byug bdug brdeg pa'i las rnams bya// de nas maN+Dal steng du 'god// 'phro 'du las kyi bsnyen pa yis// yungs kar nyid la sngags bzlas
11b4
1la// gzungs thag 'then la bstim par bya// stong tshig mchod pa bar bar bya/ zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud
11b5
1pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bca' gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya chen pos ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// dbu ma chen po'i rang bzhin
11b6
1te// sus kyang mthong bar mi nus te// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs pas// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang// de yi phyir na rang bzhin med// med las med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung// yod dam med pa
12a1
1gnyis med pas// rtog med dbu ma zhes bya'o// de yi rang bzhin kho na'o// brjod pa'i rang bzhin ci yang med// dbang po'i yul du gang gyur pa// de dag tshad ma ma yin no// chos rnams kun gyi
12a2
1chos nyid ni// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// rtag dang chad pa yod min te// mthong ba'i blos ni bslad pa min// de dag rtogs na 'khor ba rtogs// mya ngan 'das pa rlom sems med// de bzhin nyid la gnas
12a3
1bcas na// g.yo dang mi g.yo rnam par dag/ gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par dag/ spros pa med cing rnam par dag/ brjod med rnam par mi rtog pa'ang// chos rnams kun gyi sgra rnams ni// yi ge med pa'i gsung
12a4
1mchog ste// sgra yis rnam par spangs nas ni// sems kyi rgyu ba phra ba 'gag/ de ni rang bzhin lta ba zhes// shes rab blo yis mthong bar gyis// blun po rnams kyis mi mthong ste// mthong ba rnams ni mngon sangs
12a5
1rgyas// gang zhig bslab par 'dod pa yis// spros pa'i mtha' la shes par gyis// de ltar mngon par rtogs nas ni// sangs rgyas gud du ma tshol cig/ gal te blun pos tshol byed na// glang po'i rjes ni tshol ba
12a6
1ste// glang po rnyed nas glang po tshol// rang la rang byung yod bzhin du// rang byung gzhan du tshol ba ltar// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad
12b1
1'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las/ spros pa rang bzhin gyis gnas pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang snying po sngags kyi rim pas dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed pa 'di/ rdzogs par bya ba'i
12b2
1phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de yang sku gsung thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ don thams cad thugs su chud nas brjod
12b3
1pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas gzhal yas rdzogs pa la// 'khor ba'i lte ba gang yin la// nyi ma zla ba ku ber dang// pad+ma la sogs gdan stengs su// zhe sdang khro bo'i rang bzhin
12b4
1ste// 'jigs byed rdo rje gzhon nu ni// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste// g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon pa dmar// rtsa ba'i zhal ni mthing nag la// dang po rtse dgu me dpung 'bar// bar ma rtse lnga kha T+wAM ga/ tha ma ri
12b5
1rab phur bu 'dril// sku stod glang chen ko rlon dang// sku smad stag gi sham thabs can// me dpung g.yon pa rig ma 'khyud// dbu la thod phreng skam po dang// thod rlon rnams kyis do shal byas// me yi rus pa'i
12b6
1rgyan dang bcas// phyag dang snyan cha la sogs pa// brang gis 'gro ba chen pos brgyan// dom dred pags pas dkris pa dang// mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba nyid// smin ma sma ra mig kyang ser// zhal gdangs mche
13a1
1gtsigs ljags kyang 'dril// thod khrag 'thung zhing ha har bzhad// zhing la 'bru tshugs bltas nas ni// zhal nas khrag 'bab hi hi bzhad// zhag gi thig le tshom bur byas// thal ba raka tas
13a2
1mtshan pa dang// 'jigs pa'i dpung yang zlog par byed// phyag rgya chen po dngos po las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sems dpa' gsum gyi dam tshig las// snying gar ye shes sems dpa'
13a3
1gnas// hUM/ de nas 'dod chags chen po yis// gsang ba'i pad+ma rgyas mdzad nas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dag/ gsang ba'i dbyings su bstim par bya// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las/ khro bo'i dkyil
13a4
1'khor thams cad ni// thugs ka nas ni phyung gyur te/ khros pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhugs// A+oM badzra ku mA ra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM AHhUM oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro d+ha bI dza ya hUM/
13a5
1ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI wa hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM
13a6
1phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi te hU~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM
13b1
1phaT/ sarba yo gi nI ha ha a phaT swA hA/ de nas yang 'di skad ces ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// steng phyogs hUM mdzad kA ra ni// zhal g.yas ser zhing g.yon pa dmar// dbus zhal sku ni dkar ba'o// dang po
13b2
1gnyis ni rig ma 'khyud// 'khor lo ral gri g.yas pa ste// rin chen pad+ma g.yon pa'o// 'og tu stobs chen bzhag pa ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus sku nag/ dang po rig ma 'khyud pa la// g.yas pa tri
13b3
1shUl ral gri gdan// g.yon pas rin chen pad+ma bsnams// rnam par rgyal ba dkar ba ste// g.yas g.yon gnag cing dmar po'i mdog/ rang gi rig ma dang pos 'khyud// dbyug pa dkar po ral gri
13b4
1g.yas// rin chen pad+ma g.yon na 'dzin// shar gyi rtsibs su gzhag par bya// lho phyogs gshin rje 'joms pa ni// zhal g.yas gnag cing g.yon pa dmar// rtsa zhal dbus ni ser po nyid// phyag g.yas rang gi
13b5
1rig ma 'khyud// g.yas pa thod pa ral gri la// g.yon pa rin chen pad+ma'o// nub phyogs rta mgrin dbus kyi zhal// dmar ba g.yas dkar sngo ba g.yon// phyag gnyis g.yas pa rig ma la// pad+ma dang ni ral gri
13b6
1g.yas// 'khor lo rin chen g.yon na ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal dbus ljang// g.yas dang g.yon ni dkar dang dmar// dang po gnyis ni rig ma la// 'khyud cing rgya gram ral gri 'dzin// rin chen pad+ma
14a1
1g.yon pa ste// byang du brkyang bskum tshul gyi gnas// me yi phyogs su dbyug sngon can// zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon pa dmar// sku zhal dbus ma dkar la ser// dang po gnyis ni rig ma
14a2
1'khyud// g.yas na dbyug pa ral gri ste// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o// mi g.yo mgon po bden bral phyogs// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// dang po gnyis ni rig ma 'khyud// 'khor lo ral
14a3
1gri g.yas pa na// rin chen pad+ma g.yon pas 'dzin// dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar// dmar ljang dang po rig ma 'khyud// rdo rje ral gri g.yas dang g.yon// rin chen
14a4
1pad+ma 'dzin pa ste// rlung gi mtshams su yang dag gnas// dbang po'i grar ni gzhag bya ba/ khams gsum rgyal ba zhal gsum pa// zhal g.yas dkar la g.yon pa dmar// sku dang dbus ni ljang skya yin// phyag
14a5
1gnyis rig ma 'khyud pa la// lcags kyu ral gri rin chen pad// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag tu bsnams/ khro bo chen po thams cad kyang// rgyan cha rdo rje 'jigs byed 'du// khro mo rnams kyang rigs dang
14a6
1mdog/ rang rang lag cha 'dzin par byed// phra men rnams kyi mdog dang rgyan// cir yang 'gyur zhing sna tshogs thogs/ khro rgyal ye nas yin pas na// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas ni/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rnam
14b1
1spros te// nam mkha'i dkyil du brten par gnas// de nas dpal chen khro bo'i rigs// bskul bar bya phyir sngags 'di brjod// oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya ho/ zhes gsungs
14b2
1so// de nas yang 'di gsungs so// bdag dang rgyal ba gnyis med pa'i// rigs kyi rgyal mtshan mi nub phyir// bdag gi sras dang gzhan gyi sras// byang chub sems kyi thig le de// ho gnyis bar du gzhag bya
14b3
1ste// chos sku byang chub sems su gnas// sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'od 'bar te// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas pa// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bar sgrub// sgrub pa sgrub pa chen po yis// gsang ba'i phyag rgya rgyas mdzad
14b4
1de// rjes su sbyor ba brtsam par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad ni// nam mkha'i dbyings su brtan par gnas// de yis ye shes brtan par gnas// gsang ba'i bum pa las byung ba'i// 'khor lo bzhi la
14b5
1rab tu dmigs// gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa ste// bla na med pa 'thob par byed// rgyab kyis phyogs shing 'dun pa med// blun pos mi shes log par blta// gshis ngan du ni shi gyur
14b6
1nas// 'o dod 'bod cing ltung bar 'gyur// de bas thabs la yid ches bya// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i
15a1
1rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ snying po sngags kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal badzra kI la ya la gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di
15a2
1skad ces gsol to// kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sems can rnams la phan don du// mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje'i ngang// mchod pa'i rnam pa bshad du gsol// de nas badzra kI la yas mchod pa'i cho
15a3
1'phrul smin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sems dpal chen po legs so legs so// dus gsum bder gshegs mchod pa dang// sems can rnams la phan don du// phyi dang nang dang
15a4
1gsang ba dang// de bzhin dbyings kyi mchod pa dang// snang srid phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang// rin chen sna bdun mchod pa dang// kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa dang// lha mo bzhi yi mchod pa dang// mchod pa'i phyir
15a5
1na spyan drang dang// phyag rgya chen por gnas bcas la// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo// yang sprul sum sprul skar ltar 'khrugs// gcig la gsum gsum
15a6
1drug cur sprul// sprul pa rnams kyang spyan drang ngo// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ oM badzra kro d+ha shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra/ A gad ta ya/ A gad ta ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ to sha ya/ to sha ya/
15b1
1sarba DA ki nI hri da ya hUM phaT/ de bzhin mchod pa sna tshogs pa// ka niSh+ka la sogs pa 'bul// de bzhin mchod pa bla na med// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ rgyal ba thams cad mchod par bya// bdug pa
15b2
1me tog mar me dang// dri chab shos gtsang yi gar 'ong// tsha ba gsum dang sbyang ba yis// a ka ru yi dog pa rnams// dkyil 'khor kun la mchod par bya// de nas nang gi mchod pa 'bul// de nas gsang ba'i
15b3
1mchod pa ste// oM AHhUM ma hA sa ma ya/ ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis// gdol pa'i khang pa mes bsregs nas// dkar po gangs kyi rnam pa yang// ci 'dod las rnams 'dod pa 'grub// de
15b4
1bzhin las rnams thams cad do// thugs rje chen po 'byung bar byed// bdag dang sems can bsgral ba'i phyir// rig mar sbyar ba'i mchod pa yis// sbyor sgrol thams cad mchod par 'bul// de nas dmar
15b5
1gyi ar+g+has mchod// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas/ dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsang rnying ti rar
15b6
1bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs la 'bul// ma lus gshegs nas bsnams su gsol// rnal 'byor mgon po bdag nyid kyang// chas kyang rab tu gdags byas te// mchod
16a1
1pa thams cad nag por dbul// de yis dngos grub las rnams 'grub// ces bya'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas mdud
16a2
1pa'i rgyud las mchod pa'i sprin rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kI la ya/ bdag nyid chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
16a3
1'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bdag dang gnas dang dus dag dang// bzlas pa dang ni gzugs rnams dang// de ltar rdzas kyi rnam pa dang// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// de bzhin sgrub dang
16a4
1sgrub pa che// bdag don dang ni gzhan don dang// rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i phrin las so// gzhan yang yang dag 'di bstan bya// nyes pa'i don gnyer rnal 'byor la// tshe srog bar du gcod byed la// gdab pa'i
16a5
1gnas ni gang yin pa// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ga dang// lte ba'i dkyil du gdab par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi sras mchog dang// de bzhin dpal gyi phur pas gdab// gang la bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la// zhing gi
16a6
1ras sam gro ga'i shun// ra yi khrag gis ming bris la// gzugs kyi snying ga dag tu bslan// shar lho mtshams su 'brub khung rgya/ kha khyer rnam pa gsum dang ldan// til nag po la gzhi byas la// gan rkyal dag tu
16b1
1gzhag par bya// lho nub mgo la byang shar rkang/ khar nag sgril ma'i byad du gzhug/ drag po'i phur pa dag la brtod// mngag gzhug las rnams gzhol ba'i phyir// ma mo mkha' 'gro srung ma la// mchod pa rdzogs
16b2
1dang ba liM gso// dgug pa gsum gyis rab tu dgug/ gdab pa gsum gyi mos pa bya/ khro bo hUM bzhi'i sbyor ba yis// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// yi ge dza ni kha brgyad pa// 'od zer lcags kyu'i tshul du
16b3
1bzhag/ de yis drangs sam bkug nas ni// gzugs sam ri mo de la bstim// phyag rgya bzhi dang sngags bzhi yis// dgug pa dang ni bsdam pa dang// de bzhin bcing dang dga' dag bya// dzaHhUM baM hoH badzra aM
16b4
1ku sha dza dza dzaH dzaHhUM baM hoH pra be sha ya hUM/ A be sha ya a A/ yang na gzugs brnyan 'di ltar bya// thal ba skye tshe lan tshwa dang/ khre dang ju tshe srub ma'i lo// phug ma grog mkhar sa rnams la// rak+ta bdud rtsis
16b5
1sprus nas kyang/ smug nag snying gar ming rus gdags// bkug nas phebs par gyur pa dang// gu gul tshil chen bdug pa dang// phye ma gsum gyi sbyor ba bya// nag po dug las byas pa yis// gtor ma rnams
16b6
1kyang za ru gzhug/ phra men dang ni mgyogs ma la// ba liM byin la las rnams bcol// kun tu mgyogs par song nas ni// glo snying 'dren cing dbang bo thogs// myos tsam du du rab byas
17a1
1nas// bstod pa byas la gnyis med bstim// de nas gsad pa'i bzlas pa bya// bdag gi las kyi ting 'dzin zhugs// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de nas bzlas pa'i snying po
17a2
1bsam// hUM yig rnam par bsam nas ni// phur pa khro bo ci 'dra bas// phyogs bcu dag tu don byas nas// 'gro don dam rnams rdzogs mdzad de// slar 'dus phur pa nyid la thim// 'bum phrag cig gam sa
17a3
1ya'am// brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong rtsa brgyad// bzlas te stong tshig mchod pa bya// de nas sprul pa rab tu+u dgye// gnyis med 'dres pa'i ling+ga la// dgug dang rab tu gzir bar bya// dpang gzug ra mda' bzlog
17a4
1par bya// oM laM hUM laM s+t+waM b+ha nan/ mo ha g+ha ya/ g+ha ga bAn/ shrI badzra hUM kA ra phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH sarba big+h+nAn/ kA ya bAk+ka tsit+ta badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ hUM kA ra hUM/ a a a/ dzaHhUM baM hoH A
17a5
1bai sha ya a/ khro bos mngon smod rab bya ste khro bos ske nas bzung nas ni// g.yas pa'i tho bas brdeg byas te// mngon spyod phur pa rab tu btab// sngags ni 'di skad brjod par bya'o// oM na maHsa man ta kA ya
17a6
1bA ka tsit+ta badzrA NAM/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba du Sh+tAn phaT/ kI la ya/ kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha rod Adz+nya pA ya ta/ sarba big+ha nAn/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ a ko Ta ya
17b1
1mung+ga ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro ta yak+sha na kha kha khA hi khA hi/ de nas gzugs brnyan gtub par bya/ A+oM hrIHSh+t+r-IHshI g+h+raM A na ya hUM phaT/ bi kri ta nan hUM phaT/ de nas las rnams tshang bya'i phyir// hom khung gru gsum sgo can
17b2
1du// raM zhes bya ba'i me spar te// me lha bos la las rnams bya// gso ba gsum dang gsal ba gsum// rin po che yi dgongs pa dang// grub pa'i mtha' ni bstan par bya// zhes gsungs so/ de bzhin gshegs
17b3
1pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las/ phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas badzra kI la ya chen po de/
17b4
1mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gzhi yi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// lam lnga dag la tshul bstun nas// sa rnams mtha' ru dbyung ba'i phyir// shes rab rnam gsum sbyor ba
17b5
1yis// dang po rgyu yi tshogs bsgom ste// yan lag bdun dang gnas bzhi bya// de nas gzhung bzhin las rnams bya// dang po ting 'dzin rnam gsum nas// sbyor ba dang po'i ting 'dzin bya// de nas dkyil 'khor
17b6
1rgyal ba mchog/ de la las kyi rgyal ba mchog/ gzhi yi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste// cho ga rdzogs par byas nas ni// bsgrub pa chen po mtha' ru dbyung// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang 'di gsungs
18a1
1so// de ltar las rnams zin gyur nas// phra mo'i thig le bsgom par bya// sna rtse rnam pa bzhi rnams su// so so'i yi ge bsam par bya// de ni gzhi yi phra mo yin// de rnams yongs su gyur pa
18a2
1las// mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa ni// thig le zhes su bshad pa yin// de yi phra ba gang yin pa// nA da zhes ni bya ba yin// yid kyi smar khung kha phye nas// sems kyis sems la blta bar bya// chos nyid rtsa dang ye
18a3
1shes rtsa// rang rgyud rtsa dang yon tan rtsa// gang gis yongs su shes pa la// phra mo'i thig le nA dar 'dzag/ ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad
18a4
1'dus pa/ sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las// gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ phra thig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas badzra kI la ya chen po des// mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
18a5
1snyoms par bzhugs nas yang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// zhi ba blang dor med pa'i chos// rang bzhin med pa'i chos yin te// brtag par dka' bar bstan pa yin// brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang
18a6
1bral// 'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin te// skye shi med pa'i yul du snang// dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa ste// kun tu 'od kyi sa yin no// 'di zhes bya ba'i dpe yang med// ngas kyang mthong bar ma nus na// mngon
18b1
1sum mi gnas kun la khyab// gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'byung bas na// zad mi shes pa'i gter du gyur// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni// stong pa nyid la tha mi dad// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa gnyis// bye
18b2
1brag dbye ba gcig kyang med// de dag nyid kyi khyad par ni// ci yang yod par ma gsungs so// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tsam// stong pa nyid las ma rtogs
18b3
1par// brjod pa thams cad tha snyad yin// de bas chos rnams stong pa la// blun po rnams kyis de mi mthong// de phyir chos rnams rang bzhin med// de bzhin gshegs pas mi gzigs so// chos rnams bde bar
18b4
1gshegs pa 'dra// btsal bas rnyed pa ma yin te// yang dag nyid du gang blta bas// yang dag mthong bar mi nus te// 'ga' yang mthong ba med pas na// de nyid mthong ba chen po yin// mya ngan 'das pa sangs
18b5
1rgyas sa// gang gis mthong bar mi nus te// pad+ma can gyi ye shes kyis// skad cig gcig la mngon byang chub// chos rnams dngos po gcig yin pas// rnam pa tha dad du mar yang// rmongs pa rnams kyis log
18b6
1par mthong// 'gro ba 'khrul bar rgyar chud 'dra// gang gis gang rtogs sems la ni// 'byung ba lnga yang bcom ldan 'das// gcig par gnas pas bcom ldan 'das// kun la yod pa bcom
19a1
1ldan 'das// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyu yin pas// 'khor ba rang byung gzhan las smin// de bas sems can thams cad ni// sangs rgyas snying po can zhes bya// ma rig pa yi sems can gyis// 'khor
19a2
1ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// sems can kun gyi rang bzhin ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// kun la khyab pa'i nam mkha'o// de ma mthong bas de mi mthong// snying po chos kyi don la ni// rtog ge pa
19a3
1yis mi rnyed de// 'ga' yang btsal bas mi rnyed do// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las/ rang bzhin
19a4
1lta ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa badzra kI la yas 'khor rnams la spyan rgyas par gzigs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ khyod rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams
19a5
1dang/ sems can dbugs dbyung ba dang/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'dzin pa'i phyir// rtag pa dang po 'di khyed kyis yang dag par chongs shig dad pa dang ldan pa rnams
19a6
1la byos shig skye bo mchod pa la dga' ba/ 'dod chags che ba rnams la/ tshul bzhin du bshad pa'i dbang skur la bshad pa byos shig ces gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams kyis/ ston pas gsungs pa la
19b1
1mngon par yi rang ba dang dga' ba skyes te/ rin po che sna lnga la sogs pa mi tog sil mas mchod de/ mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba dang/ lha rnams kyis phyag btsal nas/
19b2
1kye kye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sangs rgyas thugs rje rin po che// sems can rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir// rtog pa dang po 'di bka' stsal// thugs rje yi ni rgyun chen po// bka' stsal gsung ston thugs
19b3
1rje che// bdag cag rnams kyi bcang bar bya// 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags bgyi// skye bo rnams la dbang bskur bgyi// grong dang grong khyer grong rdal la// nyin re bzhin du bskor bar bgyi// zhes gsol bas/
19b4
1bcom ldan 'das 'khor rnams la yang dag par gzigs nas/ ci yang mi gsung bar de bzhin nyid du mnal lo// mi snang bar gyur to// de nas 'khor rnams kyang nyid la nyid gzigs nas/ mi snang bar gyur
19b5
1to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes thams cad 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas mdud pa'i rgyud las/ 'chang ba dang yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// brtag pa
19b6
1dang po yongs su rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o////@#/ / rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha hUM kA ra tan tra rA dza tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rgyud
20a1
1kyi rgyal po khro bo hUM kA ra'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi tshogs/
20a2
1'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i d+harma d+hA tu/ chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum e'i dkyil 'khor 'byams pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ yab yum gnyis su med par lhun gyis sbyor
20a3
1ba la bzhugs te/ 'khor mche ba can gyi tshogs dang/ gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs mtha' dag gis bskor te/ rang bzhin gyi lhun gyis grub par bzhugs so// de nas mgo brnyan gyi
20a4
1tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ phyi nang gi mchod pas mnyes par byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor na// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par
20a5
1bzhugs// gnyis med ye shes rab mchog bsgral// de yi sngags rnams gsungs lags na/ khro bo so so'i dkyil 'khor rnams// bcom ldan mgon pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan badzra kI la yas// karma he
20a6
1ru ka yi tshig gsan nas// phag mgo smig bu'i mgo rnams la// gsung gis 'di skad bka' stsal to// so so'i dkyil 'khor dam pa rnams// nga yis bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// bcom ldan gnyis med gtso
20b1
1chen gyi// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan pa ni// dang po gzhung dang mthun pa yi// sa phyogs de dang de nyid du// rnal 'byor dam pa de gnas pas// rang gi snying gar hUM bsams la// de las 'od 'phros sangs rgyas
20b2
1mthong// mchod 'bul la sogs gzhung bzhin du// de la shU'u n+ya tA yis sbyangs// de rjes gzhal yas la sogs pa'i// rgyan dang ldan pa de mthong nas// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi yis
20b3
1rnam par mdzes// nyi ma zla ba'i gdan stengs su// hUM chen yab yum 'khor tshogs dbab// sa bon bkod la gsal bar brtag/ drod gsher las skyes yin par ni// mkhas pas brtags te shes par gyis// de
20b4
1nas gtso bo'i sems de yis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams bkug ste// bstim pas dbang yang rdzogs par ldan// de la phyi nang mchod pas mchod// gsang ba'i don dam yang dag ste// de yis las rnams
20b5
1brtsam par bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po hUM ka ra'i rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang 'di skad gsungs te// hUM kA ra yi dkyil 'khor ni// zla gam dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la// mdzes pa'i
20b6
1sku mchog gsal ba ni// sngags bzlas pa yis gsal bar gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsam// bzlas pa'i yig 'bru yang dag dgod// shes rab gsal ba'i yi ge yis// bum pa dmar po 'od dang
21a1
1bcas// de yi kha rgyan a shwa ka/ mgul ba dar dmar bzang pos dkris// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya bzlas// mtshan ma bzang po mthong ba dang// las la sbyar bar bya ba yin// thabs dang bcas
21a2
1pa'i 'od zer gyis// dang po gnas nas bskul bar bya// de yi las sbyor gang la yang// sems pas yang nas yang du bya// lus la tsan dan dmar po byug/ dgongs dang tho rangs sngags mang bzlas// g.yo ba'i
21a3
1rdzas kyi rkyen byas nas// phur gdab gsad pa'i las bya zhing/ dbang sdud 'gugs pa'i las de bzhin// bsgrub na 'grub par gdon mi za// rgyud kyi rgyal po hUM kA ra'i rgyud las/ las kyi dkyil 'khor dbye ba'i
21a4
1le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// ser ba dbab pa'i las rnams ni// sbyor ba spyi dang mthun pa yis// dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor bri// rdzas ni yungs kar
21a5
1khrag skam gu gul gsum/ thod pa mtshan ngan dum drug tu// rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo bris nas ni// dbus su a dzi te dza ye bi dza ye ka tang ka de gsum bri'o// zlum po la ni kI la ya 'bru dgu'o// rtsibs brgyad
21a6
1phyogs kyi khro bo brgyad// shar lho nub byang rtsibs mchan la// steng du 'og gi snying po bri// rtsibs mchan drug la du yang sngags drug bri// tha ma mu khyud zlum po la// thod pa dbus su bsdus yin pas// 'bru dgu khro
21b1
1bo'i las sngags bri// thod pa shar du kha bltas la// oM laM rgyas pa'i sngags dri'o// seng ldeng phur bu'i steng du oM// rgya mdud logs la 'bru brgyad dgod// lcum gzhogs dbal la khro bcu'i sngags// rgya mdud
21b2
1bar la chu srin kha sprad bri// logs drug zur gsum dam can gsum gyi sngags// de rjes pad+ma'i khrag dang mi dbang 'bras bu'i sha khrag dang/ khrag sna snying sna tshogs tshad dang// mtshams bcad byin dbab bka'
21b3
1bzhin no// thod pa dbus su kha sbub la// seng ldeng phur pa dbus su bkod// phyi ma rdzas rnams kun la dgod// phrin las gzhung bsrang 'dzab la 'jug/ thod pa snar mor bsam byas la// steng du chu yi dkyil
21b4
1'khor bsam// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM phaT/ hU~M ma ma ba shaM ku ru ma taM nya ka ra i daM d+ha ti ma ma karma shI g+h+raM kA ra ya/ A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ mA ra se na pra marda ni hUM phaT/ dpyid zla gsum
21b5
1la bsnyen sngags bzlas/ kha ba khu 'phang rlung dmar gsum// de rnams byung na 'grub par 'gyur// thod pa snar mor bsam steng nas// lha rnams bsams pas gtso bo'i thugs la gnas// sprul pa bye ba bsam
21b6
1byas la// chu bcol ser ba dkar po 'byung bar bsam// oM badzra kI li kI la ya che ge mo'i lo thog la/ shi traM ka ra ka ra ka ra te yi A be sha ya A be sha ya hUM phaT/ oM mA ma ba shaM ku ru ma taM nya ka ra i daM/ d+ha ti ma
22a1
1ma karma a dzi te/ a pa ra dzi te dza ye bi dza ye/ ka tang ka ye mA ra se nA pra mar d+ha ni ya hUM phaT/ thod pa'i khrag dang snying sna dang// gu gul gsum po thod par blug/ seng ldeng phur pa yungs kar phur
22a2
1la gdags// rtags ni thod par me 'bar ro// gong ma'i rtags ni ma byung na// sngags drug dam can dkrugs la yin// pho dang mo yi log men bzlas// rdo rje gsang bas gnad la dbab// de nas dpyid zla tha
22a3
1chung la/ khrag skam 'bras bu gsum po dang// gtor ma dum gcig ming kun bsre// thod par blugs la yul der phyin// gu gul dud btang bden pa bdar// thod pa chu mig nang du sba'o// phur pa dkyil du
22a4
1gdab par bya'o// rdzas sna gsum yang gtor byas la// gar 'bebs ri rtse de la phyin// phrag la thab bya dpang yang gzug/ ston zla gsum la ri rtser bya// ri rtse mthong nas bskul bar bya// ma grub ston zla ra ba
22a5
1dgu// 'bring po kun la rab tu shis// ma phebs tha ma gzhi nas spogs// rgyud kyi rgyal po hUM kA ra'i rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro mas ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang 'di skad ces
22a6
1gsungs so// phur ni byang chub sems su gcig gyur pa// pa ni sems kyis ma khyab med pa ste/ phur ni rdo rje gzhon nu nyid la bya// pa ni khro bo rnams la bya ba'o// phur ni skye ba med la bya// pa ni thams cad 'gag
22b1
1pa med// phur ni rig pa byang chub sems// pa ni thams cad der grub pas// phur ni thams cad byang chub sems// pa ni thams cad kun tu khyab// phur ni thams cad gtso bo'i mchog/ pa ni thams cad 'khor
22b2
1gyi tshul// phur ni thams cad skye ba med// pa ni rol pa 'gag pa med// phur ni byang chub sems su gcig/ pa ni thams cad de ru 'grub// chos nyid phur pa thams cad rgyud// bskul ba chos kyi dbyings la
22b3
1gdab// thugs rje'i phur pa nyon mongs log par 'khyams pa rnams la gdab// gsang ba byang chub sems kyi phur pa ni// rtog tshog rdung phyir yum gyi mkha' la gdab// mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa ni// bsgral phyir
22b4
1dgra bgegs gnyis la gdab// rgyud kyi rgyal po khro bo hUM kA ra'i rgyud las/ phur pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces
22b5
1gsungs so// de nas phag gi mgo can dang// smig bu'i mgo can la sogs pas// gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'di skad do// kye ma gsang ba bdag nyid gtso// sku gsung thugs ni rab zab pas// rgya mtsho lta bu'i
22b6
1ngang tshul can// skye med don ldan khyod la bstod// gsang sngags bdag po khyod la bstod// theg pa'i rang bzhin khyod la bstod// thams cad mnga' bdag khyod la bstod// rol pa'i bdag nyid khyod la
23a1
1bstod// phrin las mnga' bdag khyod la bstod// bdud 'dul khro rgyal khyod la bstod// dbang sdud chen po khyod la bstod// zil gnon chen po khyod la bstod// ces de rnams shin tu dges
23a2
1nas dges pa'i nga ro byung ste de skad ces bstod do// rgyud kyi rgyal po khro bo hUM kA ra'i rgyud las/ rgyud gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rgyud kyi rgyal po khro bo hUM kA ra'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad
23a3
1du/ tan+t+ra rA dza kro d+ha bi dza ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud// dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das
23a4
1khrag 'thung gi rgyal po/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang lhun gyis grub pa na// yum dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de'i tshe stag gi mgo can dang/ bya
23a5
1rgod kyi mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis yab gtso bo la zhus pa/ gnas kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// rdzas kyi mtshan
23a6
1nyid ji ltar lags// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// zhes dris pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po rnam par rgyal bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal
23b1
1to// gnas kyi mtshan nyid ri nag po// dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid gru gsum e// 'khor gyi mtshan nyid rang las mi gzhan pa// rdzas kyi mtshan nyid rgyu bzhi'o// sngags kyi mtshan nyid las sngags spel// bsgrub
23b2
1pa'i mtshan nyid mar brgyad la// de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye khrag 'thung gsang ba'i
23b3
1bdag/ sku gsung thugs kyi bdag chen po// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// rnal 'byor rjes su sgrub pa la// dkyil 'khor nyams su ji ltar blang// thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyi// dngos gzhi
23b4
1bsgrub na ji ltar sgrub// ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po rnam par rgyal bas 'di skad ces gsungs so// nyon cig mgo brnyan phra thabs tshogs// rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor
23b5
1pas// dang po las la sbyor ba'i dus// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya// de nas drag po'i las la sbyar// rang bzhin med pa'i rjes 'jug go/ phyag rgya gsum gyis bskyed par bya'o// 'byung ba rim
23b6
1brtsegs tshul bzhin bsgom/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las// gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ dbangagi rim pa 'di gsungs so// gnam dang
24a1
1sa gzhi brtag pa dang// sa bslang cha gsum gtor ma gtong// phyi mtshams bcad cing nang mtshams bsrung// rgyal po'i tshul gyis bsnyen pa bya// sta gon sa chog sgrib pa sbyangs// tshems shing 'dor
24a2
1zhing srung skud gdags// ye shes dbab cing lus la lha bzung ngo// de nas dbang gi yon yang dbul// de nas yang ni sgrub pa ni// dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga bsgrubs// slob dpon dkyil 'khor dpag tshad
24a3
1bzhi// rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rgyang grags bzhi// sngags pa'i dkyil 'khor khru brgya'o// dge slong dkyil 'khor lnga bcu'o// rje rigs dkyil 'khor bcu drug pa'o// dmangs kyi dkyil 'khor khru brgyad
24a4
1pa'o// gnam thig sa thig byang chub sems// thig gdab rim pa tshul bzhin bya// rin chen sna lnga'i tshon rtsi la// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i yig 'bru dgod// ye shes lnga ru byin brlabs te// pho brang dkyil 'khor
24a5
1lhun grub dang// twa ra Na yis brgyan pa bri// slob ma gzhug cing dri lan zhu// yi dam dbog dang dam tshig dbog/ gsang mtshan dbog cing dam chu blud// snying po dbab cing phyag rgya bstan// gser thur spyan dbye
24a6
1dkyil 'khor bstan// gzugs brnyan bstan cing chos kyi bka' rnams sgrogs// 'jug pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin no// dbang gi las rnams bsgrub pa ni// dbang lnga don gyi bar du 'gro// lha dbang rgyal po'i tshul
24b1
1du gzung// phan pa'i dbang bcu lus la brgyan// rtags kyi dbang rnams lus la bskyed// gsang ba'i dbang ni gsung la bskul// shes rab ye shes dbang ni thugs la dran// phyag rgya'i dbang ni lus la
24b2
1gzhug/ rjes gnang chen po lus la bskur// dam tshig chos rnams de ru bshad// ces gsungs so/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las// dbang gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag
24b3
1'thung gi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mtha' la rdo rje yi// rtse gsum kha khyer yod pas mtshan// tha ma 'khor los kun nas spras// de yi dbus su nyi zla gsal// ro
24b4
1yi phung po'i steng du ni// sa bon gsal bar yongs rdzogs pas// sgong skyes rim pa la gnas pa// sku rdzogs 'od dang bcas par ni// lha ni gsal ba'i ngang tshul can// yongs su rdzogs par de mthong nas// sku
24b5
1gsung thugs las yang dag spros// bde gshegs 'khor bcas spyan drangs nas// mchod dbul phyi nang dbang yang nod// gnang ba byin nas byin gyis brlabs// ye shes dkyil 'khor gnas nas
24b6
1drangs// bstims nas gsal ba'i sras mchog la// snying po bkod de spro bsdu ni// rim pa ma 'dres shes byas la/ khri phrag gnyis ni bzlas byas na// de dus mtshan ma bzang po 'byung// dus der las la sbyar ba
25a1
1ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus su ni// yaM las rlung lha dud kha bskyed// sha ba'i khri la bzhugs nas ni// mchod dbul ye shes rlung lha dgug/ bstims la rlung lha'i snying po bzlas// rdza so ma
25a2
1btang sa yis dgab// sngon dmar zhags pas rgya gram bcings// de steng ma las nyi dkyil 'khor// de steng hUM las yongs gsal bskyed// rdo rje sngon po kha bzhi pa// gsal ba'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// maM las ri
25a3
1rab me lces bskor// de stengs mgon po bsam par bya// phyag na rdo rje hUM las bskyed// de yis rlung lha rab gzir bas// rlung gi sbyor ba rgyun chad 'gyur// ser ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// sras mchog dam
25a4
1par de dbang bskur// bzlas pa bye ba sa yar bzlas// sras la 'od zer 'phro 'dus gtams// ldeg pa'i rtags rnams byung ba dang// ngar phyer gzugs byas sor brgyad tshad// rkang pa g.yas pa'i 'og tu
25a5
1gzhug/ btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// chu bo chen po'i snar btags na// nges par gyen du zlog par byed/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum
25a6
1pa'o//// de nas yungs kar rgyal po bsgrub ste/ thod pa mtshan ngan gcig nang du// yungs kar blug la chog gzhug bsrang// yungs kar khro bo chen por bsam// 'dzab kyi skabs su rtsa sngags nyi shu rtsa
25b1
1gcig la/ A be sha ya btags la bzlas// yungs kar khro bo chen po la// gang la btab kyang thogs med bsam// bstod pa bya zhing tshogs kyis mchod// gzhan yang rnal 'byor dri chen gyis// gzhi byas yungs
25b2
1kar lud kyang bya// dbang po lnga ru yungs kar blugs// dri chu bong rtug bong gcin gsum// lud byas gcus shing sngags kyang bzlas// gzhan pas sbom pa gcig yong ste// dgra la btab na rtsa rgyud
25b3
1gcod// bgegs la btab na rdul du rlog/ de la yungs kar rgyal po bya/ khro bo rnam par rgyal po'i rgyud las/ yungs kar rgyal po sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gu gul sbyar ma bsgrub// thod pa
25b4
1mtshan ngan gcig nang du// rta bong dang ni spyang ka'i brun// bud med dor rta khyi lud dang// 'bog dang gu gul nag po dang// de rnams thod pa'i nang du blugs// rnam rgyal cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// 'dzab kyi skabs
25b5
1su kI la ya// nyi shu rtsa gcig las sngags gdags/ dz+wa la pa ya mang bzlas la// dri chus bran la phur pas dkrug/ bra mas kha bcad ril bu bya// bsgrub pa'i rdzas la du ba btang// dgra bgegs gnyis kyi lha dang
25b6
1dbye// thogs pa med 'apar 'grub par gyur/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las// gu gul sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas ser ba bsrung bya ste// yungs kar thal chen sngags bzlas te// phrin las
26a1
1rnam pa bzhi yi ni// phur pa sor bzhi'i tshad du bya// shing byang bu la 'bru dgu bri// bsnyen pa spyi dang mthun par bya// ser ba bsrung ba'i nyin mo la// srung ma bskul zhing gzu dpang gzug/ yul lha
26a2
1mchod cing gser skyems btang// yungs kar thal chen gong ma'i rdzas// phur bu byang bu se mthos bskor// yungs kar bsgreng zhing phur bus gdab// mod la zlog pa 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so/ khro bo
26a3
1rnam par brgyal ba'i rgyud las/ ser ba bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de la karma he ru ka dang/ stag gi mgo can dang/ bya rog gi mgo can dang/ phra men
26a4
1gyi tshogs rnams shin tu dges nas/ zhab bzhad cing mgrin gcig tu bsdus nas/ gdug pa 'dul bar khyad par 'phags/// khro bo mkha' 'gro bdag cag 'khor// tshogs pa rnams la gsungs
26a5
1lags na// sngar ni bde gshegs gang gis gsungs// phyis ni bde gshegs gang gsung 'gyur// da lta 'di nyid gnas lags na// de skad ces gsol ba dang// bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal bas// karma
26a6
1he ru ka la sogs te 'khor gyi tshogs kyi tshigs [\[]tshig [\]]gsan nas gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ khyod ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra// sems can kun la phan byed cing/ khams gsum snyoms pa'i pha
26b1
1ma yin// zab mo khong du 'chang byed yin// bde ba slad kyi lung ston yin// gdug pa slad kyi tshar gcod yin// ye shes sprul pa'i sku mchog yin// gsang gsum 'dus pa'i thugs mchog yin// zhes gsungs
26b2
1so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha nI
26b3
1la daN+Da tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud// dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das dbyug pa sngon po// 'og min gnas
26b4
1kyis gzhal yas na// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rang bzhin gyi gsal ba'i gzhal yas khang na/ yum dang gnyis su med par bzhugs te/ karma he ru ka dang g.yag gi mgo can dang/ bya rog gi mgo can gyi
26b5
1tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye gsang ba'i bdag po rang bzhin can// mchog gi las rnams thams cad mkhyen// 'di ni rjes sgrub rnal 'byor pas// gnas kyi khyad par mi 'tshal lam// gnas
26b6
1rnams rim pa ji ltar lags/ khrag 'thung rgyal pos bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol ba gsan nas ni/ khrag 'thung dpa' bo mthu chen gyis// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gnas kyi khyad
27a1
1par ngas bstan gyis// spyir ni drag po'i gnas rnams ni// dur khrod gnas sam shing gcig drung// ma mo'i gnas dang the'u rang gnas// lha 'dre 'du ba'i lam rgya gram// sa srin ma mo du ma
27a2
1'grogs// mi rnams phung ba'i khang stong dang// dug shing skyes pa'i gnas rnams la// gdug pa sbrul la sogs pa'i tshang// mang por bcas shing 'du ba dang// ral pa 'dra ba'i gnas su ni// rdo rje drag po
27a3
1bskul ba'i gnas// nags chen po ni gang na bar// rnal 'byor mig gis bltas pa yi// lha mi yongs la grags pa'am// chu mig lkugs pa klu yi mig/ rgyu lam gong gsum 'byung po'i srang// phyogs las grub
27a4
1pa'i dgra'am bgegs// mi dpung gru gsum ma rungs pa// ba tshwa zhu chu dmyal ba'i chu// gnod sbyin mang po 'du ba'i sa// srin po khros pa'i gdong mdangs 'dra// gdug pa chu srin kha gdangs 'dra// dred mo ral
27a5
1pa'i gseb nang du// drag po'i las su bya ba yin// me tog mang po'i gling yod dang// ri ni rin chen spungs pa 'dra// skyed mos tshal dang dpag bsam shing// ngang pa bung ba'i sgra sgrogs pa// skad snyan bya ni sna
27a6
1tshogs sgrogs// snying po mchog gi 'bru sna can// gnam ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dra// sa ni pad+ma 'dab brgyad 'dra// gnas kyi dbyibs legs kha shar bltas// lung pa ran cing mdzes par ni// las kyi bya ba
27b1
1gzhung yang brtsam// bkra shis don 'grub gnas yin pas/ dbang dang dgug pa'i gnas su bstan// nags ni tsher ma gdug pa yod// stag dang dom dang gzigs rnams dang// sbrul gdug gnas pa'i nags
27b2
1'dab dang// gnam ni ral gri 'dra ba dang// mda' yis phug dang gris bsha' 'dra// sa ni zur gsum 'joms pa'i dbyibs// sa 'khos me dpung 'bar ba 'dra// legs la du ba'i ri mo yod// nyams dang
27b3
1ldan pas btsal byas na// nges par myur du 'grub bar 'gyur/ khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po
27b4
1des// dkyil 'khor gyi las bstan te// dbyug pa sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba la// thod pa gsum dang dbyug pas brgyan// dbus su ro yi phung po la// skad cig gis ni
27b5
1gsal bar blta// mche gtsigs rkan rdeb dbyug pa len// hUM gi rang sgra thams cad sgrogs// chag gang dbus su bzhag pa ni// ro sogs g.yas pa'i dkyil gnas su// gzugs brnyan byas la gzhag par
27b6
1bya// de la shes pa rab stims la// dbus su lcags kyi phur gdab la// gzhag par bya ba yin par bshad// A+oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn/ bid+yA rA dza hUM
28a1
1phaT/ sbyor ba de yis rab sbyar na// gang yin gnas su dgug par byed// de nas las la sbyar nas ni// lcags kyi phur pa lnga btab na// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// gdug pa can la lta ci
28a2
1smos/ khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor dbye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba'i don bstan te/ dam tshig
28a3
1nyams dang 'khus pa dang// dam las log cing chos la rgol// dam med dkyil 'khor ma mthong dang// sems can yongs la 'tshe ba dang// dkon mchog sku dgra yongs la sdang// dam med tshogs kyi spyang ki
28a4
1byed// chos la rtog cing mtshang la rgol/ kha la chos byed snying rje med/ khrag 'thung rgyal pos bsgral bar gsungs// drag po'i gsang sngags drag bzlas shing// bzlas par bya zhing dug me gtong// tshil chen zhun
28a5
1dmar rtsi sbyar la// mchog gi rkang gis dkrug bya zhing// legs par 'dres par gyur pa dang// phog cing dkrugs te bzlas pa bya// rkang rjes shog shog ming byang la// de la rab tu byug byas te// dam tshig
28a6
1nyams pa de la bstim// sras kyi phur pa de la gdab// bsgral ba'i zhing du de gtogs so// btab ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las/ dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba'i le'u ste gsum
28b1
1pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ phyugs nad bsrung bar bya ste/ sman sna lnga dang dri sna tshogs// phur pa yungs kar gu gul dang// mchod cing gzhung bsrang sman mchod bya// 'bru
28b2
1dgu bzlas shing drag sngags gdags// a dzi te a pa rA dzi te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ ka tang ka ye/ srung ma gsum gyi sngags rnams gces// zla ba drug tu bzlas pa bya// phyugs la sman blud phur pa gdags// bcom
28b3
1ldan dbyug sngon srungs shig bya// yungs kar sngags kyi phur pa gdags// phyugs nad bsrung ba 'grub par 'gyur/ khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las/ phyugs nad bsrung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas
28b4
1bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ karma he ru ka dang/ g.yag gi mgo can dang/ bya rog gi mgo can la sogs pa phra men gyi tshogs kyis/ 'di skad ces gsol to// phyis ni sa phyogs gang du
28b5
1dar// gang zag ci lta bu dang 'phrad// 'di ston slob dpon ji ltar lags// bdag cag rnams kyis ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan gsol// de skad ces ni gsol pa dang/ khrag 'thung rgyal
28b6
1pos 'khor gyi tshig/ gsan nas gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ khyod ni bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra// sems can kun la phan byed yin// mkha' mnyam pa yi pha ma yin// de yang 'di ltar gnas par gyis/
29a1
1khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud las// rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/// khro bo dbyug pa sngon po'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/
29a2
1khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po'i rgyud/ dpal ya mAn ta ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rang bzhin
29a3
1bzhugs gnas chen po na// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po yum dang gnyis su med par bde ba chen po'i ngang la bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor karma he ru ka dang/ sha ba'i mgo can dang/ 'ug pa'i
29a4
1mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la// mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang las bzhengs nas/ sems can gyi don la bskul te 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bcom
29a5
1ldan rdo rje'i ngang nyid las// gdug pa'i log rtog gdul slad du// sngon gyi smon lam cher dgongs la// snying rje chen po bdag la ston// zhes bskul bas// dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos bskul bar mkhyen
29a6
1nas// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhengs nas/ gdug pa can gyi tshogs thams cad la khyab pa'i snying rje chen po bskyed de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho 'khor gyi tshogs// rin chen byang chub
29b1
1sems chen po/ khros pa'i sku rnams bskyed pa'i rgyu// gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir/ khros pa'i sems su grub mdzod cig/ ho/ pad+ma dag pa yi yang/ zhes rnam par bskul lo// yang de'i tshe dregs pa'i tshogs
29b2
1dang mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyi ma dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad g.yems pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// de nas yang khro mo'i rgyal mo byang chub sems la yab kyis bskul ba glu 'dis bskul lo// hUM pha dang ma
29b3
1dang dga' ba'i klong// gdug pa sgrol ba'i byang chub sems// gdod nas dag pa'i gzhal yas su/ khros pa'i tshogs rnams 'byung ba'i dbyings// ho zhes rnam par bskul lo// de nas yang de'i tsho khrag 'thung gi
29b4
1rgyal po'i tshogs yum la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa 'gyur to// de nas bde ba'i ngang la rtag tu lhan cig tu bzhugs so/ khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de
29b5
1nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ gshin rje'i gshed po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// gshin rje'i gshed po'idakyil 'khor ni// gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba la// zur gsum be con sngon pos brgyan// de
29b6
1yi dbus su bsam bya ba// gro ga shin shun gang yin la// thar nu+u ra ljag 'di yis ni// rang byung me tog dang sbyar nas// gzugs brnyan sor bzhi'i tshad du bri// de yi dbus su rab bzhag pa// de yi snying ga'i
30a1
1gnas su ni// sa bon bsam la sku bskyed de// rdo rje'i cho ga gsum gyis bskyed// yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku de la// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags dag
30a2
1la// gsang ba'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod// rang bzhin gnas su de bzhugs par// yongs su bltas la sngags la sbyar// sras kyi dam par rab bskyed la// byin
30a3
1brlabs dbang yang bskur ba yin// dug dang ma rungs pa yang byug/ bzlas yungs thun yang brdeg pa yin// dug la sogs pa'i thun yang brdeg/ zhabs 'og gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// bsad pa'i sbyor ba
30a4
1byas pas ni// thang gcig yud la de rlag 'gyur// dur khrod ras ma blangs nas ni// dug dang ma rungs pa yis byug/ ma de ra yi shing bu la// pad+ma'i snod du+u ngad pas bsags// de la bse shing zho yis
30a5
1sbyangs// dur khrod rkang gi smyu gus bri// rnga mo bong bu'i gzugs bris la// de stengs 'bad cing 'thab pa bri// de la gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas// de yi rtsig pa'i rmang du bzlas// brgya rtsa brgyad du them pa
30a6
1dang// sa brkos bcug la mi mngon sba// de yis dbye bar gdon mi za// dur khrod ro ras sa me rlung// de dag 'khor lo rab bris la// 'khor lo'i dbus su gzugs brnyan bri// rnga mo ske ring rtsal dang
30b1
1bcas// de yi rmig pa bzhi rnams la// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor bskyed// de steng dmigs pa'i gzugs brnyan bzhag/ bzlas pa khri phrag gcig byas la// them pa'i 'og tu sbas gyur na// gnas las 'pho ba
30b2
1nges par 'grub// dgug pa rlung gi lcags kyu ste// thang gcig yud la 'gugags par byed/ khro bo gshin rje gshed po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan
30b3
1'das khrag 'thung rgyal po des tshe sgrub pa'i don 'di gsungs so// rin chen sna lnga'i bum pa ru// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// spos lnga snying po lnga ru gsungs// sgo bzhi phyi la hrI bzhi bri// rta mgrin rgyal por
30b4
1mnga' gsol la// nang blug bum pa'i kha rgyan bcas// spos dang gu gul dud pas bdug/ dkar gsum mngar gsum ril bu bya// sku gsung thugs la thim par bstim// mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad
30b5
1gzungs thag gzungs// lha bskyed 'dzab bya mchod pa dbul// snyan gsan dbab cing sku gsung thugs la bstim// sngags kyi bdag po dbus su bsgom// dkyil 'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// lA s+ya mA le tshe yi
30b6
1bdag/ nir ti gIr ti dbang gi sku// nub nas bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med// rtsi bcud thams cad bum par bsdu// byang sems thams cad sku gsung thugs la bsdu// rtsa sngags bskyed cing las sngags
31a1
1gdags// A' be sha ya btags la bzlas// tshe nyams thams cad bsdus la ni// bum pa'i sku gsung thugs la thim par bsam// bum pa'i nang du lha rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs su dbang
31a2
1yang bskur// nyi shu rtsa gcig 'phro 'du btang// rgyas dbang bdun po rab tu+u gces// ri lu gsum po bza' bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang yang thob// ces gsungs so/ khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po'i rgyud
31a3
1las/ tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de la/ karma he ru ka dang/ sha ba'i mgo can dang/ 'ug pa'i mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis/
31a4
1gang zhig mgon po ji ltar lags// ji ltar mgon po don ston phyir// stong pa'i ngang nyid ji ltar lags// e ma ho gsang ba'i bdag/ de skad ces dges nas zhus so/ khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ 'khor mgo
31a5
1brnyan gyis tshogs la/ gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho/ gsang sngags zab mo don chen 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas gang gis kyang// sngar 'das sangs rgyas ma gsungs la// phyis kyang gsung
31a6
1bar mi 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po khro bo gshin rje'i gshed kyi rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/// khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po'i rgyud rdzogs so////
31b1
1rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la nA tha tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
31b2
1'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po/ 'og min stug po bkod pa'i zhing khams na/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i gzhal yas khang/ rgya khyon dpag tu med pa na yum dang gnyis su med pa mnyam pa'i ngang la bzhugs
31b3
1so// yang de'i tshe de'i dus na/ karma he ru ka dang/ gzig gi mgo can dang/ khA ta'i mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs grangs med pa/ khyad par gyi bye brag rnam pa bsam gyi mi khyab par bzhugs so// gdug
31b4
1pa'i 'khor grangs med pa'i nang nas/ phrin las kyi mnga' bdag khro bo karma he ru kas/ yum gtun khung ma dang/ rol pa'i ngang tshul bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ sbyor
31b5
1ba'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags/ khro bo'i nga ro ji ltar lags// brda' yi phyag rgya ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ gsang ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ e ma ho
31b6
1rang bzhin khros pa yis// 'od dang 'bar ba 'phros pa yis// sangs rgyas dus gsum drag por bskul// de nyid ma bcos byang chub sems// de nyid gsang ba'i ngang tshul shar// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig skyes/
32a1
1khros pa'i phyag rgya bskyed rim bsgom// brda' yi phyag rgya phyag mtshan rnams// zhes gsungs so/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan
32a2
1'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po yis dbye ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// mi g.yo mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// smug nag gru gsum gdangs pa la// rtse mor me yi phung po 'bar// logs la pad+ma 'dab
32a3
1gsum pa// de yi dbus su bsam pa ni// me ri 'bar ba'i dbus su bsam// nyi ma zla ba 'od dang bcas// de yi steng du+u sa bon las// rang 'od sngags kyis gsal bar 'bar// de yi sku ni mi thung
32a4
1gzugs// shin tu lding la mkhrang bag chags// 'jigs pa rngam pa'i zhal gdangs shing// rkan sgra brdeb pas bred cing brgyal// gdug pa'i sngags rnams rab tu zlos// de 'dra'i sku nyid gsal ba las// ye
32a5
1shes sems dpa'i ting 'dzin blta// seng ldeng phur pa tshon gang la// dbang bskur byin brlabs gu gul bdug/ bzlas pa stong phrag drug tu bzlas// byas pas mtshan ma bzang po mthong// las la sbyar ba shes
32a6
1par bya// re ba nag po gang dang gang// de la gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// ming dang rus ni snying gar gzhug/ de la shes pa rab bstims la/ khugs pa'i mtshan ma byung ba dang// de la gdab pa'i las kyang
32b1
1bya// des ni nges par rlag par 'gyur// gdug pa'i sems dang bcas nas ni// snying ga'i 'od zer drag po yis// rab tu khros nas bskul ba'i tshe// lha klu gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro rnams// bdag gis bcol
32b2
1ba'i las rnams kun// gang yin gnas su phyin par 'gro// gdug pa'i rdzas ni thams cad la// zla ba gza' yis zin dus su// mtshon gyi dbab bya sha khrag dang// 'dre 'bros thang chu de rnams sbyar// mes rog
32b3
1shing shun nang du gtum// gsang sngags khri phrag gsum bzlas nas// de bstan mod la bred cing brgyal// 'jig rten khams su 'byer bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud las/ dbye
32b4
1ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des// bud med bu med pa la bu bslang ba ni/ phyi mchod phur dgod tshul bzhin bya// bum pa spos bdug
32b5
1rgyan gyis brgyan// sman lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// 'bru lnga snying po lnga yang blugs// pho brang dkyil du bum pa bzhag/ phur pa dgod cing lha tshogs bskyed// phur pa byin brlab gzhung bzhin bya// lcags sna lnga yi
32b6
1phur pa la// byin rlab bdun byas dbus su dgod// bsnyen pa'i phur pa spyi dang mthun// 'dzab kyi dus su yungs kar sngags bzlas la// bum par blugs shing bgegs kyang bskrad// tshogs mchod skabs su
33a1
1bgegs bkug la// bsnyen phur dril zhing rab tu gdab// lcags sna lnga yi phur pa yis// dgug gzhug bstim zhing phur pa gdab// bum pa chu yis dbang bskur bkru// bsgrub pa chen po'i dus
33a2
1dag tu// gdab dang hom dang zor dang gsum// mnan sreg 'phang ba'i las rnams rdzogs par bya// de yis 'grub par the tshom med/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud las/ bu bslang ba'i le'u ste gsum
33a3
1pa'o//// de nas gso ba'i las byed na/ phyi mchod nang mtshams mnga' gsol nas// thig gdab mtshon dgye phur bu dgod// ling+ga bca' zhing dgra bgegs dgug/ de la sngags drug rab tu gces/ khyi
33a4
1gu'i thod par ming bcug la// lha dbral dgug bstim dbang du bsdu// tshogs mchod skabs su dgug gzhug bya// bsnyen phur dril zhing gdab las bya// mnan bsreg 'phang dang gsum yang bsgrub// chung
33a5
1sri mal gyi 'og tu mnan// yang na them pa'i 'og tu mnan// mi g.yo mgon po'i phur bus gdab// rdo rje rgya gram lte bar sbyar// phrin las rnam bzhi'i bro yang brdung/ khro bo bcu ni rab tu gces// de ltar byas na
33a6
1'grub par 'gyur/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud las// sri'u gso ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ karma he ru ka dang/ gzig gi mgo can dang/ khwa ta'i mgo can dang/
33b1
1mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ khrag 'thung gi rgyal po gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i chos ji ltar 'byung lags/ zab mo'i don ji ltar 'byung lags/ gdug pa'i tshogs ji
33b2
1ltar 'dul lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byon par brdebs par tshul mthun bsrung// gsang sngags theg pa 'byung bar
33b3
1dkon// u+u dum wa ra ji bzhin no// sngar gyi sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis// gsang sngags 'bras bu'i 'khor lo bskor// de yi dus 'di ma gsungs te// phyis kyang gsung bar mi 'gyur ro// da lta rgyal po dza la
33b4
1gsungs// gsang ba'i bdag po 'dis gsungs so// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas 'khor rnams dgyes nas gsang ba'i bdag po khrag 'thung gi rgyal po 'jigs pa'i nga ro can tshogs kyi bdag po legs so zer
33b5
1zhing gyes so/ khro bo mig yo mgon po'i rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// khro bo mi g.yo mgon po'i rgyud rdzogs so////
33b6
1rgya gar skad du/ kro ta ha ya gr-I wa rA dza tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po rta mgrin gyi rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min chos
34a1
1kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ gru gsum e'i dkyil 'khor 'byams pa na/ btsun mo'i b+ha ga d+harma d+hA tu chos kyi 'byung gnas/ pad+ma bde ba can gyi zhing khams de na/ yum dang gnyis su med par lhun gyi
34a2
1sbyor ba la// pad+ma he ru ka dang/ byi la'i mgo can dang/ pu shud kyi mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ bcom ldan rdo rje'i ngang nyid
34a3
1las// gdug pa log lta gdul slad du// sngon gyi smon lam cher dgongs te// snying rje chen po bdag la ston// zhes bskul bas/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ sku gsung thugs
34a4
1su chud/ sku gsung thugs de nyid kyi ngang las/ smon lam gyi dbang gis rol pa'i cho 'phrul mang po byung ste/ rnam par gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ rang bzhin gyi ngang la bzhugs so/ de'i tshe yang
34a5
