1'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ thabs kyi sku mchog gsang ba'i ngang// rnam dag dri ma med pa'i 'od// yongs gsal ngang las sems can don/ khros pa'i sku mchog bstan du
34a6
1gsol// zhes rnam par bskul bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos bskul bar mkhyen nas/ khro bo rol pa'i phyag rgya bcas te/ gzugs sku rnam gnyis su bzhengs nas// gdug pa thams
34b1
1cad tshar bcad nas/ khrag 'thung gi tshogs dbang du bsdus nas bskyed pa'i rim pa la bzhugs so// rta mgrin gyi rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des// rta mgrin
34b2
1gyi ting nge 'dzin 'di gsungs so// rta mgrin rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ni// dmar nag gru gsum 'bar ba la// logs gsum zla gam gsum byas la// thod pa 'jigs pa gsum yang dgod// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab
34b3
1brgyad bri// dbus su klu yi rgyal po bsam// de steng sa bon gsal bltas la// 'od kyi 'phros pa'i 'od phung las// rang sngags sgra yis rab bskul bas// yongs su rdzogs pa'i skur gsal gyur// de rjes ye
34b4
1shes rjes dran pas// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// mchod cing bstim pa byas nas ni// sras mchog zangs ma'i sku mchog la// dbang bskur byin brlabs byas nas ni// bdag nyid mdun na gnas
34b5
1par brtag/ snying po rang sngags bkod nas ni// bzlas pa khri phrag gcig tu bya// de nas las la myur du sbyar// khros pa'i sems kyis blangs pa ni// grog ma rgyal po'i mkhar sa blang// sdong po rkang gcig thang
34b6
1chus sbru// gzugs brnyan sor brgyad tshad du bya// klu yi rgyal po'i khar bcug la// de la dgu gcing bstim pa yin// de nas phur pa gdab pa brtsam// sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'ablig par 'gyur// sems can phal
35a1
1pa smos ci dgos// bum pa bzang po bstar byas la// nang du bdud rtsi lnga yang blug/ de yi nang du yig 'bru dgod// de la bdud rtsis gang bar bsam// de nas maN+Dal pad+ma bya// de steng dmigs pa
35a2
1de bzhag la// sngaun la steng gi sgo bzhir gtug/ de nas tshangs pa'i bu ga nas// bdud rtsi chu rgyun blugs nas ni// lus la dug rnams mi gnas par// 'og gi sgo nas dbyung bar bsam// de ltar yang dang yang
35a3
1byas pas// dug rnams nges par 'joms par byed// thal chen mtshan ma gdong la gdab// thal chen yungs kar bsres byas la// spyan bzlog bltas la drag sngags bzlas// de yis ser ba nges par
35a4
1bzlog/ pad+ma'i snod du bdud rtsi lnga// de steng sman lnga byugs nas ni// bzlas pa stong phrag brgyad du bya// de nas sman rnams dar khrud btum// spyi bo dag tu bzhag nas ni// 'jigs pa'i gnas nas thar bar
35a5
1nges/ khro bo rta mgrin rgyal po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor dbye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des// gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di phye ste/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM
35a6
1hUM hUM hUM hU~M/// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA rA hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ni la daN+Da hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya ya tsa la hUM/ oM badzra krod+ha ha ya gr-I ba
35b1
1hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi te hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mri ta kuN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI dI pa ya ti hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI lA se ki hUM/ oM badzra kro d+hI dza na pa ta hUM/
35b2

35b3
1phaT/ oM phaT Ta dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ spu ta spu ta/ spu ta ya spu ta ya/ sarba nA ga b+ha ba ma Ni pa ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba duSh+tAM hri da ya/ sho d+ha re hUM hUM phaT/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ a b+hi Shi ny+tsa tu mAM/ 'khor gyi sngags
35b4
1rnams tshul bzhin du/ d+hU pe/ puSh+pe/ A lo ke gan d+he/ lA s+ye hUM/ mA le trAM/ gIr ti hrIH ni rati AH sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a mr-i ta/ ma hA a mr-i ta swA hA/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ta a nu rA ga na badzra swa b+hU wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/
35b5
1oM na maHsarba ta thA ga to hri da a nu ta na a na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga to pU tsa dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ badzra g+haN+De hoH oM laM/ A laM/ hUM
35b6
1laM/ s+t+waM b+ha ni/ mo ha ga ya b+ha ga bAn/ shrI tri bi gri/ badzra hUM kA ra hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ oM sarba big+ha nAn/ kI la ya hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ A+oM badzra hUM kA ra hUM A/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha badzra hUM
36a1
1phaT/ bin d+ha bin d+ha hUM badzra hUM phaT/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na badzra hUM phaT/ ha na ha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM ta tha ya ta tha ya badzra hUM phaT/ ha sa ya hri badzra hUM phaT// shI g+h+raM A na ya badzra hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya
36a2
1badzra hUM phaT/ A be sha ya a be sha ya badzra hUM phaT/ b+hin d+ha ya b+hin d+ha ya badzra hUM phaT/ da ha da ha badzra hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra hUM phaT/ ma tha ma tha badzra hUM phaT/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra hUM phaT/ su ru su ru badzra hUM phaT/ mu ru
36a3
1mu ru badzra hUM phaT/ ka TaM ka Ta ye/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te mA ra se na pra mar d+ha na ye badzra hUM phaT/ hU~M ma ma pa shaM ku ru ma taM ka ra i dan te/ ma ma karma shI g+h+raM ka ta swA hA/ oM badzra A na ya badzra hUM phaT/ tad+ya thA badzra hUM
36a4
1phaT/ oM su ru su ru hUM phaT/ uts+tsha Sh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ hUM ya hUM ya phu phu nA ga nA ga dum pa li phaT/ shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ pu+iSh+taM ku ru swA hA/ ba shaM ku ru sA hA/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ btu ba'i yi ge gzhan du brjod// rta mgrin rgyal
36a5
1po'i rgyu las/ sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dpal khrag 'thung gis sa bdag bsrung ba bstan te/ gang nas gnod pa'i sa phyogs nas// sa blang sbal pa'i gzugs byas te// de la gla rtsi lan tshwa
36a6
1dang// skye tshe khrag skam gzugs byas la// shog bur sbal pa'i gzugs bris la// de yi mtha' la 'khor lo rtsibs drug bri// de la gab pa'i sngags drug bri// mgo bo yan lag 'bru dgus bskor// 'doms su mA
36b1
1ra sa na bri// snying gar srung ma gsum gyi sngags bris la// g.yas su hUM la g.yon du phaT// mtha' ma khro bcu'i sngags kyi bskor// sa chog sngon 'gro mtshams gcad bya// bsnyen bsgrub gnad sreg 'phang dang
36b2
1gdab// sgrub pa chen po'i bka' bzhin bya'o// gnod tshab chung la rang sngags bsrungs// gnod tshabs che na gdab las bya// de ltar byas na the tshom med// rta mgrin rgyal po'i rgyud las/ sa bdag bsrung ba'i
36b3
1le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa'i don bstan te// lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba la// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu rab tu bstan// chos kyi
36b4
1'khor lo bcu drug po// longs spyod 'khor lo rlabs chen po// bcu drug cha la mnyam par bsgom// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ni// so gnyis par ni rab tu bshad// g.yas pa'i rtsa ni byang chub sems// g.yon
36b5
1pa'i rtsa ni mi mthong bkra// dbus ni d+hu ma a ba d+hU// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la// ming gi yi ge so gnyis dgod// chos dang longs spyod 'khor lo la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dgod// lte ba shes rab
36b6
1'khor lo la// a thung bcu gnyis mtha' ma A// ma bsgoms ser la bsgoms pas dmar// dz+wa la raM gyis me sbar la// dbab dang bzlog pa tshul bzhin bya// gsang ba'i dbang chen de ru bskur// shes rab
37a1
1ye shes dbang rnams ni// dga' ba bzhi yi nyams myong skyed// las bzhi'i bud med gang yang shis// byang chub sems kyi lam la 'jug/ mnyam pa chen po'i ngang la gnas// rta mgrin rgyal po'i
37a2
1rgyud las/ rdzogs rim gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ karma he ru ka la sogs te/ 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma ho/ bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags// rdzogs
37a3
1pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags// sngags kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskyed pa'i rim pa hUM las spro// rdzogs pa'i rim pa
37a4
1a la bsdu// sngags kyi mtshan nyid bzhi ru dbye// mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid ngang la bzhag/ ces gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams dgyes nas/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bstod do// mngon
37a5
1rdzogs rgyal po yab la bstod// khrag 'thung snying rje rgyal la bstod// gsung mchog rgyal po khyod la bstod// ma dpung chas brgyad khyod la bstod// ces bstod do/ khro bo rta mgrin gyi rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su
37a6
1gtad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// khro bo rta mgrin gyi rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha rA dza a pa rA dza ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyud/
37b1
1dpal khrag 'thung 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rngam pa'i rgyal po/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang
37b2
1na// gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pa'i gnas dur khrod chen po keng rus kyi gzhal yas khang/ ru tra bsnol ba'i gdan stengs na/ yum dang gnyis su med par phyag rgya'i rol pa mdzad de/ karma he ru ka dang/ spyang
37b3
1ki'i mgo can dang/ khra'i mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs mtha' dag gis/ gtso bo la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ 'khor bar 'khyams pa'i snying rje ni// thugs rje smon lam mtha' yi dbang// ma
37b4
1bsgribs gsal ba'i ngang nyid las// sku mchog 'bar ba bstan du+u gsol// zhes rnam par bskul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ cho 'phrul dbang gi snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
37b5
1bzhugs te/ skad cig la gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin sprul te 'gro ba sems can gyi don la bzhengs so// de nas yang de'i tshe// 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// thabs kyi
37b6
1sku mchog gsang ba'i ngang/ khros pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// 'gro ba'i don la rab tu dgongs// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ sku gsung thugs su chud de 'od zer
38a1
1gyi ngang las gdug pa thams cad bsgral ba'i ched du/ thugs rje'i dbang gis khro bo'i skur sprul nas/ ye shes lngas don mdzad do// de'i tshe gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad rab tu sngangs par gyur
38a2
1to// de nas yang sku khro bo'i rgyal po'i ngang las cho 'phrul gyis dkyil 'khor bstan par gsungs so/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang khrag 'thung gi rgyal
38a3
1po des/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan te/ gzhan gyis mi thub dkyil 'khor ni// las kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri// de yi dbus kyi lte ba la// ser nag gru gsum 'od dang bcas// de dbus
38a4
1bsam par bya ba ni// rlung gi phung po'i steng du ni// rang gi sa bon nyi zla'i steng// rang gi sngags 'od de bzlas pas// gzhan gyi mi thub skur gsal gyur// de la dbang byin thams cad kun// rgyas par gzhan
38a5
1bzhin bya ba yin// dur khrod rkang gi phur pa la// rgyus chen dag gis gdags par bya// gsang ba'i yig bkod bzlas pa bya// nyi khrir bzla bar bya ba dang// de las mtshan ma bzang po 'byung// de nas las la
38a6
1sbyar bar bya// dur khrod g.yam pa g.yas phyogs blangs// mtshan ma ming dang bcas pa bri// rgyus chen ske nas btags la bzhag/ de la dgug gzhug bya ba yin/ khug nas las la sbyar bar bya// de yis bsad
38b1
1pa yud kyis ni// mod la nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi dus su bskul bar bya// phur pa dril te phyogs bcur gtad// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sngon gyi thugs dam zhal bzhes pa// drag
38b2
1po'i las rnams bya ba ni// nyid kyi zhal bzhes ma 'da' bar// gdug can sgrol ba'i dus la bab// de skad bskul bas rang dbang med// drag po'i las kyis bsod par byed// log par bar du gcod pa
38b3
1yis// 'byung po'i gdon rnams bzung bar bya// dur khrod g.yam pa'i nang logs su// bse shing zho can gzugs bris la// rgya gram lam du de mnan na// gdon dang 'byung pos tshugs mi 'gyur// 'di ni las
38b4
1kyi mchog ces bya'o/ khro bo gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor dbye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ phyugs kyi gdon bsrung ba gsungs te/ phyugs kyi gdon
38b5
1rnams bsrung ba yang// re'u lcag thar nu zho can thams cad la// gang la gnod pa'i phyugs gzugs bya// ming yang bris la snying gar gzhug/ gdon ni smug nag kham sa'am// thal ba 'am ni gang rung
38b6
1la// gzugs rnams rab tu bya bar gsungs// bsnyen bsgrub tshul bzhin tshogs kyis mchod// gdab las drag po rab tu gsungs// mnan sreg 'phang gsum bka' bzhin bya'o// phan par 'gyur ba the tshom
39a1
1med/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud las/ phan bya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos cho 'phrul bstan pa'i las gsungs te/ wa dang spyang
39a2
1ki'i gzugs byas la// 'bru sna bdun la bya bar gsungs// don snying gang rnyed khog tu gzhug/ gang yin pa yi spu yis spras// ltas ngan drag po'i sgro bzhi gzug/ bsnyen pa sgrub pa sgrub chen po// gong du bstan pa
39a3
1bsnyen pa'o// dza gad mchod pa skabs kyis sbyar// sgrub pa gnyis pa 'bru dgu gces// dz+wa la pa ya mtha' la gdags// dgra la ltas ngan dbab par bsam// bstod pa'i gzhug la rbad pa'i las// rtags dang
39a4
1mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub gsol// dgra phyogs bstan cing smon lam gdab// dgra yi phyogs su kha bstan la// dgra yi khang pa'i rmang du gzhug/ de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// khro bo
39a5
1gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud las// cho 'phrul ltas ngan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de la 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma ho/ bsgral
39a6
1ba'i don phyir ji ltar lags// dam tshig don rnams ji ltar lags// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal
39b1
1pos/ phyag rgya bcings grol gyi gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ e ma ho/ gal te ngan song gsum po nas// thar bar gyur kyang rU trar skyes// sems can 'tshe zhing srog gcod pas// dam tshig blangs te
39b2
1bsgral bar bya'o// las kyi 'khor ba yin par bshad// gsang ba zab mo'i mdo 'di ni// gzhag par bya ba'i snod kyang dkon// zhes gsungs so/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad
39b3
1pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// khro bo gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha kuN+Da li a mr-i ta tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rgyud/ dpal
39b4
1khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po yis/ 'og min gyi gnas gzhi mtha' dang dbus med pa/ mi 'gyur ba'i mkha'
39b5
1klong rnam par dag pa'i gzhal yas khang na/ yum dang gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i ngang la bzhugs pa'i tshe/ karma he ru ka dang/ seng ge'i mgo can dang/ pha wang gi mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs dang yum
39b6
1'thor byed mas 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma ho// gsang ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba yis// gdug pa 'joms pa'i drag po 'di// rol pa'i gdangs sgra 'jigs pa'i sku/ khros pa'i sku mchog bdag la ston// zhes
40a1
1rnam par bskul bas/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ bskul ba thugs su chud de/ 'od zer gyi ngang la gdug pa can thams cad bsgral nas/ cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin las
40a2
1bzhengs te/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ bdud rtsi 'khyil
40a3
1ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// ljang nag gru gsum 'bar ba yi// mtha' ma mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor// rab tu 'od dang ldan par bri// de yi dbus su bsam bya
40a4
1ba// rlung gi gdan nyid bsam par bya// de yi steng du nyi zla'i gdan// de steng brdzus skyes rim pa yis// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa rab rdzogs par// de la dkyil 'khor rab bcug ste// de yis thams cad ldan par
40a5
1'gyur// dung gi phur pa tshon gang ba// rab rdzogs byang chub sems las phyung// byang chub sems kyis de dbang bskur// bzlas pa khri phrag gcig tu bya// de nas stag pa'i lo ma la// byang chub sems ni yub yum
40a6
1gyis// de yi mtshan ma bri gsal bar// byas la gsang ba'i gnas su'o// de la gdab par byas nas ni// nges par dmigs pa de brlag 'gyur// dus gsum sangs rgyas des bskul na// sems can kun la ngo
40b1
1bo nyid// rab tu shes nas don rnams mdzad// dur khrod zhing gi ras ma la// sha ba'i 'khor lo rab brtsams la// de yi steng du+u gzugs brnyan bya// bzlas pa khri phrag gsum du bzla// de la rlung gi dkyil 'khor
40b2
1bskyed// la las khrid de la las brdeg/ de yis lho phyogs bskyal la bzhag/ yang na rang gi gnas su bskyal// dur khrod dbus su de bcug na// de yis gnas la bskyod par nges// gu gul sbyar ma bzang po
40b3
1la// gsang ba'i sngags kyis rab btab ste/ khros pa'i sems su gnas byas te// dur khrod me chen rab sbar na// gdon dang 'byung po ma rungs dang// mu stegs lha rnams bred cing brgyal// 'di ni bdug pa'i
40b4
1mchog yin no/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor dbye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i don 'di gsungs te/ dkyil
40b5
1'khor pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// dbus su sngags kyi bdag po dgod// 'dab brgyad so so'i lha rnams dgod// dbus su bam chen bsgyil la bsgrub// cho 'phrul rtags 'byin rdo rje ka pA la// bkra shis mi 'gyur rdo
40b6
1rje ka pA la// dngos grub rtags 'byin rdo rje ka pA la// bkra shis mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA la// yang na rus sbal khog pa ru// yang na ce spyang thod pa ru// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga yang blugs// skyobs ni bdud rtsi'i rgyud
41a1
1las grags// rtsa ba brgyad la yan lag stong// spyi yi brgyad dang nang gi brgyad// gsang ba'i brgyad dang mthar thug brgyad// yal ga rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mnyam/ kha dog rigs kyis shes par
41a2
1bya// bdud rtsi chen po'i ril bu bya// bsnyen bsgrub gsum gyi rim bu sbyang// gsang sngags gzhug la a mri ta// sngags rnams rab tu bzlas pa gces// de nas rnal 'byor dngos grub blang// ril bu chen po
41a3
1bza' bar bya// bcud len dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bdar la zhi khro'i lha la gtor// bdud rtsi mchog sgrub ces bya'o/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud las// bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum
41a4
1pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ gtor ma gtong ba 'di gsungs te// rin chen snod du gtor bsags la// raM yaM khaM gis bsreg sbyang bya// gtor ma stong pa nyid du
41a5
1bsam// gtor ma'i nang du hUM gcig bsam// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis khro bor bsam// hUM gnyis khro bcu sras dang bcas// hUM las mi bzad phur pa drug/ dzaHhUM baM hoH spyan yang drangs// mgron gyi lha rnams spyan
41a6
1drangs shing// hUM hUM hUM gis bstim par bya// oM AHhUM gsum gyis byin brlabs la// 'dod yon drug gi lha mor bsam// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis mgo drangs la// badzra yak+Shas dbul bar bya// phrin las bcol ba'i
41b1
1tshig gis bskul// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlog/ thal mo brdab cing phrin las bcol// de ltar rtag tu byas pa na// mkha'
41b2
1'gro rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud las/ gtor ma'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ sems kyi don bstan te/ sems ni chos kyi
41b3
1dbyings nyid las// cir yang snang ba cir yang med// chos nyid yang dag rdo rje 'dra// ma bcos chos nyid mnyam pa nyid// ma rtogs pa yi sems can la// zhi ba dbang dang drag po dang// rgyas pa la sogs mang du
41b4
1bstan// byang chub sems gyi rang bzhin te// zhi ba yang ni byang chub sems/ khro bo yang ni byang chub sems// rtogs pa rnams la dbang chen po// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na// zhi khro rang gi byang chub
41b5
1sems// rtogs na rang dbang chen po thob// 'dus pa thams cad mi rtag pa'o// 'dod na chos kyi dbyings su 'dod kyang nga ru 'dzin// chags na sku dang ye shes gnyis la chags kyang 'dod chags rgyu// zhen na sku
41b6
1dang ye shes gnyis la zhen kyang 'khor ba'i rgyu// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// chags pa med la zhe 'dod med// mnyam pa nyid du bzhag pa ni// thams cad mi 'gyur gtor ma yin/ ye grub yang// sems
42a1
1rnams thams cad chos nyid do// nyon mongs bdud la ye shes rtsi// bdud rtsi zhes kyang de la bya// thams cad chos nyid ngang la gnas// chos kyi dbyings las g.yos pa med/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil
42a2
1pa'i rgyud las/ lta ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ karma he ru ka la sogs te/ 'khor rnams dgyes nas 'di skad ces zhus so// e ma ho khrag 'thung rgyal po
42a3
1legs so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyi bstan bzhin du/ khyed kyi thugs rje'i byin rlab kyis// bdag la rab tu bshad pa'o// ma dag 'khor ba'i don du ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la lung bstan du
42a4
1gsol// bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la yas// karma he ru ka'i tshig gsan nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho/ bde ba slad ma'i lung ston yin// gdug pa slad kyi tshar gcod yin// ye shes sprul pa'i
42a5
1sku mchog yin// spros med mkhyen pa'i thugs mchog yin// zhes bka' stsal to/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su btad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rgyud rdzogs
42a6
1so////
42b1
1rgya gar skad du/ krod+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
42b2
1bcom ldan 'das khros pa'i mnga' bdag tu gyur pa'i rgyal po/ 'jigs pa'i sku phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur nas/ khros pa'i gsung drag po'i gdangs sgras thams cad
42b3
1zil gyis gnon pa'i rang bzhin yongs su dag par bzhugs te/ 'og min gyi gnas zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang na/ rtag tu yum dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te/ 'khor
42b4
1karma he ru ka dang/ dred mo'i mgo can dang// sre mo'i mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces zhus so/ e ma ho// de nyid ma bcos byang chub sems// de nyid gsal ba'i ngang du shar// gdug
42b5
1pa'i mi rnams lhan ne'o/ khros pa'i bdag po mi gnas pa'i// thams cad don dam byang chub sems// zhes gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos bskul bar thugs su chud de/ lan
42b6
1'di gsungs so// e ma ho// rmad du byung ba gsang ba'i bka'// gsang ba bdag la gos pa med// ga bur dri ldan rgyun mi gcod// ces gsungs so// de'i tshe log pa'i nga rgyal can gyi ma dang bu
43a1
1mo'i tshogs thams cad chags pa'i sems skyes par gyur to// de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal po sbyor sgrol gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te cho 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor thugs la bton nas 'gro ba'i don
43a2
1mdzad do/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ phrin las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ khams
43a3
1gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor ni// mthing nag gru gsum mi bzad pa// rab tu 'bar ba'i me yis bskor// sor bzhi nang du brkos gyur pa// de yi nang du bzhag pa'i rdzas// dpag bsam shing lo blangs nas
43a4
1ni// rab tu gtub cing sngags mang bzlas// de nas grog mkhar sa dang bsre// bong bu'i bdud rtsi gzugs sbrus te// shing shun ming rus gis bris la// snying gar blan te bzlas pas 'grub// de yi steng du bsam
43a5
1pa'i lha// sa bon 'od las de skyes par// mkhas pas shes par bya ba yin// de la thams cad rdzogs par bya// rabs chad rkang gi phur pa la// bzlas pa khri phrag gsum du bya// de nas mtshan ma mthong ba
43a6
1dang// gdab pa'i las rnams bya ba ni// de nas gtubs dang bstab brdung la// kun la de bzhin shes par gyis// 'di yis gsad pa nges par 'gyur/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/
43b1
1dkyil 'khor dbye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ gsad pa'i las rnams 'di gsungs so// zhing chen ras ma'i dum bu la// rtsibs drug 'khor lo
43b2
1sngags drug bri// tshil chen dud pas snag tsha bya// lag thur dag gis smyug gu bya// bri ba'i dus ni nyi ma rlungs slu+u bas byung dang zla ba rta// yang na smin drug sa 'og song// de yi dus su bri bar bya// gro ga shing shun
43b3
1ras dag la// dgra bo'i ming byang bri bar bya// dpral bar rus la snying gar ming// g.yas su hUM la g.yon du phaT// 'doms su mA ra ya zhes bris// yan lag bzhi la 'byung chen bzhi// tha ma 'bru dgus bskor
43b4
1bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su bcu gnas ni// mon pa pho mo'i thod pa ru// 'khor lo'i sngags drug gong ma bzhin// thod pa ga'u kha sbyar du// dgra yi ming dang 'khor lo gzhug/ seng ldeng phur pa sor bzhi
43b5
1la// ming byang 'khor lo'i dbus su gdab// gru gsum e yi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su ga'u kha sbyar bzhag/ g.yon du 'gugs pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// g.yas su gsang ba'i mA ra ya// lcags kyu can gyis
43b6
1dgug byas la// bsnyen phur ngag gis gdab par bya// rtsa sngags las sngags rab tu gces// sngags drug 'phyong gi 'khor lo bskor// mtshan ma bzang po byung ba dang// zla ba bdun gyis 'grub par
44a1
1byed// gang la btab kyang thogs pa med// ces gsungs so/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ srog gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag
44a2
1'thung gi rgyal pos/ bla dang lha 'dre rgyu ba'i don bstan te// sha ba glang ba srod la rgyu// lug dang snyan gnyis nam phyed rgyu// phag gi bla ni tho rangs rgyu// byi ba nyi ma'i rtse la rgyu// rta ni nyi ma phyed na rgyu// ra ni nyi ma
44a3
1nub na rgyu// g.yag dang glang ni sa sros rgyu// 'tsho bar byed pa yul lha ste// skyob par byed pa dgra lha'o// 'gegs par byed pa ma sman yin// 'go ba ban bon srung ma yin// srung bar byed pa srog lha'o// tho
44a4
1rangs lha 'dre rgyal po rgyu// nyi ma'i rtse la dgra lha rgyu// nyin phyed dros nas dmag dpon rgyu// sa rnams tshab tshub btsan yang rgyu// srod kyi dus su bdud kyang rgyu// nam gyi gung la gshin rje rgyu// nam phyed dus su ma
44a5
1mo rgyu// rgyu ba'i dus su drag sngags brdeg/ las sbyor dag ni brtsams par bya/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ lha 'dre dang bla rgyu ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das
44a6
1khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ drag sngags kyi don 'di bstan to// a ni sku yi snying po ste// lus ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// ka ni gsung gi snying po ste// ngag ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// tsa ni thugs kyi snying
44b1
1po ste// yid ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// mA ra bdud kyi bu mo ste// 'di ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// sa ni gza' yi bu mo ste// 'di ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// pra ni btsan gyi bu mo ste// yid ni sgrol
44b2
1ba'i drag sngags yin// nA ni klu yi snying po ste// 'di ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// ta ni ming po dag yin te// 'di ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// ru ru ka tang sho na ste// ma mo sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// ru
44b3
1ni rak+sha srin po yin// bdag nyid ma yi drag sngags yin// ya ni bdud kyi drag sngags yin// ka ni rgyal po'i drag sngags yin// hUM ni thams cad dbang du sdud// phaT ni sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// ma ma nag mo
44b4
1dag nyid de// ba ni srog gcod drag sngags yin// ma tang bsen mo dag nyid de// i nan mnan pa drag sngags te// da d+hi sho na bdag nyid de// karma phrin las drag sngags yin// shI g+h+raM gying chen dag yin te// ka
44b5
1ra sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// ya ni 'chi bdag bdud yin te// hUM phaT sgrol ba'i drag sngags yin// oM dang badzra kI la ya// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags su bstan// yang na 'chi bdag bdud kyi sngags// sarba
44b6
1sgrol byed ging g-i sngags// big nan 'gugs byed ma mo'i sngags// baM ni 'brub khung las kyi sngags// oM ni thams cad dbang du sdud// phaT ni thams cad sgrol ba'i sngags// sngags drug ye shes lha drug
45a1
1pos// las sbyor dag tu sngags drug pos// 'jig rten drug tu dgye bar gsungs// dang po mgo nas a ru gnas// dbu ma na ro zhabs su bstan// dang po ha ru rab ldan te// dbu zhabs bskyed
45a2
1pa'i tshul du gnas// i ang thig le a ru bstan// dbu ma mtha' ru rab ldan zhing// dbu dang zhabs skyed ha he bsdu// rtsa sngags las sngags bsdu zhing bsdu// bskyed pa rgyun gyi sngags su bsgom/ bskul ba rbad
45a3
1dang bzlas dang gsum// don gyi yi ge bsdu ba'o/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ drag sngags kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ bu mo
45a4
1dgug pa'i las bstan te/ gnas khang tshul dang ldan pa ru// dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad bris byas la// rdzas dgram phur pa dgod nas ni// bsnyen phur dag la zhag bdun bzlas// rang gi smin dbrag dag tu
45a5
1ni// tsan+dan lde gus 'khor lo drug kyang bri/ 'khor lo drug la sngags drug bri// dbus kyi lte bar 'bru dgu bri// mtha' ma khro bcur shes par bya'o// rnal 'byor rang nyid bsgom pa'i dus// lag pa g.yas pa bri
45a6
1bar gsungs// rang nyid khams gsum rnam rgyal bsgom// bsgrub pa thon pa'i nang bar de/ kha ru spo ni so cha mur// mya ngan med kyi grib ma la// rtsa sngags gzhug la sngags drug bzlas// 'bru dgu don gyi mgo la
45b1
1dril// lha dang klu yi bu mo dang// 'khor lo mthong tshad gam du 'ong// gsang ba'i dbang bskur spyod pa brtsam// phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par
45b2
1rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ bu mo dkug pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po de la/ karma he ru ka dang/ dred kyi mgo can dang/ sre mo'i mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs
45b3
1dgyes nas gsungs gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ji ltar khrag 'thung rgyal po lags// ji ltar khro bo'i rgyal po lags// ji ltar dus gsum rgyal po lags// ji ltar chos nyid rgyal po lags// zhes
45b4
1gsol pas/ 'khor rnams la khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga ni 'khor ba zhal du rngub// nga ni dus gsum rtsad nas gcod// nga ni log rtog tshar gcod cing// nga ni dus gsum 'gyur
45b5
1ba med// ces gsungs pas 'khor rnams dges nas legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ slar mnyam pa'i ngang la thim mo/ khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun
45b6
1pa'o// khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud rdzogs so////
46a1
1rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha ma hA ba la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud/ dpal khrag 'thung rol pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ khrag 'thung rol
46a2
1pa'i rgyal po/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ phyi nang med pa'i zhal thal le gzigs pa'i gzhal yas khang pad+ma b+ha ga'i gdan stengs na/ rin po che rnam lnga spras pa'i phyogs bzhi nas ye shes bzhi'i sgo
46a3
1shar cing/ lha dang lha mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang rol par mdzad cing bzhugs pa'i gnas de na yum dang gnyis su med pa'i rol pa mdzad cing bzhugs so// 'khor karma he ru ka dang/ dom gyi mgo can dang/
46a4
1byi ba'i mgo can dang/ mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis 'di skad ces zhus so// 'khor gyi mtshan nyid gang gsung lags// rol pa'i phrin las gang gsung lags// gdug pa log lta gdul slad du// snying rje chen pos
46a5
1bdag la ston// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ phyi nang du snang ba thams cad la khros pa'i spyan gyis so sor bye drag tu gzigs so// de nas yum la snyoms par zhugs
46a6
1te/ mnyam pa'i ngang las khro bo'i skur sprul te/ gdug pa can gyi tshogs rnams la yang rnam par gzigs so// log pa'i lam rnams la yang rnam par gzigs so// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
46b1
1rnams la yang rnam par gzigs so// de nas 'gro ba sems can gyi don la 'khor rnams kyis bskul bar rab tu brtsam nas dkyil 'khor gyi las la zhugs par gyur to/ khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud las gleng
46b2
1gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas yang dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ dkyil 'khor gyi don gsungs te/ stobs po che yi dkyil 'khor ni// las kyi rdo rje rgya gram la/ kha dog sngon po 'od dang bcas// de yi lte
46b3
1ba gru bzhi la// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba bri// pad+ma kha dog lnga dang ldan// rdo rje ra ba'i bar du bri// de yi nang du bsam bya ba// sbrang rtsi'i snyigs ma las gzugs bya// gro ga shing shun gang dang gang// dur
46b4
1khrod ro yi khrag gis ni// ming dang rus gnyis bris nas ni// dpral bar ming ni bslan par bya// snying gar gru gsum rab brus la// de ru gzugs dang rus su bcas// bcug la bzhag par bya ba yin// de yi
46b5
1steng du bsam pa'i lha// sa 'og las ni skur bzhengs la// rdo rje cho ga gsum gyis gsal// sku ni sngon po 'bar bas 'khrigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs kyang gnyis// phyag g.yas rdo rje chen po
46b6
1'bar// g.yon pa sdig pa'i mdzub mo ston// skra ser gyen 'khyil sbrul gyis brgyan// spyan bzlog gsum gzigs zhal gdangs nas// smin ma rab btegs ag tsom 'bar// stag lpags g.yang
47a1
1gzhi'i gam thabs can// ye shes me dpung rang nyid bsgom// de yi sbyor ba rab btang nas// dgug ste gzugs la phabs nas ni// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// sngon dmar skud pas sbrel la
47a2
1bzhag/ bsrung ba'i lha dang phye phral la/ sngags kyi 'od zer ma rungs pas// gzung [\[]gzugs [\]]phung rab tu 'jigs par bsam// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs las byung// bzlas grangs khri phrag gsum du
47a3
1bzlas// dus dus su ni phur pas bsdigs// yungs dkar thogs la sngags bzlas la// gzugs brnyan de la brdeg par bya// thugs kyis sa bon 'od zer gyis// las gang byed pa nyid du brtag/ dus bzhir
47a4
1dgug cing bstims par bya// mtshan ma bzang po byung ba dang// gnas lnga dag tu gdab par bya// mtshon gyis gtubs la zhal du bstabs// de yis las la nges par ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom
47a5
1med// sems can tsha bas gdung ba la// char pa'i rgyun rnams rab dbab na// gzhal yas gsal ba'i dbus su pad// de steng nyi ma zla ba bsam// thabs dang shes rab mthu yis gsal// de gnyis dbus su
47a6
1bsam bya ba// sbrul gyi chen po'i gdan du bsam// de steng bdag po'i gzugs bsam te// de las 'od 'phros slar 'dus pas// bdag po'i dngos gzhi rab zhu ste// mi shigs don ldan nyid du brtag/ de las
47b1
1'phros 'od slar 'dus pas// chos dbyings gzugs brnyan nyid du ste// de la sngags 'di sku ltar byung// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM ma hA ba la hUM// gsang sngags brjod pas sku ru gyur// dbu gsum phyag drug rgyan dang
47b2
1ldan// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar// dbus ma dud kha lta bu ste// g.yas g.yon rdo rje b+han+d+ha'o// bar ma tho ba lcags kyu'o// tha ma 'dul ba'i phyag rgya bsnams// thugs ka'i hUM las 'bar bar
47b3
1bskyed// sgra'am grib ma'i tshul du bsam// de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa dang// ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya// ting 'dzin sems las 'od 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba spyan drangs te// bdag gi
47b4
1gtsug tu bzhugs par brtag/ de la bskor na lan gsum bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// de rjes dbang rnams tshang bar nod// de nas rang bzhin gnas su gshegs// thabs dang shes rab khyad
47b5
1par las// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dud// ka ra bI ra'i phur bu'o// sbrul brgyan phur bu'i gdan la bzhugs// sa bon rnams kyis rnam par
47b6
1mtshan// sgo bzhi gzhan la de bzhin yin// yab yum thabs dang shes rab kyis// bskyed pa'i sngags kyis rab bskul nas// yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje g.yab mos g.yab nas ni// ye shes
48a1
1dkyil 'khor spyan yang drangs// dgug dang gzhug dang bstims pa ste// brtan par byas la mchod rdzogs bya// bstod pa byas la bzlas par gzhug/ snying ga'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas// 'og gi klu
48a2
1rnams bkug nas ni// bdag gi zhabs 'og tshud par bsam// de la bzlas pa'i snying po 'di'o// oM s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga ta la phaT/ nA ga nA ga dun dun/ hr-i da ya phaT/ de ltar sngags 'di khri phrag
48a3
1gcig/ rab tu drag par 'di bzlas na// klu rnams rab tu skrag 'gyur te// char gyi rgyun rnams 'bebs par brtag/ de yi mtshan ma bstan pa ni// nyams thag 'o dod 'bod pa'am// sbel gcod skams pa mthong
48a4
1ba dang// de nas las la sbyar bar bya'o// chu mig gnyan po'i khar song la// klu rnams sna tshogs gtor ma bshams// de la ba dmar 'o ma sbreng// hUM/ ston pa nga yi bka' bsgo yis// klu chen brgyad la sogs pa
48a5
1yi// ba su ri drug 'dir 'dus shig/ so so'i gnas nas bskul bar bsam// bdag gi thad kar 'dus nas ni// ji ltar bgyi zhes zer bar bsam// nga yi gtor ma 'di long la// sems can tsha bas gdung
48a6
1ba la// char pa'i rgyun rnams dbab tu gsol// gtor bsngos tshig bshad 'di yang brjod// gal te char pa mi 'bebs na// ka ra bI ra'i rgya lcags gis// gzugs phung thal ba bzhin du ni// brlag par 'gyur
48b1
1te gdon mi za// nA ga tsit+ta sa ma ya s+t+waM// sngags kyis gnad la bor ba yis// char kyi rgyun rnams nges par 'beb// gal te char pa ma ster na// dur khrod ras ma blangs nas su// rang byung me tog se 'us
48b2
1byug/ ldong ros ser pos 'khor lo bri// 'khor lo'i dbus su stobs chen bri// zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon rgya lcags// sngags rnams bzlas zhing klu la brab// 'khor lo'i rtsibs
48b3
1la sngags 'di'o// dang por s+pho Ta tha mar phaT// de ltar yi ge brgya pa yis// 'og gi 'khor lo'i yi ge bskul// 'og gi 'khor lo 'dab brgyad dbus// klu gzugs dbu gsum sbrul mgo drug/ g.yas pa ut+pal
48b4
1g.yon pa pad// 'khor lo pad+ma'i rtsibs dag la// NaN gyis mgo byas la phaT kyi bzhug/ de ltar yi ge bcu drug dang// rang snying sa bon de rnams kyis// 'od kyi klu rnams bsreg par bsam// dang pos dgug
48b5
1dang gnyis pas bstim// tha mas gzir te lcags kyis naN byung brab// de ltar byas na klu rnams kun// shin tu skrag cing sngangs 'gyur te// rgya mtsho'i rlabs nas char gyi rgyun// shin tu rlabs nas phebs par
48b6
1byed// de yis 'ong bar gdon mi za// gtor ma bsngos la 'khor lo bkru// ba dmar ra dkar 'o mas gso// klu sman rnams kyis klu rnams gso// gal te char pa che gyur na// 'khor lo steng ma'i steng 'dug
49a1
1la// 'og gi sngags rnams gzhug nas bzlog/ sngags des char pa 'chad par nges// bsdu bar byas la rang lha nyid// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid lha// 'di ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// drag
49a2
1po'i dkyil 'khor rab gsal bri// rgyan dang rol mo dpag bsam shing// 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis rgyan// rgyal mtshan la sogs rgyan rnams kyis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun la brgyan// las
49a3
1'di kun gyi mchog dam pa// rnal 'byor dam pas nyams blangs na// las gang bya bar thogs pa med// dam tshig ting 'dzin ldan pa'i mi rnams kyis// byas la 'bras bu yod ces bya/ khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud
49a4
1las/ dkyil 'khor dang char pa dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des/ skrangs 'bur gzhom pa'i don 'di bstan te/ bdag nyid stobs po che ru
49a5
1bsam// lce la rdo rje rtse gsum bsgom// nad pa'i lus la ldag par bya// 'bru dgu'i zhabs la nA ga gdags// stobs chen snying po rab tu gces// nad rnams thams cad zhi bar bsam// sman la gdab cing
49a6
1khong du gtong// gser la gdab cing phyi ru brlan// tho rangs bya skad ma thon par// sngags rnams btab pas the tshom med// nad rnams thams cad zhi bar bsam/ khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud las/ skrangs 'bur
49b1
1gzhom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos/ sri mnan pa'i don 'di gsungs so// bdud chen pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ bdud mo pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma
49b2
1gnyis la bu gcig skyes te/ rgyal po phung pa'i phung sri/ blon po phung pa'i phung sri/ yul mi phung ba'i sri/ dgra sri/ dme sri/ sgo sri/ chung sri/ dur sri/ rnal 'byor pa'i dam sri/ god sri'o// rgyal po phung ba'i phung sri
49b3
1ni// mon nam hor mo spyi rings sam// mon glang phyug gi thod pa ru// chos 'khor dbus su gnan par bya// blon po phung ba'i phung sri ni// spre'u 'am ne tso'i thod pa ru// mdun ma 'dus sar gnan par bya// yul
49b4
1mi phung ba'i phung sri ni// mdzo rtol dre'u'i thod pa ru// grong gi dbus su mnan par bya// yang na yul gyi mdo nyid do// dgra sri rta g.yag thod pa ru// dgra zun mtshams su gnan par bya'o// dme sre khyi spyang thod pa
49b5
1ru// grong gi dbus su gnan par bya'o// sgo sri phag gi thod pa ru// them pa'i 'og tu gnan par bya// chung sri phag gu'i thod pa ru// mal gyi 'og tu gnan par bya// dur sri wa dang grum thod dam// yang na sre
49b6
1mo'i thod pa ru// dur gyi 'dabs su gnan par bya// rnal 'byor dam sri mi dang khyi// phag thod la sogs pa la ni// mchod rten nang du gnan par bya// god sri ri'u lug thod pa ru// ra ba'i dbus
50a1
1su gnan par bya'o// de rnams gang byed thod pa ru// 'khor lo rtsibs drug khris pa la// dbus su nr-i dang tri bri'o// dgra la byed na nr-i yang bri// rtsibs drug la yang sngags drug bri// mtha' ma khro
50a2
1bcu'i sngags kyis bskor// dbus kyi lte bar gzugs bris la// snying gar rus la dpral bar ming// yan lag bzhi la yig 'bru bzhi// mA ra ya yis mtha' ma bskor// shog bu la yang de bzhin bri'o// sngon
50a3
1dmar dkri zhing re bas gtum// bsnyen bsgrub gdab las tshul bzhin bya// zor dang hom dang mnan pa dang// tha mas las su grub pa yin// gang du byed par gru gsum bri// e yi tshogs kyis gzhal yas
50a4
1bskyed// stobs po che yi thugs ka nas// dzaHlas lcags kyus bkug cing bstim// thod pa de ru sngas nas ni// stobs po che yi phur gyis gdab// rgya gram mnan cing las bzhis brdung// gang las byas kyang the
50a5
1tshom med/ khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud las/ sri mnan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung gi rgyal po la/ karma he ru ka dang/ dom gyi mgo can dang/ byi ba'i mgo can dang/
50a6
1'khor mgo brnyan gyi tshogs kyis gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bstod do// kye ma gsang ba'i bdag nyid gtso// sku gsung thugs kyi rab zab pa// rgya mtsho lta bu'i ngang tshul can// zil gnon chen po
50b1
1khyod la bstod// ces gsol pas/ de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ khyod ni bcom ldan nga dang 'dra/ khyod ni khrag 'thung nga dang mnyam// sems can kun la phan byed
50b2
1yin/ khams gsum snyoms pa'i pha ma yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'khor rnams dges nas sku gsung thugs la btud do// de nas khrag 'thung gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga ni mnyam pa'i
50b3
1ngang la 'jog/ de tshe gsung pa'i lung chen yang// rgyal po dza zhes khang stengs su// gsang sngags rgyud rnams 'byung 'gyur gyi// shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la// dbus 'gyur tshal du dar bar 'gyur/ khro bo stobs po
50b4
1che'i rgyud las/ rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/// khro bo stobs po che'i rgyud khro bcu rol pa'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so////
50b5
1rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya ma ku+u ra dI pra k+Shur spar+sha ts+tshe da na tsakrA\u0f85ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje phur pa me long gsal ba'i spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo rtsibs kyi rgyud/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag
50b6
1'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min gsang ba'i b+ha ga na bzhugs so// nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor khro bo dang khro mo rnams dang gdul bya drag po'i khro bo
51a1
1rnams dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// thun mong du gyur pa'i rgyud rnams kyang bshad cing gsal bar spros so// de nas ma 'ongs pa'i gdul bya rnams gdul ba'i phyir/ rdo rje khro bo stobs po
51a2
1ches/ bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i mchod bstod byas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bder gshegs bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs sems can don phyir du// gdug pa drag po'i gdul bya
51a3
1la// drag shul thabs kyis 'dul thabs gsungs// lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams// gcig la gcig smod drag sngags 'gran// yang dag chos bor log chos sgrub// de tshe chos kyi me long gang// spu gri'i
51a4
1'khor lo ji ltar bskor// reg gcod drag sngags ji ltar lags// sems can don phyir bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
51a5
1yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs spros pas/ 'jig rten shin tu g.yo zhing 'gul ldegs par gyur nas/ dregs pa can rnams shin tu brgyal nas gnas pa rnams dbugs phyung ste gnas pa la/ so so'i 'khor lo dang/
51a6
1drag sngags gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rdo rje phur pa me long gsal ba'i spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo rtsibs rgyud las/ gleng gzhi gleng bslang ba dang/ gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhus pa'i
51b1
1le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nus 'khor rnams kyi don rtogs par rab tu mkhyen nas/ gsang ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bshad pa/ e ma rdo rje khro bo che// bstan pa tha ma'i
51b2
1sems can rnams// yang dag don bor log chos spyod// dge ba sgrib la sdig pa 'phel// de tshe chos kyi me long bshad// gleng gzhi rnam gsum don gyi khog dbub yin// mtshan nyid bzhi ni rgyud don shan 'byed
51b3
1yin// phur bu rgyu bzhis gang zag bzhi mthar dbyung// sgrub gzhung gsum gyis las kyi gzhung bsrang bya// thams cad 'dus pa'i sngags kyis ye shes lha ni gnad la dbab// ngan sngags thus yig drug gsum
51b4
1bco brgyad kyis// mkha' 'gro ma rnams mngon sum dag tu bkol// srog gi don po gsum gyis dmigs pa'i gnad gsum bkrol// bsgral lugs rnam pa drug gis brnag pa'i las rnams bya// mthar phyin
51b5
1brgyad kyis las kyi kha yang bskang// mtha' brtul gsum gyis phrin las gzhug kyang bsdud// gsal bar bkod pa thugs kyi me long yin// gzhan rnams gcod phyir spu gri nag po ste// myur du chod pas reg
51b6
1gcod nag po yin// rin chen 'bru thus sdebs bcas 'khor lo ste// lhag par gcod cing 'khor bas 'khor lo yin// yig 'bru grangs su gtugs pas rtsibs kyi rgyud// rdo rje phur pa me long gsal ba'i spu gri
52a1
1reg gcod 'khor lo rtsibs rgyud las/ thugs kyi me long gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag gsang don me long bshad// gsang sngags mnan bsrung mthu 'phrog la// gsang ba'i
52a2
1man ngag dag gis ma 'grub na// gsang ba khro bo gting rgyur gsang sngags bzlas// sgrub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas pa'i long med na// gsang ba sgrol ba khro mo'i sngags la 'jug/ gsang sngags gcig kyang ma
52a3
1'grub bgegs gnod na// gsang ba phur pa'i gsang sngags bzlas pa bya// lha sgrub gsang sngags bzlas pa'i long med na// gsang ba gting mnan sa bshig sgrol sngags bzlas// gsang ba shi ci shi ci 'di
52a4
1rnams brda rnying zhig yin nam ma nges sku yi dme phur gyis// ye shes khro phur gnyis kyi nus pa bcings// gsang ba shi ci gsung gi dme phur gyis// ye shes pad+ma gsung gi dasung yang bcings// gsang ba shi
52a5
1ci thugs kyi dme phur gyis// ye shes phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang phrog/ gsang ba shi ci yon tan phur pa yis// ye shes ma gshin gnyis kyi byad kyang sdom// gsang ba shi ci phrin las phur pa yis// 'jig rten mu
52a6
1stegs dregs pa'i mthu yang dbrog/ gsang ba gting 'gyur gsum dang phyag rgya gnyis// gsang ba gzhan gta' bsrul phyir rang rtags so// gsung gi me long spu \u0f84gri reg gcod yin// rdo rje phur pa me long gsang
52b1
1ba'i spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo rtsibs kyi rgyud las/ gsung gi me long ste le'u gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dag gsang ba'i spu gri'i me long bshad// gsang ba'i bsnyen pa bsgrub la gnas pa yis// mchog
52b2
1gi rnal 'byor gzhung dang ldan pa yis// gsang sngags rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa gsum du bya// las byed 'khor gyis bsnyen pa bzhi ru bya// ye shes bsnyen pa nye bsnyen gnas pa la// gsang ba'i bsgrub pa bsgrub chen
52b3
1gnas pa'i sa// bdag gi phyag cha gnod par btang ba dang// gzhan gyi gnod bya phan par btang ba dang// gzhan gyi sbyor ba kun dang bsdeb pa dang// dus ngan rnal 'byor nang 'thab byed pa'i tshe// rang gi shi
52b4
1ci zlog phur shes par bya// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bcu dang dug lnga dang// bla thun drag po thun du 'debs pa dang// 'phyong brgyad las bzhi kun gyi gzhug la gdags// i tsa rdzas te shugs sgrol ging du
52b5
1btang// ye shes lha nyid ging du gtong ba dang// dam can rdzas dang yo byad tshogs par bya// las gzhi'i sbyor ba'i 'khor lo'i rdzas rnams bsag/ sku yi me long spu gri reg gcod yin// rdo rje phur pa me long
52b6
1gsal ba spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo'i rtsibs rgyud las/ sku'i me long gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dag don rnams bshad// ar gtad 'khrul dang thems rnams rang rkyang ba// drag sngags
53a1
1tshad ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// gsang ba bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhi dag gis// 'dus pa bzhi yi gtso 'khor bsnyen cing bsgrub// ye shes bcus bsdus dwangs ma'i 'dus pa bzhi// dgra bgegs bsgrub
53a2
1bya'i phung po dbyings su sdud// kun gyi rnam shes srog 'phrog 'khor lo bzhis// mu stegs log lta'i rnam shes 'phrog par byed// ging dang dam can snying phrog d+ha d+hi bzhis// dgra bgegs nyams pa'i snying khrag
53a3
1mngon du skyug/ drag po ngan sngags 'dus pa'i phreng ba bzhis// rnam shes pa rnams thob dang sgrol bar byed// drag po'i sngags sde nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// gsang ba'i ye ge 'khor lo srog gi 'khor lo dang// gsang
53a4
1sngags srog gi chan pa srog gi yang tig dang// d+ha d+hi rab dang 'bring dang ba ma bsil bu dang// gsang ba'i sngags la las kyi phrin las bzhis// thams cad 'dus dang khro bo 'dus pa dang// ma mo 'dus pa ging
53a5
1rnams ngan sngags 'dus// bskyed dang bzlas dang gdab pa bcu gcig 'gyur// ye shes bzlas brjod dngos grub sgrol dang bzhis// chos nyid yi ge phyag rgya ngan sngags tshul// gdab dang mnan dang bsreg dang
53a6
1'phang ba dang// ngan sngags sdom yig bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi ste// 'di yi gsang sngags phur pa'i las rnams rdzogs// dbang dang byin rlabs rtags dang mtshan ma dang// gsang ba chen po'i yan lag shes byas
53b1
1na// gang bsgrub las kyi 'bras bu myur bar nges// rdo rje phur pa me long gsang ba'i spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo'i rtsibs rgyud las/ drag sngags kyi sdom gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas gsang ba spyi gnad
53b2
1dgrol bshad bya// gsang ba sku bsgrub drag po bstan pa dang// gsang ba gsung bsgrub drag po bstan pa dang// gsang ba thugs bsgrub drag po bstan pa dang// 'khrul 'khor las dang drag po sngags bsgrub
53b3
1dang// rnal ma dgug dang drag sngags bzlog pa dang// bse byang sngags drug pho mo mtha' brtul bcas// bse byang rab 'bring tha ma'i sngags rnams dang// dbab dang sbal pa mdze nad 'khor lo dang// mdze
53b4
1bsrung ser ba gcod dang gter bsgrub dang// las rnams gang bstan bsdu na gnyis su 'du// thun mong las dang mchog dang mtha' ru dbyung// 'dir ni sdom dang man ngag gsang ba 'dus// las gzhan thun
53b5
1mong rgyud rnams kun na gsal// blta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam tshig dang// sgrub pa phrin las rim pa gsang ba dang// sa dang lam rnams 'dir ni rgyas ma bshad// de dag thun mong rgyud du shes par
53b6
1bya// rdo rje phur pa me long gsal ba spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo rtsibs rgyud las/ man ngag spyi bshad sdom gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rgyud 'di bzung byas sba ba ste// dad dang shes rab snying
54a1
1rje brtson 'grus ldan// bla ma la gus dang ldan brtson 'grus che// snying rje dang ldan lta ba rang la rdzogs// wa dang seng ge lta bur gcig pur gnas// de las ldog la rgyud don rab tu
54a2
1gsang// yon tan kun ldan rgyud 'di rab tu gsang// zhes gsungs pas 'khor rnams rab tu yi rang ste/ dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ gsungs pa la mngon par rab tu bstod do// rdo rje phur pa
54a3
1me long gsal ba'i spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo'i rtsibs rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// phur pa me long gsang ba'i spu gri reg gcod 'khor lo rtsibs rgyud chen po rdzogs so////
54a4
1rgya gar skad du/ shrI lo ka dI pa nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal 'jig rten snang byed ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
54a5
1de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'khyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba de/ khros pa'i rgyal po dpal kI la yar bzhugs nas/ badzra he ru ka la sogs pa rigs kyi khro bo
54a6
1dang/ badzra kro d+hi la sogs pa rigs kyi khro mo rnams dang/ hUM mdzad la sogs pa rgyan gyi khro bo rnams dang/ de rnams kyi yum dang/ phra men pho mo dang/ sgo ba rnams dang/ go'u rI brgyad dang/ sid+ha brgyad dang/
54b1
1dbang phyug ma rnams dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ spyan ras gzigs la sogs te/ 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ gzhan yang sa dang lam la gnas pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/
54b2
1nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci la sogs pa/ lha ma srin sde brgyad dang/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ khro bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas/ b+ha ga yangs pa'i dur khrod bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
54b3
1gzhal yas khang/ dur khrod las byas pa'i gnas na/ nye ba'i 'khor rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas stag dang khyi dang spyang ki la sogs pa'i gcan gzan gdug pa gcan dang/ khra dang dur bya la
54b4
1sogs pa'i dur khrod kyi bya mang po yang 'dus so// 'du bar yang 'gyur ro// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mnal to// de la 'khor rnams kyis zhus pa/ kye e ma
54b5
1ho// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa ni// gud na yod pa ma yin te// ye sangs rgyas pa mngon nas bzhugs// byin rlabs ya mtshan bstan du gsol// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa'i phyir// rgyu la gnas pa'i smon
54b6
1lam gdab// phrin las rnam bzhis don byas te// bsod nams phung po'i sku yang 'byung/ e ba~M mA yA/ de las thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes las dbu dang phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa'i kI la
55a1
1ya chen por gyur to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po la thugs kyi sgo nas gdams/ spyan ras gzigs la gsung gi sgo nas bshad/ 'jam dpal la sku'i sgo nas gzigs pa'o// gzhan yang
55a2
1'khor thams cad la gzigs pa yang mdzad/ bzhad pa yang mdzad/ glang po che'i ko rlon las kyang 'od byung/ de bzhin du stag gi sham bu la sogs pa las kyang 'od byung bas/ 'khor rnams dgyes par song
55a3
1ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa yang mi mdzad/ gzigs pa yang mi mdzad/ bzhad pa yang mi mdzad na/
55a4
1bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci lags/ 'bras bu ci lags/ rkyen gang lags/ khro bo'i rgyal pos bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya'i
55a5
1rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ de'i dus la bab na nyan par byos shig/ ngas 'khor thams cad dang/ khyod la yang ma 'ongs pa'i don du bshad kyis/ dper na 'jigs rten du sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang rgyu 'tshal
55a6
1lo// rkyen 'tshal lo// 'bras bu 'tshal lo// dper na rgya mtsho chen por me tog u dum wa ra 'khrungs pa la yang rgyu 'tshal lo// rkyen 'tshal lo// 'bras bu 'tshal lo// dper na 'jig rten du 'khor los sgyur
55b1
1ba'i rgyal po 'byung ba la yang rgyu 'tshal lo// rkyen 'tshal lo// 'bras bu 'tshal lo// dper na 'jig rten na lo tog dang/ 'bru bcud 'khrungs pa la yang rgyu 'tshal lo// rkyen 'tshal lo// 'bras bu 'tshal lo// de
55b2
1bzhin du bdag 'dzum pa la yang/ rgyu ma mchis pa ma lags/ rkyen ma mchis pa ma lags/ 'bras bu ma 'chis pa ma lags so// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol
55b3
1to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ de bzhin du me tog u dum wa ra 'byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ de bzhin lo tog dang 'bras bu
55b4
1'byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ zhes gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten du sems can sangs rgyas su bgyi ba'i rgyu ci mchis/ rkyen ci mchis/ 'bras bu ci mchis/ 'jig rten du ston pa
55b5
1'byung bas/ u dum wa ra 'byung ba'i rgyu mchis so// rkyen mchis so// 'bras bu mchis so// 'jig rten du zhing pa'i las so nam mchis na/ 'bras bu rtsi bcud 'khrungs pa la rgyu mchis so// rkyen mchis
55b6
1so// 'bras bu mchis so// zhes gsungs nas 'khor rnams la gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba/ 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i rgyud las/ gleng
56a1
1gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// 'jig rten ma rungs pa mchis te/ de nas sems can thams cad la srog 'phrog pa dang/
56a2
1mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ nyams par byed pa dang/ sha za ba dang/ khrag 'thung ba dang/ 'tshe ba mchis te/ de'i don du lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa rigs gsum gyi mgon po khyed ni/ mthu che ba
56a3
1dang/ snying rje che ba dang/ shes rab che ba yin pas don bya bar byos shig/ ces bka' stsal to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma ho rje btsun bka' stsal na// mi
56a4
1mjed khams kyi don bgyid de// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis// bdag cag rnams ni byin gyis rlob// gsang ba'i bdag pos zhabs la spyi bos gtugs so// de nas byin gyis brlabs te/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga
56a5
1ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta wAk+ka badzra swa wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swab+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes byin gyis brlabs so// brlabs ma thag tu/ mi mjed sprul pa bkye ba ni/
56a6
1shwa na mu kha'i sprul pa la sogs pa dang/ rdo rje ya byin la sogs pa gsung gi sprul pa dang/ thugs kyi sprul pa dus bzhi'i rgyal mo ste/ bzhi tshan gsum gyis srog gi snying po phul ba ni/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yau/ ma mo kun gyis
56b1
1srog kyang yin/ e waM ma yA bzhi nyid ni// ma mo kun gyi srog kyang yin// phrin las mtha' ru phyin pa ni// dza dza zhes pa bzhi nyid ni// ma mo kun gyi srog kyang yin// la la ji srid sku yi srog/ la la ji srid gsung
56b2
1gi srog/ la la ji srid thugs kyi srog/ bdag cag rnams ni ji srid bar// phur pa bsgrub pa'i grogs bgyi bas// gal te bdag cag 'khus pa na// kI la ya la 'khus pa lags// lus kyang rul zhing myags
56b3
1par 'ong// sems kyang stor zhing brlag par 'gyur// ngag kyang lkugs par 'gro ba yin// de la kI la yas sngags dang/ phyag rgyas shi sa bstan pa 'di gsungs so// lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol nas
56b4
1ni// mthe'u gnyis ni sbrel nas ni// mdzub mo gnyis ni mche bar bya// sngags ni 'di skad brjod par bya// A+oM badzra sa ma ya daM Sh+ta a wa s+t+waM b+ha ka ya hUM phaT/ de ni sdigs pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags// da ni thod pa'i phyag
56b5
1rgya yis// tshal pa tshal pa gsum du gzhig/ sor mo rgya srubs bzhin du bsnol/ A+o~M badzra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya haM/ A+o~M badzra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya hUM/ A+o~M badzra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya phaT/ de ni gnad kyi phyag rgya'i
56b6
1sngags// da ni gshog pa'i phyag rgya sngags// lag ngar bsnol te gshog par bya// dzaHhU~M baM hoH badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M phaT/ dIp+ta tsakra ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ to sha ya/ to sha ya/ bid+h+wan+sa ya bid+h+wan+sa ya/ e h+ye hi
57a1
1b+ha ga wAn/ bung+d+ha k+She tri pra ti s+t+waM b+ha ka ya hU~M phaT/ sngags dang phyag rgya de yis ni// lha mo rnams ni gzir bar bya// sngags dang phyag rgya de rnams dang// dpa' bo rnams kyis bsam pa ni// ma mo'i
57a2
1shi sa bstan pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'jig rten ma mos 'jig rten bkang// sha dang khrag la dbang yang byas// sems can nyon mongs phongs pa
57a3
1la// sprul pa don mdzad de bzhin no// zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba las/ ma mo dbang du bsdu ba rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed srung ma thems kyi
57a4
1le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad zhus so// kye bcom ldan 'das kI la ya chen po/ mang po nyung du bsdu ba'i thabs// rnal 'byor gcig tu 'dug pa
57a5
1la// lha yi bye brag bsdu ba'i thabs// dpa' bo nyid kyis bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig rigs kyi mgon po khyod// shin tu rnal 'byor byed 'dod cing// bstan pa gnyen po srung
57a6
1byed pas// dam tshig rtsa ba ma nyams shing// brtson 'grus che la dad pa yod// de la gcig pu'i sgrub pa bstan// sgrub las ldog byed nang dbyin byed// dam tshig rtsa ba gang yang med// nang dme byed cing dbu
57b1
1'phang smod// nyams pa de yi don du ni// de phyir dgra bo dmigs kyi phyed// de yi man ngag 'di yin pas// sngags pa tshad du phyin pa yis// lcags sna lnga las byas pa yi// mngag phur sor ni brgyad pa
57b2
1la// dbal ni chu srin kha nas phyung// rgya mdud spyi bor hUM kA ra// lcum gzhog brgyad la khro bo brgyad// rgya mdud 'og ma'i dbu 'og tu// ma hA pa la zhal yang lnga// zur gsum dbal ni dmar la 'tsher// de lta bu
57b3
1yi mngag phur ni// sngags pas dus gsum bcang bar bya// 'greng ngam 'dug gam nyal kyang rung// 'greng ngam 'dug na sked par sba// nyal nas 'dug na sngas su sba// de la rgyun gyi bzlas brjod bya// 'phro
57b4
1'du'i sngags kyang de bzhin bstim// me ltar 'bar zhing skar ltar 'khrugs// pha rol byed stems de ltar mthong// zhes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// rnal 'byor tshad du
57b5
1phyin pa yis// gnas ni gang dang gang du bya// bsgrub pa'i grogs po ji ltar bya// dus tshod gang la zhugs par bgyi// 'jig rten rngan pa ji ltar 'tshal// kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// nyon gcig rigs kyi
57b6
1mgon po khyod// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams ni// yang na ri rtse brag la bya// yang na nags tshal dgon par bya// yang na spang phug de'u bar bya// yang na mi med gnas su bya// sgrub pa'i grogs po btsal
58a1
1ba ni// mgo bo rgya mdud 'dug pa las// skra ni kham par btsal bar bya// ro stod zur brgyad 'dug pa la// ro smad zur gsum 'dug pa btsal// rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i dus tshod ni// phur bu
58a2
1mig dmar rgyu ba yi// dus su bya bar shin tu bzang// de lta bu yi gnas nyid du// rdzas tshogs dgra rnams med par bya// nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la// sngags g.yog mtshan dang ldan pa la// zhing chung blud bu
58a3
1lag tu bskur/ kha ni phyogs bzhir bltas nas su// 'jig rten sa la g.yab mos gdab// rngan par chang phud btang nas kyang// ma nyes pa yi dpang yang gzug/ de nas nang du slar log ste// bcu gnyis srung
58a4
1ma'i dbang mo la// ar+g+ha bdud rtsir bcas pa dbul// phrin las rnams kyang de bzhin bcol// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kI la ya la/ gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol ba btab
58a5
1bo// kye gnas rnams gang yin de rnams su// maN+Dal la sogs ji ltar brtsigs// skyang nul chag chag ji ltar gdab// sta gon cho ga ji ltar bya// rdzas kyi phur pa ji ltar bsham// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal pa/
58a6
1rnal 'byor lha dang pho brang gnas// maN+Dal khru gang gru bzhir brtsig/ ba yi lnga dang gur gum chu// bu ram chu dang spos bsres la// byi dor chag chag legs par bya// de la thig le mang byas la// rigs lnga la
58b1
1sogs khrag 'thung tshogs// me tog tshom bu lnga ru bya// phur pa rnams kyang so sor gzhag/ de la zhag gcig bsnyen pa bya// de nas nang par maN+Dal brtul// phur pa rnams kyang de bzhin brtul// zhes bya'o// de
58b2
1nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das sta gon de ltar byas brtul nas// sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ji ltar bsag/ ma mo'i rdzas rnams ji ltar bsag/ ling+ga'i rgyu rnams ji ltar
58b3
1bsag/ dkyil 'khor thig rnams ji ltar gdab// ces gsol to// kye gsang ba'i mgon po nyon cig/ phur pa'i rdzas rnams ngas bshad kyis// nyung dkar gu gul tshil chen dang// sha chen khrag chen dug chen
58b4
1yin// bswe yi lha mo'i rdzas rnams ni// 'o ma khrag dang mar khu dang// sbrang rtsi dang ni chang rnams so// de bzhin shwa na mu kha'i yang/ khyi thod wa thod spyang thod dang// 'phar ba'i thod pa de bzhin te// de yi nang du
58b5
1rdzas bsags pa/ khrag sna stong dang sha sna stong// snying sna stong dang rkang sna stong// shwa na la sogs rdzas su gzhag/ re ma ti yi rdzas rnams kyang// nal bu'i sha la sogs pa ste// du ma nyid du bsags par
58b6
1bya// rkang chen dung dang zhing chen dang// b+han+d+ha rak+ta tsit+ta dang// mtshon cha drug kyang bsags par bya// ling+ga'i rgyud rnams bsag par bya// phyi dang nang gi rgyu las bya// de nas maN+Dal thig kyang gdab// thig bzhi
59a1
1btab pas le'u tshe dgu// gnyis gnyis nang du drang byas te// phyi yi tha ma thig gnyis gdab// de yis cha gsum dag tu 'gyur// gcig la khyams bya gcig la sgo// gcig dbang phyug ma rnams
59a2
1dgod// pho brang zlum por byas pa la// gru gsum bcad pas zla gam gsum// dbus la gru gsum shar gyi sna// gru gsum nag la zla gam dmar// gru bzhi ser po bar khyams dmar// sgo khyams phyogs ni rigs
59a3
1dang mthun// lcags ri mu 'khyud nag po ste// de ltar maN+Dal byas pa dang// dbus su yab dang yum yang dgos// shar gyi sna la sras mchog dgod/ khyams la shwa na re ma ti// de bzhin sgo ma bse mo'o// lcags
59a4
1ri la ni dbang phyug ma// las kyi bya ba gzhung yang bsrang// byin brlab dbang bskur tshul bzhin bya// gu gul tshil chen dud pas bdug/ de nas gru gsum sna la gzhag/ dbang mo che yi phur pa yis// bsgrub
59a5
1bya'i ling+ga brgyad la bzhag/ ha ri ti dang ba ri ti// ba ri ta dang ba ri ti// lha lnga dag gis bskur mi tshug/ 'brub khung las kyi dkyil 'khor yang// gzas pa'i lus ngag yid bsgral phyir/ kha khyer gsum dang ldan
59a6
1pa'o// 'dzub gang mthar du brus pa la// 'dzub gang gyen du brtsigs pa'o// rdzas dang lag chas bskor la bzhag/ de yi nang du gzugs bcug la// dgug pa gsum gyis rab tu dgrug/ gdab pa gsum yang de
59b1
1bzhin te// phyag rgya bzhi yi rgya yis gdab// dbab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas dbab// phyag rgya drug gis gzer gnan bya// de ltar nges par khugs pa dang// rtsa ba'i sngags la sder mo gdags// rdo rje tho ba'i
59b2
1sngags kyis bsdig khro bo bcu yi sngags kyis gdags// mtshon cha'i dpal ni bskyed pa'i phyir// byug bdug brdeg pa yangayang bya// phung po lnga la brgya rtsa brgyad/ khams dang skye mched de bzhin te//
59b3
1nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur gdab par bya// gnas gsum bdag tu gdab pa ni// spyi bo snying ga lte ba'o// de nas gso ba'i cho ga bya// tshe yi cho ga rdzogs pa dang// bsdu ba'i sngags kyis bdag la bsdu// sha khrag phung po lhag
59b4
1rol la// ma mo mkha' 'gro rbad par bya// de nas gzir mnan zab mo bya// mnan pa'i sngags dang tshig kyang brjod// de nas gtub pa'i las bya ste// rnon pa'i mtshon ni thogs nas su// tIk+Sh+Na rbad kyis gtub
59b5
1par bya// dum bu gsum gyis las gsum bya// gnan pa'i cho ga bzhin du bya// A+o~M laM hU~M laM suM laM pra ti s+t+waM b+ha ya/ dzam b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ bA' ga ma ra su sha laM/ de yi steng du don yod ni// grub pa'i pho brang gdab
59b6
1par bya// de nas sbyin bsreg rab byas te// gzas pa bsgral ba'i dum bu de// phyag tshangs pa yis dbul bar bya// phrin las chen po'i cho ga bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
60a1
1las gcig pur bsgrub pa'i sgrub pa chen po/ 'jig rten ma rungs pa rlag par byed pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ chig bsgrub bstan pa'i le'u ste gsumapa'o//// de nas yang
60a2
1gsang ba'i bdag po chen pos kI la ya la gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa rnams la phan pa'i ched du/ sbyang ba dang/ spro bsdu dang/ dngos grub blang ba zhu bar 'tshal lo// kI la yas bka' stsal
60a3
1pa// nyog cig gsang bdag phyag rdor khyod// gang zag bsam pa'i dbang gis ni// bzlas brjod rnams pa gsum du grags// phra mo'i don bstan spro bsdu bstan// dngos grub mchog tu myur ba yin// yid la
60a4
1gsal ba'i kha ru bzlas// mngon du gyur dang nyon mongs drug po ji ltar na// bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don ci gang// phra mo'i dngos po ci ltar bstan// dngos gzhi med na phra mo min// bdag nyid sbyang dang
60a5
1sems can sbyang// lnga dang gsum gyi mtshan nyid de// mi dmigs stong pa'i bdag nyid kyis// sbyang ba de ltar bstan pa yin// bshig dang mdud dang mnyam par gzhag/ brtag pa gnyis su shes par bya// a ni
60a6
1a la gnas par bya// de bzhin srog kyang phyir mi rgyu// kun brtags yongs su grub pa dang// gzhan gyi bya ba gsum gyis bstan// dang por chags gzhi gang du gtogs// rtsa nag 'byung ba bdun 'gyur
60b1
1yin// bdun 'gyur ji ltar chags gyur nas// bdun 'gyur lo lnga'i nang bar du// dge slong dag gi cha lugs su// a haM brjod pa'i yi ge ru// yi ge gang las gyur pa yin// de dag 'byung ba ji ltar dgag khegs na bsam gtan
60b2
1dngos po yin// de nas a yi don la dpyad// dpyad pas dus rtags ji ltar 'byung// ye shes bskyed pa 'od gsal yin// lam dang dgrod pa'i 'bras bu'o// zhes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos// kI la ya la gsol
60b3
1pa// e ma khyod la yang gsol pa// kye kye khro rgyal mchog/ rje btsun dpa' bo khyod nyid la// de lta bu yi rnal 'byor la// lam ni rnam pa du ru grags// dpa' bo khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas yang kI la yas
60b4
1bka' stsal pa/ e ma ho khyod kyis dri ba legs// gang phyir khyod kyis dri ba legs// dang por gang zag rnal 'byor la// thog mar dbang gis lam yang bgrod// de nas shes rab grol ba'i lam// de yang dngos gzhi 'di yin
60b5
1pas// gzas pa bsgral bas dngos grub blang// dngos grub rnam pa gnyis su brtag/ dbang rnams rim par bskur nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos po ci 'dod sbyin// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
60b6
1dang thugs snang ba las byung ba'i phyir/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ lam gyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
61a1
1kye kye bcom ldan 'das mgon gyi dpal// gang zag bsam pa'i dbang gis na// sku yi dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kI la ya chen po des/ dkyil
61a2
1'khor mngon par grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu phyag rgya rdzogs par bzhengs te bka' stsal to// ma mthong rmongs la bstan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi
61a3
1dpes mtshon te// sa 'am stegs bu che'am chung// gnas khang dag dang sbyar bar bya// ji bzhin pa yi thig rnams kyis// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dkyil 'khor la// dang por sgrol ba'i dkyil 'khor bya// de nas
61a4
1sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor bya// de nas gnan pa'i dkyil 'khor bya// blo zhan shes rab chung ba dang// mu stegs can la yongs mi bstan// zhes gsungs so// de nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// yang
61a5
1dag nges pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gnas dang slob dpon byin gyis brlab// slob dpon rdzas kyang byin gyis brlab// chag chag byi dor khrus kyang bya// gnam thig gdab la sa thig gdab// kun gyi cha ru me ri
61a6
1bcad// sor bzhi brgyad dam bcu gnyis sam// dkyil 'khor tshod dang sbyar la bcad// thig rkang bdun la ling tshe brgyad// snam bu gnyis ni phyir 'then la// snam bu nang la thig gsum gdab// re mig khong
61b1
1nas dbyung ba'i phyir// rtsibs brgyad thig ni legs par gdab// rgyas pa ni thod pa ste// 'khor lo rtsibs ni rdo rje'i rwa// shar gyi tshangs thig ngos bzung nas// lho nub mtshams su gdab par bya// de ltar kun tu
61b2
1bskor bar bya// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad maN+Dal la// e la bcom ldan rgyal po ste// gru gsum la ni phur pa rdzas// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi khro bo brgyad// shar nas bzung ste ma nor bar// 'khor lo rtsibs
61b3
1brgyad dag la'o// g.yas zur g.yon zur mdun rgyab tu// hU~M kA ra dang stobs po che// phra men zung re de bzhin dgod// lhag ma'i phra men brgyad po yang// gong ras dag la de bzhin no// 'khor lo kha dog so so
61b4
1ste// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// nag po dkar po ser po'o// gal te slob mar dbang bskur dang// gal te tshe yi cho ga dang// gal te dngos grub bsag pa ni// gru khyad ljang gu dag la'o// phyi rgyab snam bu
61b5
1gang yin la// ro 'am thig le gang yang rung// phur bu'i srung ma'i gdan rnams te// spel ma nyid du yang dag dgod// rigs lnga'i pho brang gdan tshogs ni// ban d+ha lnga la dbang bskur la// bar snang khams su
61b6
1bzhugs su gsol// gal te slob mar dbang bskur na// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ dri dang sman dang mngar dang 'bru// mar dang tshA rnams blug la bzhag/ bar bar tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// bza' dang bca' dang
62a1
1btung ba'i tshogs// mang po nyid du bsag par bya// bsgral ba zin nas dbang bskur na// rim par stegs bu brtsigs par bya// mdo mdor bsnyen pa bsnyen chen la// mdo mdor bsgrub pa bsgrub
62a2
1chen no// mdo mdor stong pa'i cho ga bya// de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni// brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong rtsa brgyad// ci nus rnal 'byor pa yis bya// de ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'o// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs
62a3
1pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ 'jig rten snang byed las sku'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos// bcom ldan 'das la 'di
62a4
1skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di zhu bar 'tshal lo// zhes gsol to// de nas dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu sgyu ma
62a5
1chen por sku bzhengs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i bdag po dus la bab na da nyon cig rnal 'byor dpa' bos bsgrub 'dod na// dang por sa sbyangs bslangs sbran dang// dbang po'i las
62a6
1rnams lha la bya// de ltar las rnams kun la rig bya// yang bka' stsal pa/ gnyis pa phyi nang gnyis kyis sbyang// gsum pa mtshams lnga la sogs bya// bzhi pa chos spyod rnam pa bcu// lnga pa 'jig rten gtor ma
62b1
1gtang// rnal 'byor dbang pos las rnams kyang// dbang po dang ni bskrad pa dang// bcol ba dang ni dgug pa'o// dang po sbyan drangs rab bsngags pa// dzaHhU~M baM hoHe h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn/ b+hin+d+h+ra ya b+hin+d+ha ya/ a pra
62b2
1ti dza hU ru lu ru lu hU~M/ brjod pa gsum gyis spyan yang drang// zhal dbye ba yi sngags kyang brjod/ A+o~M pra tIts+tsha hUM/ zhes mchod pa bstab bo// phrin las 'dis las bcol ba'o/ A+o~M sa ma ya pra tIts+tsha hUM/ de nas phrin
62b3
1las bcol ba'i sngags la/ sme ba dug gsum phye ma gsum/ khrag gsum sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni// che ge mo la sbyin par bya// de bzhin bkug la zar gzhug sngags/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH badzra ang+ku sha dzaHche ge mo zhig ma ra
62b4
1ya hUM dzaH/ de skad brjod la za ru gzhug/ dri yi thig le rang byas la// thig dang tshon yang byin gyis brlab// gnyis med sbyor ba'i man ngag gis// rgyal ba rigs lnga spyan yang drang// spyan drang gnyis med
62b5
1bstims par bya// yab yum bcu yi sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems su rang bzhin bya// slob dpon dam tshig sdom ldan pas// byang chub thig skud byin gyis brlab// tshon sna lnga yis gnam thig gdab// dkar la
62b6
1gsal bas sa thig gdab// slob dpon shar du rab 'dug ste// slob ma nub kyi phyogs su 'dug/ slob dpon thugs kar rab tu 'then// slob ma'i mdzod spu dag tu 'then// rdo rje pad+ma'i thig kyang
63a1
1gdab// ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad zhus te/ bcom ldan thabs kyis rgyal po mchog/ slob ma'i phyag rgya btsal ba ni// gang gi don du gsungs pa
63a2
1lags// gang gi don du btsal ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ sha khrag 'bar zhing dbang po gsal// lo tshad lon zhing mtshan dang ldan// bde ba 'dzin
63a3
1la rab tu mkhas// slob ma'i 'os su shin tu sngags// zhes gsungs so// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ de lta bu yi slob ma yis// dkyil 'khor cha ni ji ltar brtag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
63a4
1bshad du gsol// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ slob ma pad+ma can dag gis// dkyil 'khor cha ni brtag par bya// phyogs cha mnyam pa'i tshangs thig la// zur thig cha bsnyam rgya gram cha bzhi snyams// cha chen
63a5
1brgyad du rab tu bgo/ tshangs thig phyed la phyed mar gdab// de lnga g.yas g.yon cha bsnyams gdab// de ltar cha chen brgyad gyur nas// dbus gnyis cha yi tha ma la// cha phran du ni thig thung gdab// yang na thig
63a6
1ring btab kyang rung// cha gnyis kun gyi phyi rol drang// sgo cha brgyad las pany+tsa gnas// yang na cha gcig dgu ru bsgo// cha gsum sum cha re re ni// de ni dbus cha gnyis pa'o/ khru bzhi dag tu bstan pa la// yang
63b1
1na nyis 'gyur bstan pa'o/ khru re la ni sor re bcad// thig bskor rnam pa gsum du gdab// dang po chos kyi 'khor lo la// gnyis pa rdo rje ra ba'o// gsum pa ye shes me ri ni// lcags ri nag po me ri
63b2
1'bar// dbang bskur bum pa mang po la// sna tshogs brgyan pa'i byin brlab bya// phyogs bzhi zla gam bzhi dag la// ye shes snang ba chen po bzhi// rdo rje'i gru chad mtha' bzhi la// nag po'i tshon gyis rab dkang
63b3
1ste// ci 'dod las rnams brtag la bya// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor ci 'dod spyod// ces gsungs so// gzhal yas de yi gdan rnams kyang// stag dang khyi dang spyang ki dang/ rmig bu sdig pa gcan gzan
63b4
1sogs// sbrul nag mang po shigs ser shigs/ khwa dang 'ug pa dur bya'i tshogs// 'dab chags mang po lhags se lhags// gser dngul zangs lcags las byas pa'i// bum pa bzang po lnga yang bsag/ lung dang
63b5
1ldan pa'i slob dpon ni// phyogs bzhir re re gzhag par bya// man ngag can la bya ba ni// rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas yang gdab// byin brlab gsum dang dbang bskur bzhi// byug dang bdug pa'i las rnams
63b6
1bya// de bzhin nyid nas bzung nas su// rnal 'byor don ni bya ba ni// drang ba'i don gyis sangs rgyas kyis// rnal 'byor dpa' bos skyed par bya// bka' dang bka' yi 'khor lo yis// phyi nang gnyis kyi
64a1
1mtshams kyang bcad// shin tu rngams pa'i nga ro yis// phur pa bcu la sngags bzlas la// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad mtshams kyang bcad// bzlas pa las kyi sngags bzlas la// phyogs skyong
64a2
1bkug pa phur pa gdab// spyi dang thun mong las rnams bya// mang po rgyas pa nga yis bshad// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten
64a3
1snang byed las/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i don du/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan du
64a4
1gsol// gang phyir bdag la bshad du gsol// kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor cha ni bsnyams pa la// nang gi pho brang thig gdab ni// thig rkang bdun pa bdun pa la// zur thig sbal mgo sbal
64a5
1mgor gdab// rin chen zur brgyad nyi shu gcig/ dbus nas pho brang rin chen 'bar// zla gam phyed la sgo bya ba// tshangs pa'i thig la gdab par bya/ khyams ni rnam pa bzhi yod do// sgo ni rnam pa gsum du
64a6
1'dod// dang po bdag nyid rtsa ba'i sgo// gnyis pa thugs rje sprul pa'i sgo/ khro bo sprul pa'i sgo ru grags// gsum pa rang bzhin gnas kyi sgo// srung ma ma mo'i sgo ru grags// rin po che yi gcod thabs ni// zur
64b1
1brgyad zur brgyad 'bar bar bskor// dbus su bcom ldan yab yum bcas// sgo la sogs pa nyi shu gcig/ 'bar ba re la phur pa re// byin brlab dbang skur byas la dgod// de yi 'bar ba'i stag gso
64b2
1la// dmar po'i tshon gyis dpal gyi gshos// kun gyi kha ru re re gzhag/ de ma dpal bshos bzang po'o// de yi phyi rim ser po la// khro bo sprul pa spel mar ni// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ma nor gzhag/ de
64b3
1yang sgo dang bcas pa'o// de yi phyi rim bar khyams la// dmar po'i tshon gyis rab bkang ste// g.yas dang g.yon du dgod par bya// de bzhin sgo la sgo ba bzhi// bse mo bzhi ni dgod par bya// lcags ri la ni
64b4
1dbang phyug ma// bdun bdun srin mo 'gros su gzhag/ sked pa rgya mdud rtse mo dbal// rtsa ba zhi ba'i lugs su bya// tshon gyi kha dog so so ni// mkhas pa nyid kyis nan tan bya// re re re ga pany+tsa yang// shing bu
64b5
1nyid kyis bcos par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag mchog/ rin chen zur brgyad dkyil 'khor ni// gsang ba thugs kyi maN+Dal lo// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin
64b6
1gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom
65a1
1ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ston pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa// mdor bsdus ston pa du tsam bzhugs// sangs rgyas bye brag ji snyed pa// mdor bsdus sangs rgyas du tsam bzhugs// theg
65a2
1pa'i bye brag ji snyed pa// mdor bsdus theg pa du tsam bzhugs// lam gyi rnam pa'i bye brag las// 'jug pa'i sgo ni du tsam bzhugs// dkyil 'khor bye brag bsam yas pa// bsdu na dkyil 'khor du tsam
65a3
1bzhugs// dbang gi bye brag mang po la// bsdu na rnam pa du tsam bzhugs// dam tshig bye brag mang po las// bsdu na rnam pa du tsam bzhugs// lha yi bye brag mang po las// bsdu na rnam pa du tsam bzhugs// lha ma
65a4
1yin dang mi la sogs// sems can bye brag mang po las// bsdu na rnam pa du ru 'dus// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag mang po 'di lta ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba
65a5
1gsum// don dam ston pa'i bye brag las// bsdu na ston pa gcig tu bsdu// gang zag bsam pa'i dbang gis na// gang+gA'i klung gi bye brag kyang// dpe ru bzhag ste sangs rgyas mtshan// mdor bsdus sangs rgyas
65a6
1gcig tu 'dus// sems can sdug bsngal bsam yas pas// theg pa'i bye brag bsam las 'das// mdor bsdus theg pa gcig tu 'dus// lam gyi bye brag bsam yas pa// bsdu ba'i bye brag lnga ru 'dus// de
65b1
1yang lam chen gcig tu 'dus// lha tshogs bye brag bsam yas pas// dkyil 'khor bsam las 'das pa ste// mdor bsdus dkyil 'khor gcig la 'dus// theg dang mi theg dbang gis na// theg pa'i bye brag
65b2
1mthong la gol// yang dag don gyi lam yin pas// dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// la la glen pa'i rtul zhugs dang// la la sgrin pa'i shes rig dang// la la mdzangs pa'i las thabs dang// la la phyogs
65b3
1mtshams dga' shes dang/ kha cig kun rtog yongs su shes// dam tshig rnam pa gsum du grags// lha yi bye brag mang po las// bsod nams che chung dbang gis na// yang nas yang du bsam pa ste// rnam pa
65b4
1gsum du rab tu grags// la la bstod la la la smad// bsdu na rnam pa lnga yin te// gcig tu grags pa rnam pa drug/ de la sogs te mi rnams la// rnam pa bzhi ru rab tu grags// byol song rtsa ba gcig yin
65b5
1te// yi dwags bye brag gnyis su 'gro// sdug bsngal rtsa ba dmyal ba ste// bye brag bgrang na rnam pa gnyis// lhag pa'i sdug bsngal de dang gsum// de ltar rigs drug sems can ni// so so'i bye brag bsam las
65b6
1'das// zhes bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba ste// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ rgyu 'bras kyi bye brag gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang
66a1
1gsang ba'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// zhing gi khyon ni ci ltar gda'// mthong na ji ltar grags pa lags// rnam pa du yis mthong ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
66a2
1du gsol// ces gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so don ston na// nga yi yid las byung ba 'di// mthong bar 'dod na grags par gyis// don dam bden med nga la blta// rang rtogs mthong ba nga
66a3
1la blta// thos pa rag lus nga la blta// phyogs gcig pa 'di nga la blta// bden pa'i bye brag nga la blta// drug po mthar phyin nga la blta// rnal 'byor can ni nga la blta// spyod pas mang snyems nga la
66a4
1blta// gnyis ka'i bde ba nga la blta// theg chen spyod pa nga la blta// mtshams sbyor chen po nga la blta// yang dag rtse mo nga mthong zer// des kyang mthong ba shin tu dka'// skye bo phal pas nga mi
66a5
1mthong// nga mthong kun rtogs 'ga' tsam yod// nga mthong zer ba'i rtog ge ba// 'gro ba 'dren par mi 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
66a6
1to// don dam phur pa'i rgyu ni ji ltar lags// de yi tshad ni ji ltar lags// de yi dbyibs ni ji ltar lags// de yi grangs ni ji ltar lags// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ legs par dri ba'i lam gyi
66b1
1mchog/ rtogs tshad 'dul ba dri ba'i mchog/ mkhas pa dga' ba spyad pa'i phyir// don bzhi nga yis bshad kyis nyon// rgyu ni dbyings kyi mtshan nyid dag/ rkyen ni ye shes bye brag yin// de ni phur pa'i rgyu ru
66b2
