1grags// tshad ni phrin las rnam bzhi ste// sangs rgyas phrin las de las med// don ni bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi// de yi nang du 'dus pa yin// dbyibs ni gzhal yas rgya mdud ste// tshad med bzhi yi sgo bzhir
66b3
1bstan// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi lcum gzhog brgyad// rnam thar gsung ni rtse mo yin// grangs ni bden pa'i bye brag ste// de kho nyid dang de bzhin nyid// nam mkha'i tha snyad dpe dang 'dra// de bzhin gshegs
66b4
1pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba ste/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ theg pa thams cad kyi don bstan pa dang/ don dam pa'i phur pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de
66b5
1nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i gdan ni nges pa'i phyir// 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni bcu pa yin// thig gi bye brag bstan pa dang// lha yi bye bragabastan du gsol// ces pas
66b6
1kI la ya chen po de phyag rgya ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la snyoms par zhugs so// der zhugs ma thag tu phyag rgya chen po'i skur bzhengs nas bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor sngags ma bzhin bzhengs la// des kyang de
67a1
1yi rgya yis bcad// thig ni rnam pa bdun btab pa// phyed la pho brang rab byas te// byang nas lho ru drangs nas ni// de la re'u cha dgu ru dgod// re'u cha gcig ni lte ba'i tshad// de phyed kun tu
67a2
1bskor ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu'i thig tu 'gyur// de bzhin mu khyud de bzhin bskor// de yi dbus kyi pho brang la// thod pa gsum gyis bskor bar bya// mu 'khyud rdo rje'i ra ba ste// sa mchog phye mar btags
67a3
1pa la// nag po'i tshon gyis bsgyur ba yis// 'khor lo thams cad mthing gar bya// de bzhin rtsibs kyang nag por bya// gru chad ljang gu'i phyi rol du// thod pa'i phreng ba btang bar bya// de yi phyi rim dmar po
67a4
1la// thig le thig le mang du bya// de yi phyir rim sgo khyams la// keng rus skam po spel mar bkod// de yi phyir rim lcags ri la// me ri hom gyi thab tu bya// de nas lha dgod 'di gsungs so// pho brang gru gsum
67a5
1nag po la// thabs chen bdud 'dul yab yum dgod// zla gam gsum la sras gsum po// byin brlab dbang bskur byas la dgod// shar du rnam par rgyal ba ste// rim pa bzhin du rgyas par dgod// stobs po
67a6
1che dang hU~M kA ra// shar stod nub smad gnyis su dgod// phra men 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi phyir// zla gam bcu la dgod par bya// bar khyams thig le'i steng nyid du// bzlog phur bcu drug dgod par bya// sgo khyams
67b1
1la ni sgo srung ste// shwa na g.yas la re ti g.yon// dbus su srin mo dgod par bya// lcags ri la ni dbang phyug ma// bsnol te rdo rje'i 'gros su dgod// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
67b2
1dang gsung dang thugs snang ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i maN+Dal bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa// kye kye bcom ldan rje
67b3
1btsun kun gyi rje// gdug pa rnam gnyis bsgral ba dang// nga rgyal dregs pa gzhom pa'i phyir// rno dbal phur ba sras kyi mchog/ rnam grangs du yod bshad du gsol// kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// nga rgyal drag
67b4
1po mtshon gyis gzhom// phur pa lha ru byas pa ste// byug pa gsum gyis ngar yang blud// bdug pa gsum gyis dpal yang bskyed// de lta bu yi sras mchog ni// grangs su bgrang bar mi bya ste// gcig dang du ma kho
67b5
1na'o// yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang la thogs pa lags/ grangs ni rnam pa du tsam yod// dgos ched ci yi don du byung// dngos kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal
67b6
1pa// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med las// sras kyi mchog ni ston pa byung// ming ni de las thogs pa lags// kun tu bzang po yab yum las// sras kyi mchog tu rigs lnga 'byung// ming ni de las thogs pa
68a1
1lags// rigs la sku gsung thugs kyi sras// sprul pa rdo rje gzhon nu lags// ming ni de la thogs pa lags// de yi sku gsung thugs kyi sras// 'dus pa gsum gyi sras mchog lags// ming ni
68a2
1de las thogs pa lags// dang po grangs kyi rnam pa yang// gcig dang du ma bsam yas pas// dang po kho na gcig tu bstan// dgos pa'i ched dang tshul bstan nas// lnga dang bdun dang nyi shu gcig/ gsum
68a3
1dang bcu gcig drug cu bzhi// brgyad cu lnga dang brgya rtsa brgyad// stong rtsa brgyad dam khri la sogs// bye ba dung phyur sa ya'i grangs// sras mchog nyi zer shar ba yang// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dbang gis na// brjod
68a4
1kyis mi langs grangs las 'das// rtog ge pa ni rmongs pa'i phyir// brjod du med pa nga yis smra// dgos pa dang ni dgongs pa dang// mtshon pa dang ni lha rnams dag/ 'brel ba dang ni 'brel byed kyis// dgos
68a5
1ched grangs kyi tshul dang ni// brdeg pa'i dmigs la dgongs pa'o// dngos kyi mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// stod ni khro bo chen po la// smad ni so so'i dpal dang ldan// brang gis 'gro ba chen po yis// lhu dang tshigs
68a6
1ni brgyan pa ste// phur pas 'debs shing tho bas brdeg/ zhe sdang rang ga ma dang ldan// de ni dngos kyi mtshan nyid do// yang bka' stsal pa// rkyen ni hU~M las byung ba ste// de yi rgyan yang kI la ya// kI la ya yi
68b1
1mda' zam gyis// gdug pa rnam gnyis sgrol bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba ste/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ sras mchog kI
68b2
1la ya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor pa la phan pa'i phyir// ba liM mchod pa'i gtor ma 'di// las rab kun gyi gtor ma ste// cho ga bzang po
68b3
1bshad du gsol// zhes zhus nas/ kI la ya mchod pa'i phrin las rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de la phyi'i lha mo dang/ nang gi lha mo dang/ gsang ba'i lha mo la sogs
68b4
1pas/ mchod pa yang phyi nang gsang ba gsum du sbyar nas/ mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas// gsol ba btab nas zhu bar spobs te// e ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
68b5
1'das// bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang// lha rnams 'go bar bya ba dang// dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba'i phyir// nang dang phyi yi gtor ma rnams// ji ltar 'os shing rigs pa ltar// rang gi 'byor pa'i rjes
68b6
1mthun par// nan tan gyis ni mchod pa dbul/ zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// de rnams mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// rgyun
69a1
1du'am yang na zla ba gcig/ de bzhin lo gcig khyud skor dang// bcu gcig dang ni bco lnga dang// brgyad rnams su mi byad par dbul// mdzes pa'i mchod pa'i las rnams kyis// legs par
69a2
1rdzas kun bsdu byas te// rdzas kyi dngos po de dag rnams// brda yi tshig gis bstan par bya// mkha' 'gro la sogs thar pa'i mchog/ gcig pu dpal byed ro la sogs// bzlas brjod la sogs yo byad
69a3
1ldan// tshe ni mchog tu mdzes pa dang// snying po tshims byed mchog yin te// dri zhim dmar po nyid du 'dod// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs blang ba dang// thar pa chen po shin tu mdzes// 'jam pa'i gos su yang dag
69a4
1bshad// gzi brjid dri zhim nyid du 'dod// rig ma la sogs reg las byung// mchod pa nang nyid yin par bshad// nya dang sha chang bu ram chang// zwa dang sran ma la sogs ldan// dri dang me tog la sogs
69a5
1lnga// phyi yi mchod pa yin par bshad/ ces gsungs so// de nas sngags mkhan khrus byas te// sngags mkhan bya ba kun byas nas// nyams dga' ba yi gnas su 'dug/ nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas la// nyid
69a6
1ni tha mar gzhag par bya// lugs ma la sogs lha rnams la// me tog la sogs brgyan byas pa// yang na yid kyis mngon sum 'dug/ bsams te dri yi thig le lnga// dri dang ldan pa'i chu gnyis kyis// rigs lnga
69b1
1yang dag gnas pa ni// rang gi g.yog dang yang dag ldan/ dzaHhUM baM hoHA+oM kro d+hI shwa rI sarba dra byaM sho d+ha ya A+oM hUM tha/ sngags rig pas ni sngags 'di yis// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// dri dang ldan pa'i chu nyid
69b2
1kyis// de nas rdzas rnams btab byas la// rdo rje chu dang dri chen po// nyi zla dang ni dmar chen snod// de ni sangs rgyas lnga rnams te// pad+ma'i snod du gzhag par bya// chu bdag sa bon gyis sbyangs te// de la 'di
69b3
1ltar bsgom par bya/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ sa bon lnga po zla stengs su// rnal 'byor pa yis lnga gzhag bya// de yi bdud rtsir gyur pa ni// mu tig dkar po dri med bzhin// de la 'di yis brtag par bya/ khro bo'i sa bon
69b4
1bsam yas te// rdo rje sbal pa mtshan ma'i mig/ snod kyi steng du gzhag byas te// sngags rigs sngags kyi 'bru 'di yis// oM AHhU~M badzra a mr-i ta hU~M ThAH rgyal po pad+mas mtshon pa'i phyag/ sa bon zla ba dbus
69b5
1gyur pa// sbom po dbang po gnyis kyi bar// sngags rig pas ni bsam byas pas// bdag gi lhar ni bsgom pa yis// de yang rdzas la gdab par bya// rnam pa gnyis kyi rdzas rnams sbyang// snying po phyag rgya sngags
69b6
1kyi lha// spyan drang mchod pa ci rigs bya// yang dag tshigs bcad 'di brjod bya// sangs rgyas yab yum sras dang bcas// gnyen dang gnyen 'dun g.yog 'khor bcas// 'dus pa'i lha tshogs kyis bskor
70a1
1nas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyes mdzad cing// gnas 'dir rtse phyir gshegs su gsol// stong las sbyar bas rtag tu de nyid dam par 'byung// nam mkha' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar 'gro/
70a2
1blangs nas bde 'gro bde bar gshegs pa mdzad// dpal chen rdo rje sems dpa' de ni bdag/ A+oM chos sku'i rang bzhin dag pas na// bdag kyang rang bzhin rnam par dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
70a3
1kyi// thugs dam dbyings mchog rang nyid ni// sems can 'byams klas ma lus kun// sku mchog bsgrub phyir sbyor bas ni// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun 'dus pas// sku yi dbyig tu bdag bskyed gcig/ A+o~M rdo rje
70a4
1sems dpa'i dam tshig rjes su bsrung// ye shes sems dpa' nye ba nyid du spyod// dgongs pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan par dgongs// thugs rje'i dbyig gis bdag la chags par mdzod// byams pa'i mchog
70a5
1gis bdag la bde bar skyongs// phun sum tshogs pa ldan pas bdag la bde bar skyongs// byin rlabs mchog gis bdag la byin gyis rlobs// grub pa 'phrul gyis bdag la dngos grub stsol// las rnams kun
70a6
1la bdag gi sems nyid bde bar 'gyur// de nas sngags mkhan mnyam gzhag ste// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas sngags mkhan dag pa yis// da ni sngags dang phyag rgya yis// lha yi 'dun pa bskyed
70b1
1par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag pa yis// brjid pa mtha' nas gang bya zhing// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// oM AHhU~M su ra to pa so kA ma le/ mA le badzra a mr-i te ha rAn pra
70b2
1tIts+tsha b+ha ga wAn/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ a la la ho AH/ pa na peM pe nu su ra to// ti pu pa ra mu sarba ta thA ga ta sing+d+hi hu sa ma yo ta mu/ sarba ma hA su kha sing+d+hi hu/ A+o~M hU~M/ A+o~M e sa hu pe sa hu/ sa ma ya b+hak+Sha hu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M
70b3
1dzaHhUM baM hoH A+oM pra tIts+tsha/ de nas rang gis bzas byas nas/ tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya// bla ma rnams la sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sdom pa la ni gang gnas pa// ji snyed
70b4
1sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha rnams dang ni mi rnams rnams dang// sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor rnams// de dag khros nas khrag chen po// khyod kyi snying nas drangs te
70b5
1'thung// i dan+te na ra kan ba ri hri da ye/ sa ma d+hI nAM sa ma ya yak+Sha na da s+thi ro ba b+had badzra/ a mo to kaN/ o~M badzra a mr-i ta A ha roSh+Tha sha sa ma na hUM hrIHtha/ de nas yang dag 'di brjod do// de nas kun la phud
70b6
1spags nas// he ru ka dpal 'khor bcas rnams// dam tshig phud la dbang ba rnams// mchod sbyin he ru dpal bsgom ste// de yi brgyan dang sngags ldan pa// snying ga mgrin pa spyi bor ni// gnas gsum tshul
71a1
1bzhin bsrung byas te// rdo rje thal mo 'dzub mo gnyis// mdun gyi thad kar mdud par bya// gung mo mthe bong gnyis rtse sbyar// gzhan ma rnams ni 'di ltar btang/ A+o~M shrI he ru ma hA badzra/ a ko Ta
71a2
1ya/ a ko Ta ya/ pra we sha ya pra we sha ya/ b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ sarba badzra DAk+ki nI nAM/ hr-i da ya hUM hUM phaT/ shrI he ru ka'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di rnams
71a3
1kyis// yang dag tshul bzhin spyan drangs la// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya 'di// brtul zhugs thod pa'i lha mo yis// bstan nas tshul bzhin bzhugs su gsol// A+o~M ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI hU~M phaT// rdo rje lha mo tshogs
71a4
1kyi bdag/ he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sngags pas mchod bya ba// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud nas mnyes mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde
71a5
1ba'i mchod pa kun gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs bcas bsnams su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhugs// hU~M a la la ho// rnal 'byor
71a6
1bde mchog sgyu mar 'phrul// dam tshig bdag la 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa dag bsnams su gsol// nyon mongs thams cad gsal bar mdzod// ces gsungs so// de nas yang 'di gsungs
71b1
1so// rgyal ba'i cho ga rdzogs nas ni// lhag ma dag la 'jug par bya// de nas btung dang zas la sogs// zos pa'i lhag ma phud bsres la// lhag ma'i dam la gnas pa
71b2
1rnams// mchod phyir sngags mkhan bsgoms pa dang// bsrung dang spyan drang mchod pa dang// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya dang// bzhugs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya dag/ gong nas 'byung ba bzhin byas te// brtul
71b3
1zhugs rtogs pa'i lha mo yis// 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags bzlas la// yang dag mchod pa dbul bar bya/ A+o~M bung+d+ha DAk+ki nI pra tI ts+tsha mAM ba liM o~M phaT/ A+oM badzra DAk+ki nI pra tI ts+tshi mAM de ba liM hUM phaT/ A+oM rat+na DAk+ki nI pra
71b4
1tI ts+tsha mAM ba liM traM phaT/ A+o~M pad+ma DAk+ki nI pra tI ts+tsha mAM ba liM hri phaT/ A+oM karma DAk+ki nI pra tIts+tsha mAM ba liM a phaT/ A+o~M badzra e sa hu/ be sa hu/ sa ma ya b+hak+Sha hu/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH pra tIts+tsha/ rdo rje bcings pa
71b5
1gnyis sbyar te// rgyab sbyar mthe'u chung sbrel te// mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas ni// bsdams pas las ni thams cad byed// brkyang bskum pa yi tshul bya'o// A+oM DAk+ki nI A kar+Sha ya/ pra we sha ya pra we sha ya/ b+han
71b6
1d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya sarba badzra DIk+ki nI nAM/ hri da ya hU~M dza/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH DAk+ki nI hU~M dzaH dpal DIk+ki nI'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo gnyis sbyar te// sbom po gnyis ni dbus su bzung// lhag
72a1
1ma 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// bde ba dang ni pad+ma'i bdag/ de nyid las ni bya ba ni// sbom po gnyis ni btegs byas te// bkug pa de ni rta gdong phyag rgya ste// dngos grub chen po la sogs pa// skad
72a2
1cig gcig gis 'grub pa'o// o~M badzra ba dra ba mu kha/ A kar+Sha ya/ A kar+Sha ya/ pra we sha ya pra we sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ to sha ya/ to sha ya/ sarba badzra DAk+ki nI nAM/ hri da ya/ ha ha/ hi hi/ o~M AHhUM/ dpal rta
72a3
1mgrin gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rta yi rgyal po'i sa bon ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te// mthe bong dang ni srin lag gi/ sngags pas de bsgom bar du hrIH/ sngags mkhan phyag rgya 'di btab
72a4
1nas// gtor ma bdag nyid byin brlabs te// sngags 'di rjes su brjod bya zhing// ci bde bar ni gshegs su gsol// oM AHhUM uts+tshiSh+ta badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po de rnams kyis// mchod pa'i
72a5
1cho ga rdzogs par smras// gtor ma'i mchod pas tshims byed pa// rgyud rnams kun gyi rgya mtsho ste// til mar thigs pas kun la khyab// thams cad kun nas bsdus pa 'di// rgyud mchog 'di ru nga yis
72a6
1smras// rgyud rnams bsdus pa'i man ngag 'di// rgyud 'di'i nang du smras pa'o//// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs snang ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po 'jig rten snang byed las/ rgyud thams cad
72b1
1kyi gtor ma'i man ngag/ las thams cad kyi rgyal po'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya ni// zhi dang
72b2
1rgyas dang dbang dang drag/ rgyu rnams kun la rab gnas ni// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams sam// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams dang// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams sam// lcags sam nag po'i
72b3
1shing rnams la// rab gnas bya na ji ltar bya// zhes gsol to// bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor rtogs pa bsal ba'i phyir/ khyod kyis zhus pa nga yis bshad// legs par nyan pa'i 'khor rnams dang// rnal 'byor
72b4
1dpa' bo'i don ched du// lung bstan lung ma bstan pa yi// mkhas par bslab pa'i bzo mkhan ni// shes rab rnam pa du mar sbyangs// skyer pa lo mig bcu pa dang// nyal po sbal pa'i shing dag la// phrin las
72b5
1rnam bzhi'i sngags bzlas shing// phyogs bzhi rgyas par bzhog par bya// gri kha lho byang shar nub bstan// kha ni 'dzab dang mi 'bral bas// sor brgyad bcu gnyis bco brgyad drug/ sems can rnams dang tshul
72b6
1bstun nas// mtheb gong 'og tu rgya mdud bya// sor bzhi lcum gzhog 'og ma yang// gong ma bzhin du shes par bya// dbal ni chu srin kha nas dbyung// tshig bzhi kun la sbrul gyis brgyan// rtse mo zur bzhi dbal
73a1
1dang bcas// de bzhin lugs mkhan mkhas pas kyang// spra tshil dag la gzugs byas la// dkar po'i shing la zhi ba'i gzugs// rtse mo gnam la bstan la gzhag/ phrin las sngags kyang de
73a2
1bzhin bzlas// lugs ma yang ni de bzhin te// de bzhin dngul la bya ba'o// mdzo mo glang gal dmar po'i shing// thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir// gri kha dpa' bo'i ngos su bzhog/ zangs sam 'jon dmar
73a3
1de bzhin te// lugs ma mkhas pas de bzhin bya// shir shing nag po la sogs pa'i// nag po tsher ma can gyi shing// mkhas pas gri kha phar bstan la// sa lcags gnam lcags khro chu las// mi rta mang po bsad
73a4
1pa dang// de bzhin rang thag phal pa'i lcags// de ni mgar ba mkhas pas bya// goms shing mkhas par bslab pa yi// rigs bzhi bzo bos de ltar bya// zhi ba shar la dbang ni nub// rgyas pa lho la drag
73a5
1po byang// slob dpon sngags mkhan de bzhin no// de bzhin bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ phur pa rab gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bcu
73a6
1gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor yang dag bsam gtan las// yi dam rgyun du bya ba dang// sgrub pa 'jug tu gdags pa dang// sngags la yid
73b1
1ches bskyed pa'i phyir// yang snying man ngag bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa// hom khung 'brub khung kha khyer gsum dang ldan/ kha la thod pa tshar gsum btang// bang rim la ni rdo rje ste// phyi la me ri yang dag
73b2
1btang// nang du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ni// mu khyud rdo rje ra bar ldan// lte ba la ni yaMdang raM// de nas phur pa byin brlabs dbang bskur te// rgya mdud dang po chos kyi sku// bar ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
73b3
1sku// zur gsum longs spyod rdzogs pa la// sprul pa rdo rje gzhon nu bsgom// dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs pa ni// phur pa dag la de bzhin dgod// de ltar ting 'dzin gyi sems// spyan drangs pa yi sngags kyis
73b4
1ni// spyan drangs sngags kyang de bzhin brjod// A+o~M badzra kI li kI la ya sa ma ya dzaHdzaH lha tshogs thams cad spyan yang drangs// dral zhing dbab la brtan par bzhugs// ji ltar ji ltar de bzhin bstim// badzra kI
73b5
1li kI la ya na maHya ho/ phyag 'tshal ba'i cho ga'o// badzra kI li kI la ya na maHya ho dz+nya ya ru/ de ni yang dag brjod pa'o/ A+o~M badzra kI li kI la ya/ ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta khA hi/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta khA hi/ ma
73b6
1hA go ro tsa na khA hi/ sngags kyi mchod pa yang dag ste// lha rnams rtsa ba rtsa ba la// btags la lha rnams tshim par byas/ rgyun gyi sngags rnams brjod pa ste// A+o~M badzra kI li kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M hU~M phaT/ bdun
74a1
1'bum grangs ni thon par bya// de nas yang snying rab tu bzlas// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe gsum// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye gsum// gu gul tshil chen sbra tshil gsum// de rnams dgu ka'i sbyor
74a2

74a3

74a4

74a6

74b1

74b2

74b3

74b4

74b5

74b6
1gis na// dngos po gcig la so sor mthong// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// thams cad med mthong med mthong ba// mthong ba med na mthong ba yin/ kha dog dbyibs dang
75a1
1ring thung dang// tha snyad brjod pa kun dang bral// bral ba yang dag lam gyi mchog/ de ni sangs rgyas dngos po yin// sngags dang phyag rgya bya ba med// dngos po kun nas bsam pa yin// bsam du
75a2
1med pa'i sems kyang yin// de ni rtsa ba sems kyi mchog/ tshig dang yi ge dpe las 'das// phyi yi dngos po yang dag yin// nam mkha' bzhin du dang bar mthong// de ni dngos gzhi yang dag yin// byams dang snying rje rtsa ba
75a3
1med// bsdu ba'i dngos po gzhag tu med// mtshan dang dpe byad blta ru med// mchod dang bstod pa bshags su med// bsgom par bya ba bsgom du med// sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o// de na dngos po dngos med
75a4
1par// bsgom pa thams cad bsgom du med// sangs rgyas bya ba brjod du med// de bzhin nam mkha' mtshon pa'i dpe// nam mkha' la yang nam mkha' med// nam mkha' gzhal du med pa la// chos nyid dpe ru
75a5
1gzhag tu med// bsam pa'i dngos po kun las 'das// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor tshig las 'das// dam tshig bsnyen pa bsgrub las 'das// gzhal yas khang du med par
75a6
1'das// lha tshogs dkyil 'khor mtha' las 'das// brjod pa'i tha snyad dpe las 'das// thams cad thams cad kun las 'das// byang chub sems ni rang bzhin 'das// phung po khams dang skye mched
75b1
1'das// sems dang sems su snang las 'das// chos dang chos su snang las 'das// stong pa nyid ni stong las 'das// de bzhin nyid kyang mtha' las 'das// chos kyi dbyings las 'das pa yang// bsam du
75b2
1med pa'i ngang du 'das// yul dang yum can gnyis su med// chos dang chos can gnyis su med// tshor ba rig shes gnyis su med// zla ba chu zla gnyis su med// bya dang sgo nga gnyis su med// mtshams dang
75b3
1bsrung ba gnyis su med// zung dang zung du 'jug pa med// nyin mo mtshan mo gnyis su med// skyes pa bud med gnyis su med// g.yas dang g.yon pa gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// me
75b4
1dang du ba gnyis su med// kun rdzob don dam gnyis su med// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa// 'jig rten snang byed las/ chos thams cad rang
75b5
1bzhin gyi lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye kye sangs rgyas sa ru mngon nas gsungs// gsungs pa'i don ni ji ltar
75b6
1lags// lam dang sa la brten pa'i phyir// gang zag dbang po rab 'bring gi/ phan tshun nus pa'i dbang rnams shod// ces gsol to// smin pa'i lam du bsten pa la// phan dang nus la ngas bshad kyis// nyan pa
76a1
1po yi blo la rtogs// dang po shes rab rnam pa gsum// mkhas shing mang por sbyangs pa yis// theg pa phyogs ni med pa la// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid shes// sngags mkhan mkhas pa de yis ni//
76a2
1dang po sa yi las rnams bya// phyi nang gnyis kyis sbyang sa la// sa la stegs bu brtsig par bya// dkyil 'khor cha ni mnyam pa la// thig bzhi btab pas le'u tshe dgu// le'u tshe re re bskor bar bya//
76a3
1phyogs bzhir phyag rgya ma nor bzhag/ rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dang// rin po che dang pad+ma dang// las kyi phyogs su rgya gram bzhag/ tshon gyi kha dog phyogs dang bstun// bum pa bzang po lnga rnams su//
76a4
1rin po che la bya bar bshad// dkar po dang ni ser po dang// dmar po sngon po de bzhin ljang// bum pa kha dog nges par bya/ kha tshar ma nyams ras dag la// sngags kyi rgyal pos gdab par bya// tA la rgya shug dkar po yis/
76a5
1kha rgyan yang ni bya ba'o// yab dang yum dang shes rab thabs// sbyor mtshams byang chub sems kyis ni// bum pa'i nang du byang chub sems// gang la gang bas dgang bar bya// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya//
76a6
1rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan yang drangs// ye shes bdud rtsi chu rgyun dbab// so so'i las dang mtshan ma'o// stegs bu stegs bu bsham par bya// lha rnams ngo bstan dam tshigabasgrag/ ltas dang rmi lam lta ru gzhug/
76b1
1ngag gi nyes pa bsal ba'i phyir// so shing byin la so rtsa brud// phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub brtags// srung ba'i lha mos byin brlabs pa'i// bsrung skud dpung pa g.yas g.yon gdags// snod du rung dang mi rung ba//
76b2

76b3

76b4

76b5

77a2

77a3

1ldog/ tha chung gi gnam stong la ldog/ de bzhin du dbyar ra ba'i tshes gnyis dang lnga la ldog/ de bzhin du 'bring po'i tshes bdun la ldog/ tha chung gi tshes bcu gcig la ldog/ de bzhin du ston zla ra ba'i nyi shu lnga
80b1
1la ldog/ de bzhin du 'bring po'i tshes gsum la ldog/ tha chung gi tshes gnyis la ldog/ de bzhin du dgun zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la ldog/ de bzhin du 'bring po'i nyi shu dgu ldog/ de bzhin du tha chung gi nyi shu bdun
80b2
1la ldog de ni ldog pa'i sde pa ste/ sngags mkhan gyi rtog pa bsal ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ thebs ldog pa'i le'u ste nyi shu
80b3
1pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kI la ya yi sku gdung mchog/ de ring bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkon mchog bstan pa
80b4
1bshig pa dang// tshe srog bar du gcod pa dang// bkrag dang gzi mdangs phrog pa dang// bar chad byed pa'-i dgra bgegs rnams// gro ga la ni ming bris la// gur gum bzang po dme khrag gam// nan tan nyid
80b5
1du byas pa de// dur khrod sa'am phung shul sa// bkra ma shis pa'i sa la ni// dang por brko ba'i las rnams bya// rak+ta bdud rtsis sbyangs pa yis// 'jim pa 'bi 'bi byas pa'i nang// ming dang gzugs de rab tu
80b6
1bzhug/ kI la ya yis mgo drangs la// a ko Ta yas sham bu byas// mA ra ya ni dbus su bzhug/ snying po rdo rje gzhon du ste// glo 'bur bcu ni khro bo bcu// de bzhin phra man phra thabs dang// sprul pa rnams ni bar
81a1
1bar du// gnas dang yul gyis ma mo dang// shwa na dang ni re ma ti// de bzhin sa bdag bzhi po yang// phyi yi pad+ma'i sna la bzhag/ gdan gyi pad+ma'i 'jug dag la// dbang phyug ma ni yang dag
81a2
1bzhag/ bgegs rnams gnan par bya ba'i phyir// mched rten sngon po nag po yis// bgegs kyi ling+ga gnan par bya// bye ba bdun 'bum grangs snyed kyi// mchod rten la ni lhar byas la// bgegs ni bskal
81a3
1par mi thar zhes// nga yis smras pa yongs su bsgrag/ gal te rlung la 'debs byed na// bi tsi ram+ba yang dag mngag/ gal te chu la 'debs byed na// chu sman 'debs byed rab tu mngag/ gal te me la 'debs
81a4
1byed na// gtsug phud lnga pa yang dag mngag/ de rnams kun gyi snying po ni// bar bar ma nor de bzhin gzhug/ A+oM badzra kI la kI la ya/ sarba big+h+nAM baM hU~M/ tri che ge mo mA ra ya a ko Ta ya a ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ bsnyen pa
81a5
1bdun 'bum sngon du bya// sngags mkhan rgyal pos yang dag ni// drag po bgegs kyi las su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ las
81a6
1gcig rdung gi man ngag mchog gi thabs chen po/ tsha tsha mchod rten gyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i lam gyi sbyor ba zhus pa/ kye
81b1
1bcom ldan 'das shin tu gsang ba'i lam 'di bshad du gsol/ zhes pas shin tu gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par bzhugs te/ shin tu gsang ba'i don 'di lta bu gsungs so// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor
81b2
1ba'i lam// mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam// bar chad med pa gang yin pas// bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs par 'brel// nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma nor
81b3
1bskyed// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// bdag gi denyid kho na ste// byin brlab dbang bskur bya ba ni// 'khor lo bzhi dang sdom pa bzhi// rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas na// thabs dang shes rab ldan
81b4
1pa yis// sngags mkhan mkhas pa gang yin pa// gyen du rgyu dang thur du rgyu/ rnam pa bcu po gnyis su 'gyur// srog dang rtsol ba las byung ba// rim pa rlung gi de kho na// sngags la dmigs pa zhes bya ba// sngags
81b5
1kyi de nyid kho na'o// de nas bdag gi de kho nyid// nam mkha' khams kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gzhal yas rdzogs rjes la// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor bsam// de yi dbus su rgyal ba rnams// cho
81b6
1ga gnyis kyis rdzogs byas la// phyag rgya bzhi yi rgya yis gdab// snying gar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// rang gi gtso bos dbu la brgyan// sems dpa' gsum gyi sbyor ba yis/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa
82a1
1ste// yan lag bzhi dang rab tu 'brel// de dang dkyil 'khor bzhi ru 'brel// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni brtan par bya// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs pa dang// rlung gi bsam pa yang dag bya// rlung
82a2
1bcing bya ba ma gtogs par// bsam gtan bya ba yod ma yin// de ltar rang nyid byin brlabs pas// sbyor ba'i cho ga las byung ba'i// 'khor lo bzhi rnams rab tu dmigs// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa
82a3
1rnams// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'o// pad+ma 'dab ma las byung ba'i// sa bon yi ge rnams kyis mtshan// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang la// khro bdag 'jigs pa'i yi ge dang// dang po'i yi ge haM gis
82a4
1mtshan// de nyid 'gog pa bde ba'i lam// de ni bde ba chen po'i sku// de nyid smin par byed pa yi// dang po bum pa'i dbang du gsungs// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// dbang mchog de la gnas
82a5
1pa'o// 'bras bu lam gyi tshul 'chang na// ngag ni tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs mtshungs// lte ba la ni yi ge hrIH// de nyid lam du gsungs pas na// longs spyod rdzogs pa longs spyod sku// mthong ba'i lam dang
82a6
1bsgom pa'i lam// gsang ba'i dbang du yang dag 'gro// bden pa bzhi yi rang bzhin can// thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig pas// lte ba la ni yi ge hUM// thabs dang shes rab mtha' dag tu// de bzhin rnam pa kun
82b1
1'byung bas// chos kyi sku yi bdag nyid pas// shes rab ye shes gang yin pas// bar chad med pa'i lam du 'gro// gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang// thun mong mtshan dang rnam ldan pa// rnam pa gnyis su
82b2
1'gyur bas na// phyogs mtshams dag ni rigs rnams kyang// sa bon gnyis kyi mtshan ma ste/ lte ba la ni yi ge A+oM// sdug bsngal bdag nyid ldan pas na// sprul pa don mdzad gang yin pa// 'khor lo tshogs chen
82b3
1bzhi pa'i dbang// mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje yis// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'o// rtsa ni chu yi khams yin te// byang chub sems kyis gang bar gnas// de snyed rnam pa ji snyed pa'ang// sum brgya drug cu yang
82b4
1dag gnas// byang chub sems ni sprin gyi khams// thabs kyi cho gas kun tu rgyug/ rang byung ye shes brag yin te// kun 'dar kha phye 'od gsal mthong// phra mo'i thig le nA da dang// 'od ni sangs rgyas thams
82b5
1cad kyis// byang chub chen po bla na med// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// sngags la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur// sngags la dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// stong nyid ye shes mthong bar byed// sngags la
82b6
1dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// thabs kyi bye brag mang po ni// bsam gyis mi khyab man ngag ste// me dang rlung gi sbyor ba yis// dang po dga' ba bskyed par byed// gnyis pa dga' ba'i dga' ba bskyed// gsum
83a1
1pa shin tu dga' ba bskyed// bzhi pa mchog tu dga' ba bskyed// sbyor ba'i mtshams su phaT kyis 'phangs// pad+ma zla ba kha sbyar ba// de yi tshangs pa'i bu ga nas// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba
83a2
1yis// dbugs ni thig le nyid du gzhag/ sngags la dmigs pa'i byang chub 'grub// gsang ba'i gnas su zhu bar byed// 'od zer thabs kyi byin rlabs kyis// byang chub sems ni rab zhu bas// mi rtog ye shes
83a3
1skye bar byed// lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis// dang po sngags kyi drod tshad ni// 'dar ba dang ni sprug dang 'phar// bar snang dag la phur bar byed// de nyid thabs kyi man ngag ni// bying rgod sbubs ni rab zhi
83a4
1nas/ khams kyi zas dang rnam bral nas// dal bar rgyu ba 'byung bar byed// de nas gzugs kyi mthong ba'i chos// smig rgyu lta bu'i rnam pa dang// du ba lta bu'i rnam pa dang// srin bu me khyer 'dra ba dang// mar
83a5
1me'i tshul dang nam mkha' bzhin// 'od gsal zung 'jug bde ba che// ye shes bde ba de nyid las// zla ba drug dang bcu gnyis dang// bco brgyad bcu drug sum cu gnyis// de bzhin skye ba gcig gis
83a6
1'grub// gal te des kyang ma 'grub na// snon pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// 'phags pa'i thugs rje ma byung yang// rang rig ye shes blo ldan na// mi tshe gcig gis 'grub par nges// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad
83b1
1kyis// rnam par grol ba'i lam du grags// lam mchog rgyal ba mngon pa 'di// nyan dang 'chad dang klog pa dang// de bzhin yi ge 'bri mchod dang/ kha ton sbyin pa bsgom pa rnams// rnal 'byor rab kyi skal ba
83b2
1ste// ngan song gsum las rnam par thar// rgyu mthun 'bras bu der bzhag nas// skye bas mthong ba'i gang zag la// srid pa tha ma skye bar 'gyur// gang gis 'di la mnyam gzhag na// sa rnams kyi ni ming yang
83b3
1med// rnam par shes pa ye shes mchog/ zab mo'i don rnams mthong gyur te// sku gsum bde ba mngon byang chub// mya ngan mi 'da' mi bkri drang// 'di las gshegs pa'i gnas med do// dus gsum rgyal
83b4
1ba thams cad kyang// chos kyi sku las yongs mi 'da'// chos sku'i yon tan chen po ni// gang zhig rgyal ba'i zhing gi khyon// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig
83b5
1rten snang byed las// lam gsang ba'i man ngag gi dngos grub bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'jig rten dag gi mi rnams
83b6
1kyis// sangs rgyas gzugs ni mthong mi 'gyur// de bzhin nyid la sogs pa yang// bltas nas mthong ba ma yin te// so so'i las kyis de ltar mthong// gal te ji snyed mthong na ni// de nyid rgyal ba dam
84a1
1pa'o// nga yang sus kyang ma mthong ste// nga mthong zer ba su yis mthong// de yis nga ni mthong mi 'gyur// rang rig ye shes bya ba ni// sems can kun la mnyam par gnas// de nyid mthong na
84a2
1mthong ba yin// mis kyang mi la mthong ba med// de bzhin lha la sogs pas kyang// sangs rgyas gang yang mthong ba med// stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs na// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas mthong ba yin// sems la
84a3
1sems kyis bltas pas na// mthong ba med na mthong ba'i mchog/ de yi bsgom pa bsgom pa min// bsgom du med na sgom pa'i mchog/ de bzhin brjod du yod ma yin// brjod du med na brjod pa'i mchog/ de
84a4
1bzhin blta ru yod ma yin// blta ru med na lta ba'i mchog/ de bzhin bsam du yod ma yin// bsam du med na bsam pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba// mtshan dang dpe byad med pa yin// ngag
84a5
1dang gsung dbyangs med pa yin// tshig dang tha snyad med pa yin// sems dang dran rtog med pa yin// thugs dang bsam du med pa yin// las dang dkyil 'khor med pa yin// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa
84a6
1med// zung dang zung du 'jug pa med// don dam kun rdzob bya ba med// thabs dang shes rab bya ba med// skyes pa bud med bya ba med// nyin mo mtshan mo bya ba med// de ltar thams cad med mthong na// sangs
84b1
1rgyas bya ba sangs rgyas yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las zag pa med pa sangs rgyas bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum
84b2
1pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye bdag cag yongs la/ bdag dang gzhan la spobs pa bskyed du gsol/ dga' ba bskyed du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/
84b3
1sems can rnams la phan pa'i don ngas bshad par bya'o/ khyed cag dag dga' ba bskyed par gyis shig/ sngags mkhan dga' ba skyed pa'i phyir/ khyad par gyi dam tshig dang/ khyad par gyi lta ba dang/ khyad par
84b4
1gyi spyod pa dang/ khyad par gyi ting nge 'dzin bstan par bya'o/ khyad par gyi dam tshig bstan pa ni/ slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// ngan song gsum las thar mi 'gyur/ khyad par lta ba bstan pa ni// ci yang med
84b5
1pa'i sems nyid la// bcos su yod par ngas ma bstan/ khyad par spyod pa bstan pa ni// rig ma dag la spyod pa ste// bza' ba'i zas la sngags la bzlas la// dam tshig can rnams spyan drangs te// gdug pa
84b6
1rnam gnyis tshogs la bstim/ khyad par ting 'dzin bstan pa ni// spyi bo haM la mgrin par hrIH/ snying gar hUM la lte bar A+oM// yi ge gang yin yan lag la// thabs kyi sbyor bas 'od du zhu// de nyid yongs su khyab pa
85a1
1las// nyal ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin ni// drug po bkag nas nyal ba'i tshe// 'od gsal mthong bar nga yis bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dang// yan lag nyi shu rtsa brgyad nyid// dam
85a2
1tshig kun gyi gzhi dang rtsa// spyod pa sdom rtsol spyad kyang// lta ba ma nyams dam tshig yin// mo rnams kun la smad mi bya// gdol pa mo yang dang du blang/ khyad par rigs can gces par gzung// de yang dam tshig
85a3
1rtsa ba yin// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// de yang dam tshig rtsa ba yin// tan gaN spyod pa rgyun du spyod// de yang dam tshig rtsa ba yin// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
85a4
1dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ mdo'i dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang 'dus pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bstod do// dmar
85a5
1nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i skur bstan pa// shin tu mi bzad dpal chen rdo rje'i sku// zhe sdang thugs mchog yak+Sha he ru ka/ ye shes sku mchog rig 'dzin 'khor
85a6
1gyis brgyan// dmigs med thugs ni don dam dbyings na gsal// gsung gi nga ro stong gsum gang bar sgrogs// sprul pa'i byin rlabs khro bcu dbyings nas 'gyed// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i rgyan
85b1
1gyis brgyan// g.yas kyi zhal mdog ljang nag bstan pa ni// phrin las bcol ba thams cad 'grub pa'i rtags// g.yon gyi zhal mdog dmar nag bstan pa ni// dbang drag rnam gnyis dus gcig rdzogs pa'i
85b2
1rtags// skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i mche gtsigs shing// bdud dgra nyes byed thal ba'i rdul du rlog/ rdo rje rtse dgu phyag na bsnams pa ni// sa dgu 'joms shing ye shes dgu dang sbyor// rdo rje rtse lnga bar na
85b3
1bsnams pa ni// rgyud lnga sbyang zhing sku lngar 'dren par mdzad// rdo rje ye shes me dpung bsnams pa ni/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i bags chags sreg par mdzad// rdo rje kha T+wA~M zhing chen bzung ba ni// bdud
85b4
1bzhi thal bar rlog cing dbang du sdud// rdo rje ri rab phur bu 'dril zhing 'debs// 'gal byed ma lus thams cad sgrol ba'i rtags// glang chen stag lpags zhing chen rgyan gyis brgyan// che btsan dpe med khams
85b5
1gsum rgyal por bstod// thod sprul la sogs sku la brgyan pa ni// gdug pa thams cad zil gyi mnon par mdzad// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa ni// dug dang bag chags ngan pa bsreg
85b6
1pa'i rtags// rngam pa'i zhal nas hU~M sgra 'brug stong sgrogs pa ni// bdud dang srin po'i sgra skad zil gyis mnon// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul du dbyings dang sbyor// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs gdug
86a1
1pa 'dul// sprul pa'i byin rlabs phyogs bcur sprin ltar gtibs// thugs rje rtse gcig breng breng rgyun mi dgongs/ A+oM badzra kI la kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM hUM phaT/ ces bstod do// de bzhin
86a2
1gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten snang byed las/ kI la ya la bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu ste rtsa lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag
86a3
1pos zhus pa/ chos kyi phung po yang mang por bshad du gsol/ ston pa'i phung po mang po yang bshad du gsol/ gnas kyi phung po yang bshad du gsol/ 'khor gyi phung po mang po yang bshad du gsol/ dus kyi phung
86a4
1po mang po yang bshad du gsol/ zhes gsol to// chos kyi phung po bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi phung po ni gsum ste/ lung dang rgyud dang mdo'o// ston pa'i phung po ni gsum ste/ sku gsum gyi bye brag go/ gnas kyi phung
86a5
1po ni gsum ste/ 'og min pad+ma can gyi gnas dang/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo dang/ mi yul gser gling la sogs pa'o// 'khor gyi phung po ni gsum ste/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i 'khor ro// dus kyi phung po ni gsum
86a6
1ste/ bya ba byed pa'i dus dang/ dus kyi mtha'i dus dang/ skad cig ma'i dus so// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dgongs pa/ 'jig rten snang byed las/ phun
86b1
1sum tshogs pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
86b2
1dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bstan par zung zhig ces ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ byang chub chen po bla na med// 'da' ka
86b3
1de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog gi rtags// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ phyogs bcu dus gsum de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// brag khung kha ni byang du
86b4
1blta// nyi ma 'char ba'i skabs med ltar// so sor smin cing sdug bsngal ba// grol bar bya phyir bla med gnas// bstan phyir longs spyod rdzogs par bstan// lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog tu// mgon po kun la
86b5
1snyoms pa ngas// rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor ba las// ljags kyi dbang por bdar nas ni// chos rnams kun gyi snying po 'di// kun gyi don du gsungs pa 'di// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang// sangs rgyas
86b6
1de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// rnal 'byor don ni bstan par zung// so so'i skye bo ji snyed pa// yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin pa dang// nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang// 'chang dang kha ton byed pa dang// de sems pa
87a1
1dang sgom pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis rab bsngags pa// yon tan thams cad 'byung bar
87a2
1'gyur// sa yi khyad par bgrod nas ni// bde ba chen po 'byung ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rnams// rtogs shing 'dzin par byed pa dang// rtag tu 'chang ba gang
87a3
1yin pa// de nyid nga dang 'dra bas na// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang rnams dang// gsang ba'i don du bstan pa yin// dngos po rnams kyi dam tshig kyang// mthong bzhin rtogs na rtogs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs
87a4
1pa'i de bzhin mchog/ de bzhin nyid du gnas bcas nas// mu stegs la sogs skal med bzhin// mgon po kun gyi thugs rje yis// las 'phro can dang 'phrad par shog/ gang gi de bzhin gnas 'gyur ba// de
87a5
1bzhin mthong ba de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid kyang dbyings nyid las// rtsol ba med pa'i rtsol sems dang// dmigs pa med pa'i dmigs sems dang// bsgoms du med pa'i bsgom pa yis// shes rab
87a6
1rnam gsum bdag nyid can// sa lam ye shes thob 'gyur bas// ye dag ye shes mthong 'gyur ba// de ni lhun gyis grub pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pas rab bsngags pas// 'phags pa byis pa'i skye bo
87b1
1dang// rang gzhan dag gi skye bo rnams// gang gis 'dir dad gyur pa la// dam pa 'di la bstan pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kI la ya'i rgyal po la/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/ mgrin gcig dang
87b2
1dbyangs gcig tu 'di skad bstod pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po'i bdag/ sku gsung thugs kyis kun la khyab/ bdag cag kun gyis mthong phyag 'tshal// de bzhin
87b3
1gshegs pa thams cad kyi// yang dag ye shes rtogs 'dzin pa// rab tu mos pas dus gsum du// dpa' bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// byang chub snying po can rnams kyis// don de nyan cing 'dzin dang
87b4
1'chang// bsgoms nas gzhan la ston pa ni// ston pa bzhin du bdag phyag 'tshal// yang dag ye shes rgyud rgyal 'di// mthong dang mos dang 'bri dang nyan// gang gis ming tsam 'dzin pa yang// ston pa bzhin du
87b5
1bdag phyag 'tshal// ton pa bstan pa bla med las// mgur gyi bum par dril nas su// ljags kyi dbang por bkram byas te// ye ge chos rnams kun gyi rgyu// ston pa bzhin du bdag phyag 'tshal// zhes gsol
87b6

90b1

90b3

90b4

90b5

90b6

91a1

94b4
1la g.yon pa dmar// skra dang dbu ni dmar ljang la// dang po me dpung rig ma 'khyud// rdo rje ral gri g.yas na'o// rin chen pad+ma g.yon na'o// rlung lha'i mtshams su yang dag gnas// phrag dog cha ni dag byed
94b5
1pa// dbang po'i grwar ni gzhag bya ste/ khams gsum rnam rgyal zhal gsum pa// zhal g.yas dkar la g.yon pa dmar// sku dang dbu ni ljang skya la// dang po me dpung rig ma 'khyud// lcags kyu ral gri rin chen
94b6
1pad// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag tu bsnams// gti mug cha ni dag byed pa/ khro bo chen po stobs chen yang// yang dag nyid du 'og tu gsungs// thams cad rdo rje'i go cha ste/ khro mo rnams kyi rigs dang
95a1
1mdog/ so so'i kha dog ji bzhin no// rang re'i lag cha lag na bsnams// zhes gsungs nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba las/ khro bo rnams kyi zhal dang phyag la
95a2
1sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das badzra kI la ya chen po de/ cho 'phrul snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de rnams kyi sprul pa sbyor ba
95a3
1mo bdag po rnams dga' bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo dam pa dpal rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang/ rdo rje snyems ma dang/ rdo rje dur khrod bdag mo dang/ rdo rje gtum mo dang/ rdo rje bskul byed ma dang/
95a4
1rdo rje sder mo dang/ rdo rje gtun khung ma dang/ rdo rje mda' snyems pa dang/ rdo rje gsod ma dang/ rdo rje bskyod ma dang/ gnyis su med par bzhugs pa de rnams kyi sprul pa yang/ byang chub kyi sems dkar dmar
95a5
1las grub pa'i phra men ma ste/ phag gi mgo can dang/ stag gi mgo can dang/ sha ba'i mgo can dang/ byi la'i mgo can dang/ seng ge'i mgo can dang/ g.yag gi mgo can dang/ gzig gi mgo can dang// spyang
95a6
