227a1
1ba de nyid sems las byung// mi rtog ye shes rnam rtog bgegs rnams sel// chos kun rang bzhin rnam dag 'od gsal dang// chos rnams thams cad ye nas stong zhing dben// ngang ngam shugs
227a2
1kyis rang bzhin thugs rje 'byung// sems nyid skye med cho 'phrul yi ger shar// 'byung ba lnga ni chos nyid yum gyi mkha'// nyon mongs lnga dag ye shes lnga ldan zhing// srid pa gsum ston rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye
227a3
1shes khro bo ngang dang shugs las grub// gnyis med tshul gyis ma gshegs srid par byon// bla med dbyings kyi ngang du ro gcig thim// chos nyid bde chen skye med brjod dang bral// thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro kun
227a4
1dbyings su sdud// ma brtags bzhin du ye nas lhun gyi grub// kun bzhi rnam shes 'og min gnas su sbyor// de tshe khams gsum 'khor ba'i gnas las bsgral/ de ltar don shes rig cing rtogs pa'i tshe// sku
227a5
1gsung thugs kyi sa la nges par phyin// phur pa gsang ba don rgyud las/ ye nas rang bzhin gnas pa'i le'u+u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rig pa ye shes kyis// chos kyi dbyings la bskul ba las// chos
227a6
1nyid ngang las rang sgrar shar ba'o// e ma ho/ rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la// tshig dang yi ger bstan med brjod dang bral/ skye med chos de sna tshogs ston par byed// brjod med de nyid rjod pa kun gyi
227b1
1mchog/ tshig kun gsal byed ye shes las byung ba// byin gyis rlabs kyis rab tu rtogs par byed// dngos po'i chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis stong// stong pa ma yin sems kyi snang bar shar// de la rang bzhin med
227b2
1de chu zla bzhin// snang stong gnyis med lta ba rnam par dag/ rang bzhin 'od gsal nyon mongs ngang gi dag/ spros pa'i mtha' bral rnam pa yongs cir min// rig pa 'gag med sna tshogs rol pa che// gzung
227b3
1'dzin rnam rtog sdug bsngal dbyings su shar// de la mtshan ma'i skyon gyis ma gos par// sgro skur bral ba'i ye shes chen po ste// lhun gyis grub pa'i bde chen kun spyod kyang// log rtog 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so
227b4
1sor shar// ma rig log rtog de nyid gnas su dag/ gnyis med chos sku mi rtog ye shes yin// rig 'dzin skal pa can gyis rtogs par 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas kun dang dgongs pa mnyam// rgyun gyi khyad par
227b5
1gyis kyang 'phags pa yin// don dam phur pa'i rang bzhin byang chub sems// ngo bo chos sku skye med rnam par dag/ mtshan nyid gnyis med bde chen zug rngu zhi// nges tshig dag pa'i mgo phur kun las
227b6
1dpa'// dbye na don dam rnam grangs ma yin dang// dbyings dang ye shes chos nyid chos kyi sku// skye med bde chen ma skyes dmigs med bral// ye nyid ji bzhin zab pa yang dag don// lhun grub la sogs rnam
228a1
1grangs mtshon de bstan// zhes 'byung/ phur pa gsang ba'i don rgyud las/ de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang rig pa'i ye shes kyis/ chos kyis
228a2
1dbyings la bskul ba rang byung 'di skad do// thog mar shes rab gsum la blo sbyangs pas// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dbab pa dang// blta ba'i sgro 'dogs bcad cing la bzlas te// ting 'dzin nyams kyi drod
228a3
1tshad shugs las 'byung// byang chub sems kyi don la 'dris par bya// mnyam pa nyid kyi don la blo bzhag ste// gzung 'dzin bag chags mtshan ma dag par bya// dngos po thams cad mi rtog zil gyis
228a4
1mnan// nyon mongs kun kyang dbang du bya zhing blang// bsgom du med pa'i don nyid rtogs par bya// yang na sangs rgyas dgongs pa rnal du dbab// mnyam nyid ngang la dus gsum rgyun du gnas// phyi rol yul gyi
228a5
1zhen pa bcad byas la// don dam skye med chos kyi dbyings su bsgom// chos nyid rig pa'i ye shes dag la ni// shes pa sangs stongs ji bzhin je gsal bsgom// rnam par mi rtog ye nas skye med las// skye ba'i
228a6
1cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang shar// cir yang ma yin cir snang chos kyi sku// stong nyid snang ba snang ba stong pa nyid// so so ma yin tha dad med par bslab// nyams blang tshe na lus ngag bcos su med// sems nyid
228b1
1nam mkha' 'dra ste rnam rtog bral// rtogs pa'i gdeng ldan chos nyid gtan la dbab// gdod nas ma skyes chos kyi dbyings su dag/ rig pa byang chub sems nyid rtogs nas kyang// rang bzhin ma skyes yongs su
228b2
1grub pa'i sku// snang la rang bzhin med pa 'ja' tshon 'dra// chu zla lta bu'i sangs rgyas 'od dang ldan// thugs kar dpal be'u yi ge 'bru dgu ni// gser la 'phra bkod bzhin du gsal bsgoms te// rdzogs pa'i
228b3
1rim pa gdams ngag tshul bzhin bsgom// rgod na skye med rmugs na chos nyid la// 'phro na bde chen bying na khro bo ste// ye shes lnga yi bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin// 'dzab kyi dgongs pa chu bo'i rgyun bzhin no// chos
228b4
1nyid ngang las sngags kyi sgra dbyangs blang// sems 'dzin bsam gtan ting 'dzin ma yengs bsgom// dbyings kyi ngang las rang byung rang grags bsam// de tshe rnam rtog dgra chen thams cad kun// gzung 'dzin
228b5
1mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su phur// gdeng ldan rnal 'byor nyes pas ma gos pas// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig bsad bcad pa// zhe sdang rang rgyud sems kyis ma yin te// byams dang snying rje ldan pa'i rnal
228b6
1'byor pas// rtogs pa klong du gyur pas dbyings su sgrol// ting 'dzin drod tshad las su rung gyur na// nam yang nyes pa'i skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur// sgrol bar rang rgyud las kyi srin por skyes// rnam par smin
229a1
1pas dmyal khams bco brgyad du// bskal pa grangs med gsum du sdug bsngal myong// de bas rnal 'byor phal gyis byar mi rung// phur pa gsang ba don rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bzhi
229a2
1pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos dbyings dam pa'i sku la rig ye shes kyis bskul ba/ rang byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos nyid mya ngan 'das pa phur pa'i don// rgyu 'bras gnyis las 'das pa'i byang
229a3
1chub sems// don dam chos nyid rang byung phur pa ni// phur ni chos dbyings pa ni mya ngan 'das// phur ni ye shes pa nyid byang chub sems// thugs rje chen po'i phur pa bla ma'i don// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sems
229a4
1kyi mtshan nyid yin// rgyud kyi rgyal po lung gi bla med pa// man ngag nges pa'i ngo bo kun dang bral// don dam brjod med blta ru med pa yin// skye dang 'gag med gzung dang 'dzin pa med// gsal la 'grib med
229a5
1'pho 'gyur med pa'i don// mtha' bral sgro skur 'khor 'das gnyis su med// snang stong dbyer med tha dad med pa'i don// theb shor med cing gsal la rnam rtog bral// chos kyi dbyings kyis gzung 'dzin
229a6
1gnyis la gdab// mya ngan 'das pas 'khor ba'i chos la gdab// ye shes chen pos mnyam pa nyid la gdab// byang chub sems kyis shes rab thabs la gdab// thugs rje'i phur pa 'gro drug kun la
229b1
1gdab// bla ma chen pos snod dang don la gdab// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid rnam par rtog la gdab// sems kyi sems nyid rtogs pa'i blo la'o// dbyings la btab pas don rnams rdzogs par byed// sems la
229b2
1btab pas rig pa'i ye shes shar// chos nyid mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su gdab// de lta'i don gyis theb pa gyur pa'i tshe// 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mya ngan 'das par bzla// sdug bsngal de nyid chos nyid byang
229b3
1chub sems// rnam rtog las ni ye shes skye 'gyur zhing// dmyal ba'i gnas nyid 'og min bla med gnas// de tshe ma lus phur pa gdab ces bya// don dam nges par gyur pa lta ba yin// gsal ba rnam rtog bral
229b4
1ba bsgoms pa yin// bya bral tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa 'bras bu yin// zhen chags 'dzin pa med pa spyod pa yin// 'khor 'das gnyis su med na sbyor ba yin// thugs rje'i gzungs kyis 'dzin na sgrol ba
229b5
1yin// don gnyis lhangs kyis rtogs na theb pa yin// gang du mi rtog 'dzin pa dam tshig yin// theb shor med pa'i don rtogs man ngag yin// mngon du gyur na mngon sum dkyil 'khor yin// don gnyis
229b6
1nyams su lon na ting 'dzin yin// gnas su bstab pa mchod pa chen po yin// byar med lhun gyis grub pa phrin las yin// rig pa gdeng du gyur pa dbang mchog ste// des na thams cad ma lus phur pa'i
230a1
1don// phur ni skye med pa ni 'gag pa med// phur ni gzung med pa ni 'dzin med don// phur ni ye shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings// phur ni thabs chen rdo rje yab kyis mkha'// pa ni shes rab pha rol
230a2
1phyin ma yum gyi klong// chos nyid dbyer med phur pa'i don gnyis kyis// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos thams cad dbyings su bsgral// stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun bsgral ba'i zhing// bsgral bya sgrol byed chos
230a3
1nyid gnyis su med// de yi don ni rang byung phur pa'i don// zhes 'byung ngo// phur pa gsang ba don gyi rgyud las/ rang byung phur pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje phur pa gsang ba don gyi rgyud rdzogs
230a4
1so////
230a5
1rgya gar skad du/ gup+ta gam+b+hi ra kun+tA gra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ sbad pa gsang ba zab mo bdud rtsi'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus
230a6
1gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kI la ya'i rgyal po de/ karma he ru ka la sogs pa'i he ru ka rnams dang/ rdo rje snyems ma la sogs pa'i yum rnams dang/ de bzhin du khro bo dang khro mo dang thabs cig tu/
230b1
1bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i khro bos bskor ba'i gnas/ phyi ltar du dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba dang/ nang ltar na rang bzhin gyi dur khrod dang/ gsang ba ltar na b+ha ga'i dbyings dang/ de na phra men pho mo dang/ sgo ma
230b2
1rnams dang/ srung ma bcu gnyis dang/ 'khor thams cad kyi phyi'i dur khrod chen por nyid kyi thugs las sprul nas/ gdug pa can tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs yang dag
230b3
1pa'i ye shes las dbu dang phyag bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur to// de nas rU tra nag po bsgral ba'i phrin las/ karma he ru ka la sogs pa bos te/ drag po ha ha dang ni hi hi'i sgra sgrogs pa/ gom pa'i stabs kyis sa
230b4
1gzhi gnon pa/ de lta bu gcig tu gyur nas/ de'i tshe rU tra nag po rab tu 'dar/ sa gzhi ni rab tu g.yos/ he ru ka thams cad ni mdangs dang ldan/ de nas rigs kyi he ru ka rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rU tra zhes
230b5
1bya lta ba log/ las kyis 'jig rten khams 'dir skyes// bdud rnams btul na bar chad nyung// med par byas na bstan pa gnyan// mtho ris 'phel dang dmyal khams stong// bsgral ba'i gnas ni dam pa
230b6
1bdun// srog don dka' dam las kyis nyams// 'dod pas nyams dang mtshan mas nyams// srog las nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// pha ma dang ni slob dpon gsod// 'di dag bsgral ba dam par bshad// don
231a1
1la nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag ma yin spyod pa mtho// 'di yang bsgral ba'i dmigs dam pa// bka' las nyams pa 'di lta bu// dam pa'i gsang ba 'chol bar spyod// dam tshig nges don
231a2
1ming gis kyang// sku gsung thugs kyi dam las 'das// de yang bsgral ba'i dmigs yin no// las kyi nyams pa'i mtshan nyid ni// 'chi bar shes kyang rnal 'byor 'tshe// dug tu shes kyang lto ru bza'// las
231a3
1kyis nyams te myur bar bsgral// 'dod pas nyams pa rku 'phrog sogs// mtshan mas nyams pa mtshan med spong// 'di bdun shin tu brtson byas la// drag po'i las 'di brtsam par bya// de bzhin gshegs
231a4
1pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ sbas pa zab mo las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dpal kI la ya'i bdag po de/ dbang bsgyur dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ karma he
231a5
1ru ka la sogs pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ phur pa bsgrub pa'i gnas de ni// ma mo'i gnas sam shing gcig drung// 'byung po mang po gang yod par// byas na las la phan 'dogs yod// bkra mi shis par byas
231a6
1gyur na// grib 'byin shugs kyis gting 'dzin 'grib// sa la g.yul ni bkye bar ni// bya bar shin tu bzang ba'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo dag la// mig dmar rgyu ba'i dus dag tu// sa la stegs bu che'am
231b1
1chung// brtsams te phrin las bzhi'i bro brdung// sta gon nyid kyang bya bar shis// de nas rdzas gsum tshogs par bya// 'tsho ba zas dang dug 'joms sman// nag po'i rigs kyi phur pa dag/ tshogs pa rdzas kyi
231b2
1rim pa'o// ma nyams gsar pa'i thig bkye la// rgya mdud dang po'i gzhal yas la// rigs lnga'i rgyal ba 'khor dang bcas// spyi dang rtse la yab yum gnyis// rgya mdud 'og ma'i gzhal yas la// steng 'og khro bo
231b3
1'khor dang bcas// zur brgyad khro mo phra men ma// bcu gnyis srung ma zur gsum logs// sgo ma bzhi ni rtsibs mchan la// de ltar gru gsum yum nyid la// phur pa'i rdzas rnams dgod par bya// de yang 'khor
231b4
1lo rtsibs bcu la// stobs po che dang hUM kA ra// shar stod nub smad gnyis su dgod// gzhan rnams rim pa dgod par bya// byang chub sems kyi phur pa ni// phur pa kun gyi rgyu ru grags// phur pa phur pa zhes bya
231b5
1ba// phur pa thugs kyi phur pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ rdzas kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u stai gnyis pa'o//// de nas karma he ru ka la sogs pas kI la
231b6
1ya'i bdag po la gsol pa// dbang sdud phur pa ji ltar lags// mnan pa'i phur pa ji ltar lags// 'gugs pa'i phur pa ji ltar lags// gdab pa'i phur pa ji ltar lags// dpung dbral phur pa ji ltar
232a1
1lags// kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// dgra bgegs dbang du sdud pa'i phyir// nag po'i rigs kyis bya bar shis// mnan pa'i phur pa skyer par bsngags// 'dren cing 'gugs par mchog phur
232a2
1bsngags// gdab pa'i phur par lcags phur te// dpung dang dbral bar bya phur bsngags// nag po'i rigs kyi shing dag la// sor bzhi pa'am sor brgyad la// mkhas pas legs par tshad dang ldan// skyer pa
232a3
1lo ma sa 'og gi/ sor bzhi brkos pas bkra shis rdzas// mchog phur rje ngar gnyis la'o// gnam lcags sa lcags khro chu dang// mi rta mang po bsad pa dang// rang dang phal pa'i lcags sna lnga// bya rgod gshog
232a4
1pa'i dang ru'o// de ltar byas te yul la dgod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ phur pa rdzas kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas kI la ya'i bdag
232a5
1po de/ chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bka' stsal pa/ byang chub snying po zhes bya ba/ sems can kun la yod kyis kyang// mthong bar bya ba yod ma yin// byang chub sems ni
232a6
1phur pa'i rgyu// de ltar chos nyid don rtogs pa// rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o// yaM raM khaM gyi 'bru gsum gyis// bsreg gtor sbyang ba gong ma'i tshig/ byang chub sems kyi rtsa dag las// byang chub sems ni gzung
232b1
1dbab bya// dang po gser gyi sgo mo las// byang chub sems ni rang dga' bab// sems de yongs su 'dus pa las// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ru// mkhas pas hUM las khro bo bcu// zhi bas mi 'dul rnams la
232b2
1bya// rnam par shes pa khugs pa ni// mchog tu gces pas rab tu bsgrag/ byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las// phyogs bcu'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsal// hUM zhes pa ni nyi shu las/ khro bo khro mo rnams kyang
232b3
1gsal// dzaHzhes pa ni nyi shu las// phra men rnams kyang de bzhin gsal// dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi nyid las// sgo ma bzhi ni rab tu gsal// hUM zhes pa ni gsum nyid las// sku gsung thugs kyi sras mchog gsum// e
232b4
1baM ma yA bzhi nyid las// shwa na mu kha bzhi nyid gsal// dzaHdzaHbya ba bzhi nyid las// sa bdag bzhi ni gsal ba'i don// b+h+yo zhes pa ni bzhi las kyang// bdag nyid bzhi ru rab tu bsam// b+h+yo zhes nyi shu rtsa brgyad
232b5
1las// dbang phyug ma ni bsam byas la// dbus su zla gam sgo can la// bcom ldan bdud 'dul yab yum dgod// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rdo rje dang// sku gsum ldan pa'i thod pa dang// dbus kyi gru gsum thod
232b6
1pas brgyan// rgyas 'debs ma yi steng nyid du// gru gsum lag ni sras mchog gsum/ khro bo 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la// mthing ga'i steng du dgod par bya// rtsibs mchan la ni phra men ma// gong ma bzhin du
233a1
1mthing ga la// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par bsam// de nas slob ma gzud par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar
233a2
1bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kI la ya'i bdag po de/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ karma he ru ka la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/
233a3
1de dag rnams ni rgyu yi don// da ni rab tu bshad bya la// rang gi gsal ba'i ting 'dzin ni// sbyor ba dang po rjes su sbyor// shin tu sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang// las kyi rgyal ba mchog dag dang// dkyil 'khor
233a4
1rgyal ba mchog dag go/ ting 'dzin rim pa de rnams dang// rnal 'byor rim pa'i sgo dag dang// rnal 'byor dang ni rnal 'byor che// rjes su rnal 'byor shin rnal 'byor// de rlung stong pa'i 'phyo sa ni// kun bzhi'i
233a5
1rnam shes yin pa ste// langs kyang de la bstims yang kho// gzhan la bstim pa ma yin te// gnas pa de nyid kho na la'o// bstim pa rlung gi man ngag go/ de nas gnyis pa'i rlung de ni// phyi nang lus dang shes pa
233a6
1la// gnas pa rlung gi gnas yin te// g.yas g.yon ring po dal ba rnams// ting 'dzin de la bsgrib mi bsgrib// sems kyis sems la brtag pa na// phur pa byang chub sems su mthong// de yang rlung gi che bas
233b1
1te// gdab par bya ba yod ma yin// rlung zhes pas ni las kun byed// rnam shes de yi bzhon pa'i rta/ kha btsum lce yi dbus su ni// rlung gi 'khor lo tshon gang ba// tshom bu'am dung rgya'i tshul du bsam// de nas
233b2
1cha snyoms srang mda' 'dra// sems kyi skad cig rim pa brtag/ de gol rim pa lam gyi mchog/ rnam par thar pa'i lam yang ston// mi 'jigs pa yang de kho na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin
233b3
1sbas pa zab mo las/ rlung sgo bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyis gsol pa/ kI la ya yi bdag po mchog/ rU tra dang 'dra bsgral dmigs la// ming dang gzugs la brten lags
233b4
1sam// chos nyid tsam du bsam lags sam// rang ga'i dngos po bsgral lags sam// 'on te thams cad rangabazhin bzhag/ kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// nyon gcig 'jigs byed he ru ka/ ru tra dang 'dra
233b5
1bsgral dmigs de// kun tshogs sgo nas bsgral bar bya// dang po de ltar byas pa dang// nub gsum pa la 'jug par bya// ming rus lo dang zla ba dag khag chen gyi ni bris nas ni// ju co srub lo rkang rjes
233b6
1sa// yang na rdo phye dug la bya// de ltar ling+ga byas la ni// me ngos 'gru khung kha khyer sum brtseg can// nyi shu rtsa brgyad srin mo 'gros// yang na 'brub khung phyogs ngan sar// rang ga'i dngos po ma yin te// rnam
234a1
1shes ling+gar khug pa'o// de yang bdag nyid bzhi dang ldan// the tshom med dang yang dag gzhung// dam la gnas dang le lo spang// 'di rnams 'grub pa'i rgyu ru grags// yang na bya ba thams cad
234a2
1spang// rdzas tshogs dgra rnams med pa ru// shes rab rnam gsum ldan par bya// de nas phur pa'i rim pa ni// rdo rje gzhon nu khro bo bcu// bsgrub phur dngos grub nod pa'o// phra men srung ma'i phur pa ni// sangs
234a3
1rgyas rnams kyi pho nya yin// des kyang gdab bar bya ba min// sku gsung thugs las byung ba yi// sras mchog kI la ya gsum ni// gdab pa'i phur pa dam pa ste// gu gul tshil chen dag dang ni// go ro tsa na'i dud
234a4
1pas bdug/ dbyings dang lhums su gzi byin bskyed// nag po dug gtor byas la ni// skyes kyang dang po las ngan dbang// 'jig kyang tha ma las kyis 'jig/ oM las bskyed pa hUM nyid ni// bskyed pa rkyen gyi
234a5
1sngags nyid do// da ni bzlas pa rgyun gyi sngags// rab tu ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor de// legs par goms shing 'dris pa dang// shin tu brjod la rab tu bzlas// 'di ni sbas pa zab mo yi// nges pa'i drag sngags
234a6
1bstan par bya// nyung dkar nyid la sngags byas la// snying ga lte ba gsang ba ru// nyi ma dros dang dmar thag chad// shin tu dag par bzlas pa bya// oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ mA ra ya che ge mo phaT phaT/ snying la sarba
234b1
1big+h+nAn baM hUM mA ra ya che ge mo phaT phaT/ lte ba la dIp+ta tsakra tiSh+Tha mA ra ya che ge mo phaT phaT/ gsang ba la/ 'di ni sngags mchog rgyal po ste/ khro bo phra men kun gyi sngags// zhe sdang rdo rje bsam byas la// me dpung
234b2
1'bar ba'i rang rtags can// me dpung e la sum cha nub// 'jigs su rung ba'i sras gsum gyi// sngags ni kI li kI la ya// a ko Ta ni bzla bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa
234b3
1zab mo las/ sras kI la ya bton pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas kI la ya'i bdag po de rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bka' stsal pa/ sngags pa rgyan gyi chas kyi
234b4
1rtags// glang chen ko rlon zhing gi shun// thal chen zhag dang rak+tas brgyan// stag gi sham bur sbrul gyi chun// 'di dag 'jigs pa'i dpa' bo'i chas// rnam rgyal la sogs go rim bzhin// shar stod nub smad
234b5
1gnyis su ni// steng 'og khro bo snga ma bzhin// rtsibs mchan la ni phra men ma// shwa na la sogs re ma ti// ya byin lcags kyu shar du dgod// shwa na mu kha re ma ti// de byin zhags pa lho ru dgod// sr-i ga mu kha re ma
234b6
1dzu// bse phyin lcags sgrog nub tu ste// br-i ka mu kha re ma dzaH/ phag byin dril bu nub nyid du// de ltar srung ma bcu gnyis dang// sgo ma bzhi ni spel mar dgod// de nas sras mchog kI la ya// lag tu blang ste
235a1
1gdab par bya// de yang a ko Ta yis so// de nas gdab pa zin pa dang// dgra bgegs gang yin phyogs ngan du// ling+ga de ni bsregs par bya// de nas shin tu rnal 'byor bsam// de bzhin
235a2
1gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ lus ngan bsgral ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas 'khor gyis yang gsol pa// kI la ya yi dbang dam pa// de ring khyod kyis rgyas par
235a3
1mdzod// ces gsol pas/ badzra kI la ya bdag po de/ dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rigs kyi he ru ka/ sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis
235a4
1na// dbang mchog ces ni rab grags pa// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// de la dbye ba gsum gsum dang// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig dbang// bzhi bcu phur pa re re la// dbang ni bskur du yod pa de// de la
235a5
1dbang mchog bzhi ru bshad// bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang// shes rab ye shes bde chen dang// shin tu rnal 'byor bzhi pa'o// de ltar mkhas pas gang rtogs pa// byang chub sems kyi phur
235a6
1pa'o// 'khor gyis gsol pa/ de don rgyas par bka' stsal 'tshal// kI la ya yis bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin snang ba'i mi dag la// bsgrub na chags pa'i srung ma ni// bcu gnyis dag tu shes pa la// shwa na mu
235b1
1kha lcags spyang mo// shwa na mu kha lcags khyi mo// sr-i ga mu kha zangs wa mo// br-i ka mu kha zangs 'phar mo// sa bdag bzhi ni 'grub par nges// bdag nyid bzhi ni dpyid dbyar dang// ston dgun bzhi ni rgyal mo
235b2
1ste// bzhi tshan gsum po rtag tu ni// bsten cing ba lin sbyin par bya// de yis dngos grub myur ba'o// dbang mchog bzhi yi bskur bya ba// bum pa byed pa'i mkhan po des// rgya mdud nyid ni bum pa'o// phrin
235b3
1las rnam bzhi dbang dus su// dkar dang dmar dang nag dang ser// de ltar bu yi dbang nyid ni// phyi yi dbang du 'gro ba'o// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs gdung rgyud 'dzin// btsun mo de las khro bo bcu// bton
235b4
1pa nang gi dbang nyid do// yum nyid mkha' nas sras gsum po// b+ha gar dbang bskur gzi byin bskyed// de ni gsang ba'i dbang du 'gro// dbang mchog bka' stsal nyan pa la// phan dang nus pa gang 'dod
235b5
1sbyin// gal te dam tshig med pa la// byin na glang snar mtshon btags 'dra// byang chub sems kyi bsti gnas sa// lus la 'khor lo bcu yi bgo/ stod na lnga ste smad na lnga// 'di ltar khro bo bcu bkod pa// de
235b6
1bzhin dbang po lnga dag la// phra men zung re dgod pa dang// rkang lag bzhi la bcu drug po// rim pa bzhin du bzhi bzhi nas// de ni nang dbang dam pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi btsun mo yi// mkha' nas thams
236a1
1cad bton pa ni// gsang ba'i dbang du gzhag par bya// shin tu mi dmigs bzhi pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ dbang gi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u
236a2
1ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas 'khor la bos nas/ dbyings zab mo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bka' stsal pa/ thams cad thams cad med mthong ba// dkyil 'khor khro tshul ma lus pa// ma
236a3
1mthong rmongs la bstan pa'o// yang dag don ni stong pa ste// mtshan ma'i bag chags spangs pa'o// sems la sems kyis bltas pas na// mthong ba med pa mthong ba'i mchog/ de ni nges don mchog yin no// bde
236a4
1bar gshegs pas de ma gzigs// de ni sla byer sla ba ste// dga' ba shin tu mthong bar bka'// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin sbas pa zab mo las/ shin tu rnal 'byor bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu
236a5
1pa'o//// sbas pa zab mo mdung rtse'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang/ bod kyi ban de bai ro tsA nas bsgyur ba'o////
236a6
1rgya gar skad du/ badzra kI la ya shak+ti a gra rA ga tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phur pa mdung rtse dmar po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
236b1
1gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang na/ rdo rje srin po'i lha tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe nyid las mi gzhan pa'i
236b2
1'khor karma he ru kas 'di skad zhus so// kye bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa sems can rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci la spyod/ las gang smin bka' stsal du gsol/ zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
236b3
1stsal pa// dang po 'jig rten srid pa'i rgyud// chags pa gnas pa zhig pa las// bar du stongs par gyur pa'i tshe// de yang snod chags bcud chags mnyam// de dus lha yi sprul pa ni// bag tsam rlan 'dus
236b4
1gnas pa las// bya rgod dar ma gcig tu srid// gsher la rlan tsam gyur pa las// stag chen dar ma gcig tu srid// de ni srid pa'i sprul pa'o// bya yi tshang 'cha' ba'i gnas/ shar phyogs shel gyi brag kha dkar
236b5
1po ri mtho sa gtsang bar/ bya dang stag gi lus gnyis ni// ma 'phrad yid kyis chags pas bshos// srid pa'i sgo nga bdun dang chu bur gnyis su srid/ sgo nga bdun po ni/ shel sgong dkar po dang/ dngul sgong skya bo
236b6
1dang/ lcags sgong nag po dang/ gser sgong ser po dang/ zangs sgong dmar po dang/ g.yu sgong sngon po dang/ mchong sgong smug po dang bdun no// chu bur gnyis la yid ma ches nas/ mchus brtol bas/ bud
237a1
1med bzang sdug la 'od chags pa bdun byung bas/ bya 'grogs tshang bor ro// bud med bdun gyis ni sgo nga re tshags byas so// srid pa'i byung tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas
237a2
1bud med bdun las/ gcig gis shel sgong dkar po brtol bas/ de nas mi dkar mdung tsam la dpral ba na mig gcig yod pa byung/ bud med gcig gis dngul sgong skya bo brtol bas/ mi skya bo ra'i mgo
237a3
1can byung/ bud med gcig gis lcags sgong nag po brtol bas/ mi nag po lag pa dgu pa byung/ bud med gcig gis gser sgong ser po brtol bas/ mi ser po mig dmar can byung/ bud med gcig gis
237a4
1g.yu sgong sngon po brtol bas/ mi sngon po sbal pa'i mgo can byung/ bud med gcig gis zangs sgong dmar po brtol bas/ mi dmar po ra skyes kham pa zhon pa gcig byung/ bud med gcig gis mchong sgong smug
237a5
1po brtol bas/ bud med drug la bzhin bzang sdug la 'od chags pa byung/ gcig nag mo dpral na mig gcig kha na so gcig/ brang na nu gcig yod pa byung/ gcig gcan gzan gyi mgo can du byung ngo// byung
237a6
1tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas mi dkar po mig gcig pa dang/ bud med nag mo mig gcig ma gnyis mchis pa las/ bu dgu mda' gzhu dang mdung thogs pa dang/ bu bco brgyad sgye'u
237b1
1ser can bco brgyad byung ngo/ mi skya bo ra'i mgo can dang/ bud med khyi'i mgo can mchis pa las/ byis pa sprel mgo nyis brgya/ byis pa byi la'i mgo can nyis brgya/ byis pa bong bu'i mgo can nyis brgya/ byis pa
237b2
1khyung gi mgo can nyis brgya ste stong ngo/ nyis brgya gcig chan/ mi nag po lag dgu po dang/ bud med bzang mo gcig mchis pas/ bu khye'u gnyis bu mo gsum ste lnga byung ngo/ mi ser po mig dmar can dang/ bud
237b3
1med bzang po gcig rtses pas/ khye'u gnyis bu mo gsum ste lnga byung ngo// chu bur gcig brtol ba las/ bud med dkar po dbral na mig gcig yod pa/ bud med ser mo ral gcig gnam du bsgreng ba/
237b4
1bud med dmar mo lcags kyu thogs pa/ bud med sngon mo dbyug to thogs pa bzhi byung ste/ rtses pa dang skyes lugs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas mi dkar po bu smad bcas pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams su
237b5
1sems can thams cad la gnod pa sna tshogs byas/ srog gcod pa dang/ sha za ba dang/ khrag 'thung ba dang/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ dbugs rngub pa la sogs pa bkren zhing dbul ba rnams byed par 'gyur
237b6
1ro// de'i tshe rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa'i spyan gyis ma bzod nas/ thugs rje skyes te zhi bas bden pa'i chos gsungs pas thul bar ma gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje gzhon nur sku sprul te/ zhal
238a1
1gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs su bzhugs so// sku mdog sngon po/ phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams/ bar pa rtse lnga bsnams/ g.yon dang po me dpung 'bar ba bsnams/
238a2
1bar pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams/ tha ma gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril ba/ skra nyi khri chig stong ba spu bye ba 'bum rdo rjes gtams pa/ smin ma drug glog bzhin 'gyu ba/ spyan dgu tshwa tshwa 'phro ba/ shangs bug drug rlung
238a3
1nag 'tshubs pa/ snyan drug 'brug ldir ba/ zhal gsum kI la ya dang ru lu'i sgra sgrogs pas sa bzhi g.yo ba/ sku ri rab tsam du bzhengs/ zhal bar snang tsam du gdangs te gsol nas/ 'phongs su bton pas/
238a4
1'dod bred nas lus 'dar yed yed/ mig sngo hrig hrig byung nas/ bde bar gshegs pa khyed rang la skyabs su+u 'chi'o// bdag ma bkum thugs rjes gzung du gsol/ bdag gi bu smad 'khor du bzhes su
238a5
1gsol/ bdag gi sku mdog dkar po 'di bzhes la zhal g.yas dkar ston par mdzod cig/ der b+ha ga wAn gyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i dgra// gdug cing phung sems ldan pa rnams/
238a6
1zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings/ shI g+h+raM A na ya hUM phaT/ ces gsungs pas/ khos srog gi snying po/ sa ri sa nya ri sa dzaH/ zhes phul lo// bu dgu dang bco brgyad chung ma nag mo tsho phul nas/ dbang dang byin
238b1
1rlabs zhus so// gsad gsol dbab gcad kyis las bya bar khas blangs/ ming btags pa/ rgyal po blo gros spyan gcig pa dang/ chung ma la bdag nyid chen mor ming btags so// des thod pa'i phreng ba yang
238b2
1phul lo// bu dgu la 'gong po spun dgur ming btags so// bu bco brgyad la yul blon bco brgyad du btags so// mi ring skya bo ra'i mgo can dang/ chung ma khyi'i mgo can gnyis kyis/ bu stong tsho ded
238b3
1nas sems can thams cad la gnod par byed pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas 'di ma byed byas pas ma thul/ sku'i tsham rngams bstan/ yang zhal du rngub pas/ 'dar zhing mig rig rig tu gyur te/
238b4
1zhus pa bdag gi bu smad 'khor du bzhes/ bdag gi gos glang chen gyi ko rlon 'di bzhes la rgyan du mdzod/ ces phul/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i dgra// gdug cing
238b5
1sdang sems ldan pa rnams// rings par khug la smrar chug cig/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya zhes gsungs pas/ khos srog gi snying po/ kar tri dzaHya traM/ zhes phul lo// gsad gso dbab gcad kyi las bya bar khas
238b6
1blangs so// ming gnam the'u dkar po ra'i mgo can du ming btags so// chung mas zhing gi g.yang gzhi phul lo// shwa na mu khar ming btags so// bu tsho la the brang stong tshor ming btags so// mi nag po lag dgu
239a1
1'khor bcas kyis grir gsod pa'i las byed pa la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma byed gsungs pas/ kho ma thul/ spu tsham rngams ri rab tsam zhal bar snang du gdangs nas gsol bas gdod bred
239a2
1nas/ 'dar zhing mig rig rig byas nas/ sku mdog nag po 'di yang 'bul/ zhal dbus mthing nag ston par mdzod/ bdag gi chung ma 'di sbyor ba'i yum du bzhes su gsol/ bu tsha yang 'khor du 'bul lo
239a3
1zhes phul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs/ khos srog gi snying po te baM b+h+yo zhes
239a4
1phul lo// gsad gso dbab gcad kyi las byed par dbang bskur ming ni bdud rnams rol zhes bya ba btags so// chung ma'i lag tu rdo rje gyin [\[]byin [\]]dbang bskur/ ming btags pa rdo rje ya byin zhes
239a5
1bya'o// yang mi ser po mig dmar po chung ma dang bcas pas/ thams cad gsod kyi 'dug pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ma byed byas pas nyan du ma 'dod nas/ sku'i tsham rngams ri rab tsam du byas/ zhal bar
239a6
1snang tsam du gdangs nas gsol bas/ gdod bred nas 'dar zhing mig rig rig tu byas/ gos stag lpags rlon pa 'di yang sku'i sham thabs su bzhes/ chung ma 'di yang sbyor ba'i yum du bzhes/ bu gnyis
239b1
1bu mo gsum ste lnga yang 'khor du bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i dgra// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// mngon spyod tshul du
239b2
1sgrol bar gyis// hUM kA ra a gsungs pas/ khos srog snying/ e baM b+h+yo// zhes phul lo// dbang gis mngon spyod tshul du sgrol cig par bskur ro// ming ni gza' mig dmar du ming btags so// chung ma la dbang
239b3
1bskur lag tu rdo rje byin nas/ rdo rje de byin du ming btags so// yang mi dmar po ra skyes la zhon pa chung ma dang bcas pas/ bstan pa 'jigs pa'i las byed kyi 'dug 'di ma byed pas/ kho ma 'dod nas/ sku'i
239b4
1tsham rngams sku ri rab tsam/ zhal bar snang tsam gdangs nas gsol pas/ gdod bred nas 'dar zhing mig rig rig byas nas/ bdag gi sku mdog dmar po 'di yang bzhes/ zhal g.yon dmar la gdangs par
239b5
1mdzod cig bdag gi chung ma yang sbyor yum du bzhes zhing/ bdag dang bu tsha yang 'khor du bzhes su gsol// zhes zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i
239b6
1dgra// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// ha sa ya ra hri da na gsungs pas/ khos srog snying e waM b+h+yo/ zhes phul lo// dam nyams kyi mgon ma byed cig ces dam
240a1
1bsgrags so// ming btags pa/ btsan shu+u bo rdo rje zla ba zhes pa ming btags so// chung ma la dbang bskur/ rdo rje bse byin du ming btags so// mi sngon po sbal pa'i mgo can/ chung ma dang bcas
240a2
1pas/ mdze nad gtong zhing 'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ma byed byas pas/ ma 'dod nas sku'i tsham rngams/ zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs su 'dug phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje rtse
240a3
1dgu bsnams/ g.yon dang pos me dpung 'bar ba bsnams/ bar pa gnyis na rdo rje rtse lnga dang kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams/ tha ma gnyis ri rab phur bu 'dril/ zhal bgrad mche gtsigs/ smin ma dgu glog bzhin
240a4
1'gyu/ spyan dgu tshwa tshwa 'phro/ shangs sbubs drug rlung nag 'tshubs/ snyan drug 'brug ldir/ zhal gsum kI la ya dang ru lu'i sgra sgrogs/ b+h+yo dang hUM dang phaT byas pas/ sa gzhi g.yo ba dang/ 'ur 'ur dang/ chem
240a5
1chem byung/ skra nyi khri chig stong/ ba spu bye ba rdo rjes gtams pa/ me 'bar bar sprul te/ sku ri rab tsam zhal bar snang tsam bskyed nas bstan pas gdod bred nas/ 'dar yed yed/ mig rig rig byas nas/
240a6
1bdag bu smad dngabacas pa 'khor du bzhes shig/ bdag gi sbrul rigs bzhi gdug pa'i rgyan 'di yang bzhes la/ phyag gdub dang/ zhabs gdub mdzod cig chung ma yang sbyor yum du bzhes shig zhus pas/
240b1
1bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dngos grub bar chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa rnams// phob cig rnam par gzir bar gyis// a we sha ya zhes gsungs pas/ khos srog snying
240b2
1he saM b+h+yo phul lo// mdze dang 'bras phol klu rdzongs su chug cig/ ces las bcol/ ming klu dengs po zhes bya bar btags so// chung ma'i lag tu rdo rje byin nas dbang skur ming btags pa/ rdo rje phag byin
240b3
1no// bud med rnams kyis zhag gi mtsho la gnas pas zhag gi zo ris phul lo// rak+ta'i mtsho la gnas pas rak+ta'i thig le phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das bka' stsol zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
240b4
1bka' stsal pa/ bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs/ khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas pa'i// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// ces gsungs pas/ 'khor tshogs srog gi snying po
240b5
1phul ba/ shwa na mu khas/ su ru su ru badzra phul/ bdag nyid chen mos/ mu ru mu ru badzra phul/ ya byin gyis/ ka tang ka tang badzra phul/ de byin gyis/ dza ye bi dza ye badzra phul/ phag byin gyis/ a pa ra dzi ta badzra phul/
240b6
1bse byin gyis/ a dzi te badzra phul/ ma bdun dang sring mo bzhis/ thal chen gyi tshom bu phul/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol zhus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las
241a1
1sdig chen gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// ces gsungs pas/
241a2
1ma bdun gyis srog gi snying po phul ba/ ma ma ba shaM ku ru/ ma taM nya gar i dan/ ces phul lo// sring mo bzhis srog snying/ mA ra sai na pra marda na hUM phaT/ ces phul lo// srung ma thams cad kyis/ d+ha ti ma ma karma
241a3
1shri g+h+raM ka rA ya phul lo// ming btags pa/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// rdo rje gsal ba glog 'dzin ma// rdo rje kun bzang mthu mo che// rdo rje ye shes chen mo/ rdo rje gsang chen 'od 'bar ma/ rdo rje gsung sgrogs
241a4
1chen mo/ rdo rje sgrol ma za byed ma/ zhes ming btags so// shar gyi dkar mo rdo rje spyan gcig ma// lho yi ser mo rdo rje ral gcig ma// nub kyi dmar mo rdo rje dbang sdud ma// byang gi sngon mo rdo rje las mkhan
241a5
1ma'o// btul zhing dbang bskur ming btags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa can pho ni btul/ mo ni sbyor ba'i yum du byas/ bu rnams ni 'khor du byas/ rgyan cha lugs
241a6
1ni ldan par byas te/ rang la rang ngo mtshar ba'i bstod pa ni/ dpa' bo sgeg po 'jigs su rung ba dang// dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par ston pa dang// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa// sku yi brnyan po
241b1
1shin tu bstan gyur te// zhal g.yas dkar la bzhad pas dgod dgod 'dra// zhal g.yon dmar la gdangs pas gshe gshe 'dra// zhal dbus mthing la gnag pas khro khro 'dra// rgyud drug snying rjes zin pas che
241b2
1che 'dra// sku che yan lag rags pas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra// rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pas sgeg sgeg 'dra// gdug tshogs zhal du rngubs pas dpa' dpa' 'dra// chos sku mtshan ma med pas zhi zhi 'dra// rdo rje rtse
241b3
1dgus sa dgu'i rtog pa 'joms// rdo rje rtse lngas rgyud lnga gnas su sgrol// me dpung 'bar bas khams gsum rtog pa sreg kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// ri rab phur bus khams gsum dbang du
241b4
1sdud// de 'dra'i khro bo 'jigs tshul bstan pa yis/ khams gsum sems can zil gyi gnon par byed// dpa' bo chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang gis rang la bstod pa'i le'u ste lnga
241b5
1pa'o//// oM badzra kI li kI la ya// ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa yar hri da ne hUM phaT// shI g+h+raM A na ya hUMphaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la pa ya hUM phaT/ A we sha ya A we sha ya hUM phaT/ bin+d+ha ya bin+d+ha ya hUM phaT// su
241b6
1ru su ru hUM phaT/ mu ru mu ru hUM phaT/ ka taM ka te hUM phaT/ dza ye bi dza ye hUM phaT/ a dzi te hUM phaT/ a pa ra dzi ta hUM phaT/ mA' ra sai na pra marda na hUM phaT/ hUM ma ma ba shaM ku ru/ ma taM nya ka ra i dan hUM phaT/ d+ha d+hi ma ma
242a1
1karma shI g+h+raM ka rA ya hUM phaT// sngags kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gsad pa'i las bstan te// smyo 'bogs bsad dang grir bsad pa// klu nad bsad dang rims kyis bsad// dang po smyo
242a2
1'bog bsad pa la// smyo ru gzhug ste bsad pa dang// 'bog tu gzhug ste bsad pa dang// lkugs su gzhug ste bsad pa dang// ltas ngan phab ste gsad pa'o// smyo 'bog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas
242a3
1gri ru bsad pa la// mtshon grir bsad dang 'gags grir bsad// me gri chu grir bsad pa dang/ rbab grir g.yang grir bsad pa'o// grir gsad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas klu nad kyis gsad pa
242a4
1la// mdze nad btang ste bsad pa dang// 'bras nad kyis bsad pa dang// phol du btang la bsad pa dang// klu rdzings bcu la gsad pa'o// klu nad kyis gsad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas rim gyis
242a5
1gsad pa la// bal nad bsad dang gag pas bsad// rgyu gzer bsad dang mkhris pas gsad// rim gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas gso ba'i las bstan te// rdzas dang sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// smyo
242a6
1'bog can de gso ba dang// nad pa tshabs che gso ba dang// sri'u gso dang gsum yin no// dang po smyo 'bog gso ba ni// phur bu'i dgongs par bzhugs pas su// sngags grangs mang du bzlas pa yis// blta
242b1
1ba bsar zhing rdzas kyis bdug/ drag po'i las kyis gso ba dang/ nad pa tshabs chen gso ba dang// gang gnod ba yi mdos byas la// gta' ra gta' lug mang du gzhug/ gta' thabs bco brgyad gzhung
242b2
1bzhin bya'o// sri'u gces pa gso ba ni// lus srung phur bu bla sgongs dang// sngags mdud srung 'khor rab gnas gdags// chu gtor mang du btang ba dang// tsha tsha gdab dang d+harma gdon// dkar chos gzhung du
242b3
1bya ba dang// des kyang phan par ma gyur na// rdo rje'i sgrub pa gzhung btsug bya'o// gso ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas dbab pa'i las bstan te// bdud kyi ser ba ji ltar dbab// gza' yi ser
242b4
1ba ji ltar dbab// btsan gyi ser ba ji ltar dbab// klu yi ser ba ji ltar dbab// thog dang ltas ngan ji ltar dbab// de rnams man ngag shes par bya'o// dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas
242b5
1gcad pa'i las bstan te// bdud kyi ser ba ji ltar gcad// gza' yi ser ba ji ltar bzlog/ btsan gyi ser ba ji ltar bzlog/ ma mo'i ser ba ji ltar bzlog/ mi nad phyug nad ji ltar bzlog/ ltas ngan rmi
242b6
1ngan ji ltar bzlog/ gcad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas smyo ru gzhug pa'i rdzas// rta dkar thod pa'i nang du bsag/ thang phrom ra dug ra mo shag/ ra rog gcin dang ming byang gzhug/ ngan
243a1
1sngags so mo'i gling bur bzlas// nyung dkar bzlas shing thun brab bo// dra dang dun b+h+yo badzra sad sad mA ra ya phaT/ gzhug tu dgra yi khang pa g.yas su sba'o// 'bog tu gzhug pa'i rdzas ni/ seng ge
243a2
1dkar mo'i snying shun du// dug sna'i tshogs dang khrag sna'i tshogs// dgra yi ming byang bcas pa gzhug/ nyung dkar gling bur ngan sngags bzlas// tri du ni shag mA ra ni rbad/ ra ra si khyud/ ces dgra yi khang pa 'am/
243a3
1gdong ngam lus la phog par brdeg go/ de nas ltas ngan dbab pa ni// bya pho dkar po'i gsob nang du// ltas ngan thod pa lnga bsags te// srin bya dang ni gla ba dang// sreg pa dang ni 'ug pa dang// sbrul gyi thod
243a4
1pa bcas gzhug go/ dung gi gling bur nyung dkar sngags la brab// sang sang phyi phyi thal saM khyung// tri tri ro ti mA' ra ya dun ya/ dgra'i khang pa'i 'gram 'og tu+u sba'o// de ltar byas na ltas ngan 'ong// de nas lkugs
243a5
1su gzhug pa ni// ra dkar gnya' nag srog rtsa'i nang// mi be bo gsad pa'i lce// khyi dkar snying dang ra dkar snying// ri bong mgo khrag ming byang gzhug/ ngan sngags lcags kyi gling bur bzlas// nyung
243a6
1dkar sngags shing thun blugs brab// rbad su rbad su khrag ti rbad// nang na rbad rmi na rmugs// 'gyel ba klong phu brlag tu brlag/ bshos skaM mo/ mA ra ya/ them pa'i 'og tu sba'o// de ltar byas na lkugs par
243b1
1'gyur// de ltar smyo 'bog lkugs dang gsum// ltas ngan dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// grir gsad pa'i thabs 'di la/ dang po mtshon grir gsad pa ni// gru gsum mthing nag dkyil 'khor
243b2
1brtsig/ dbus su gru gsum bri la ro sol byug kha ru rlung khyer phye 'jam brdal// nang du sdod cig dor rta bting// rkang rjes la stsogs ling+ga bya// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su
243b3
1bstan// snying gar ming la dpral bar dus// 'doms su bla dgas bri la glan// phur bu bzhi dang rtsang gnyis ni// dmar po byugs zur gcig tu dgod// zur gcig b+han d+ha gcig gi nang/ khyi dmar snying khrag
243b4
1ra dmar snying/ khrag dang 'bru sna'i tshogs phye la// gtor ma chen po byas la dgod// zur gcig chang phud bse phor gang// de nas rnga gling sgra sgra bsgrags la// gsur chen spos kyi dud pa btang// ma ru tse yab
243b5
1yum bskul ba// hUM mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// srog la mnga' mdzad gnod sbyin ma ru tse/ khrag mdog dmar po bse yi lan phran can// spyan mig nyi ma'i 'od zer skar ltar
243b6
1'khrugs// smin ma glog 'khyug bar snang go skabs 'byed// shangs nas bu yug rdo rje thog chen 'bebs// dgyes pa'i zhal bzhad tshems ni spu gris gtams// rngam pa'i ljags 'dril bskal pa'i me ltar
244a1
1'bar// ag tshom dmar ser dug gsum rtsad nas gcod// snyan nas 'brug stong sgra sgrogs de ri ri// sen mo lcags kyu'i rtse ltar 'dzin cing 'gugs// ba spu'i nang nas gnam lcags zhun ma
244a2
1'khrugs// me lce ban thabs gsum gyis char chen 'bab// zhabs kyis bsam pa'i gnas su yud kyis phyin// na bza' dmar po sprin gyi g.yang gzhi gsol// nyams pa'i snying phyung chang bar bcug nas
244a3

1mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ phyag na rdo rje la bskul te/ 'dod khams gnas ris nyi shu'i ston par gshegs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su 'jigs byed chen po'i gzhal yas khang du mngon par sprul
251a6
1te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid zhe sdang gi bdag po zhal gsum phyag drug par mngon par sprul te/ 'khor rnams la phem phaT ces mngon par sgra bsgrags te/ de'i tshe las kyi sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol
251b1
1to// sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas shing 'khor ba las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rnal 'byor gyi cha rkyen du bzhag pa la don du mchis las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom pa
251b2
1dang// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang// phyag rgya che la gnas rnams kyis// 'bras bu sku bzhi thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor cha rkyen rim pa'o// sems dpa' chen po gzas pa'i cha rkyen du bzhag pa la don
251b3
1du ci mchis bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ e ma ho// 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu bsgral ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar bsgral ba'i rim pa'o//// 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol du
251b4
1bsgral ba la// lam yan lag ci lta bu lags bshad du gsol/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ bsnyen pa bsdus pa'i yan lag dang/ bsgrub pa chen po'i gnas kyi rim pa dang/ drag po'i las la sbyar ba'o// de
251b5
1la dkyil 'khor du zhig mchis/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi ste/ bsnyen pas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad dang/ sgrub pa ste gru gsum shel gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ sgrub pa
251b6
1chen po ste sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ las la sbyar ba te ma ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang bzhi'o// sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang zag ji lta bu zhig gis
252a1
1gzung zhing bsgrub par bgyi/ nyon cig gang zag rnam pa lnga ste/ theg pa chen po'i rigs can dang/ theg pa chung ngu'i rigs can dang/ gang zag rigs chad pa dang/ rigs ma nges pa dang/ gang
252a2
1zag zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs can no// 'dir ni gang zag zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs can gyis bsgrub par bya'o// sems dpa' chen po/ 'di'i thig skud kyi rgyu rnams ji ltar lags/ bsnyen pa bsdus pa'i dus ras bal
252a3
1gyi bkal pa dang/ bsgrub pa'i dus su ni kha ral ma'i rgyud mas so// drag po'i dus su bram ze'i srog pa rtsas so// mA ra ya bsad pa'i dus su rgyus chen gyis so// 'di'i tshon gyi mtshan nyid ci lta bu lags/
252a4
1bsnyen pa la ni rin chen sna lngas bri/ bsgrub pa'i dus su 'bras la sogs pa kha dog bsgyur la bri'o// drag po la tshon sna lngas so// bsad pa la lcags sol nag po yin/ tshon gyi mtshan nyid de ltar yin na/ bris
252a5
1pa'i dus ji ltar lags/ bsnyen pa la nyi ma shar nas so// bsgrub pa la nam phyed nas so// drag po la nyin phyed nas so// bsad pa dgongs ka'i dus su'o// dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid du// phur bu'i mtshan
252a6
1nyid dgod pa ji ltar lags// nyon cig las kyi sems dpa'/ bsnyen pa'i dus su rin chen sna lnga'i phur pa sor bcu drug pa bya la dgod/ bsgrub pa'i dus su gdug pa can gyi shing la sor bcu gnyis par byas
252b1
1la dgod/ drag po'i dus su rkang chen gyis phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad du byas la dgod/ mA ra ya bsad pa'i dus su lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i phur pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas la dgod/ e ma ho// sems
252b2
1dpa' chen po de ltar gyur pa lags na/ de'i cha rkyen ji ltar lags/ bsnyen pa la mchod rdzas dang cho ga rdzogs pa'o// bsgrub pa la sngags kyi 'khor lo che// drag po la bde gshegs bka' nyan bskul
252b3
1ba'o// bsad pa la zangs phye lcags phye'o// de ni cha rkyen mchog yin te// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rkyen du bshad// gleng gzhi dang gleng bslang ba dang/ gzhal yas khang gi le'u ste dang po'o//// bcom ldan
252b4
1'das 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor mA ra yas bsad pa la don du mchis bshad du gsol/ e ma ho/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig mA ra ya bsad pa la dkyil 'khor gsum ste/ me'i dkyil 'khor
252b5
1dang/ bstab pa'i dkyil 'khor dang// mA ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang gsum mo// de la me'i dkyil 'khor ni/ shar lho mtshams su rgyar gru gang zabs su khru phyed do/ kha khyer gsum la rgyar sor bzhi
252b6
1pa'o// dpangs su sor bzhi pa'o// de yang ma tri chen po'i snying gar bri'o// tshon bri ba ni/ nang du mda' gzhu bkang ba gsum/ zur gsum la za byed kyi zhal gsum/ bang rim bar ma la mtshon cha lnga mdzes pa'i
253a1
1tshul du bri/ bang rim tha ma la me ri smug nag tu btang bar bya'o// der gdug pa can gyi shing rnams la/ khar la ma'i skras bcings te/ dug shing sna tshogs pa la/ snying dang glo bas brgyan pa
253a2
1ni// drag po me yi dkyil 'khor ro// bstab pa'i dkyil 'khor ni byang shar mtshams su'o// dpangs su sor bzhi la/ snying po nr-i tri dang bcas pa'o// der bsgral ba'i ling+ga ni/ ra dang khyi dang mi'i sog pa la bris
253a3
1la mchod pa chen po'i dus su bstab bo// mA ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ lho nub mtshams su hom khung rgyar gru gang ba/ zabs su khru do/ logs gsum du mda' gzhu bkang ba gsum bris la/ zur
253a4
1gsum la za byed kyi zhal dang bcas pa bri/ bang rim bar ma la rtsang drug cu rtsa gnyis srin mo 'gros su 'khor bar gzug/ bang rim tha ma la mtshon cha lnga dgod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor de ltar
253a5
1lags na/ de bsgral ba'i ling+ga'i rgyu gang lags bshad du gsol/ sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ de dri ba legs so// rgyu ni khri dang ju tse'i phub ma dang// gangs kyis reg pa'i sa rnams dang// 'byung ba chu
253a6
1yi thal ba dang// til nag po la gzhi blang ste// gzugs ni yang dag rdzogs par bya'o// dug gi chu yi byug pa yis// mdog ni smug nag pa ru bya// de ni rnam shes rten yin te// tshe dang phung po sdud pa'o// de ni
253b1
1'pho ba'i ling+ga ste// sngags kyi 'khor lo ci ltar bya// sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol// nyon cig las kyi sems dpa' che// sngags kyi 'khor lo 'god pa ni// dpral ba klad rgyas 'khor lo ni// lha
253b2
1rnams bsrungs pa'i 'khor lo ste// mdog nag zla ba kham pa la// lha dang dpral ba'i snying po dgod pa'o// khrag chen 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// smyu gu rkang chen mchog gis bri// snag tsha nim pa ka yi khu bas
253b3
1bya// ha sa ya ra dgod pa yin// de la skyob pa'i lta dang 'bral// dbyen spyo pa yi yi ge yis// lha dang dbral bar bshad pa yin// gzugs la snying po bsdu bar bshad pa ni// lcum gzhog lta bu'i zur brgyad
253b4
1la// rtsa yis dngas ma bzhi gnas te/ kun gzhi'i rnam shes rten yin pas// gzugs la dbab pa'i snying po dgod// A be sha yi sngags dgod pas// gzugs la dbab pa'i las su 'gyur// nya yi dbyibs 'dra
253b5
1bzhi po la// dar dkar skud pa lnga yod de// dbyibs ni pad+ma rgyas 'dra la// shI gran A na ya yi sngags bkod pas// byad du gzhug pa'i las su 'gyur// dar lce bkug pa'i dbyibs 'dra dang// rin chen pad+ma
253b6
1bzhi po la// smra byed snying po'i mtshan bkod cing// dz+wa la pa yi sngags dgod pas// smyo bar gzhug pa'i las su 'gyur// gro ga gcus pa 'dra ba dang// zangs kyi mo khab 'dra ba dang// zar ma'i me tog dbyibs
254a1
1'dra dang// tshes gcig zla ba'i dbyibs 'dra la// tA tha ya yi sngags bkod pas// rdul du rlog pa'i las su 'gyur// rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra'i 'khor lo la// byang chub sems kyi rgyu srang la// b+hin+da ya
254a2
1yi sngags bkod pas// zhal du stob pa'i las su 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po sngags kyi 'khor lo bkod pa de ltar lags na// gang zag ji lta bu zhig gis bri bar bgyi// zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs kyis bri bar
254a3
1bya'o// de'i kha dog dang dbyibs ni nag la skra gyen du 'khyil ba// mig sprin dmar ba/ smin ma'i dbus na khro gnyer gsum yod pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ lag pa chu bya lag tu 'dug pa// thig pa mchog la dad
254a4
1pa/ mngon par shes pa des bri bar bya'o// sngags kyi 'khor lo bri ba'i dus gang lags bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig/ dus ni gsum ste/ smyug gu btsal ba'i dus dang/ bri ba'i dus dang/
254a5
1snag tsha btsal ba'i dus dang gsum mo// bri ba'i dus ni nya nag dmar gyi dus so// smyu gu btsal ba'i dus ni/ smin drug sa 'og tu song ba'i dus so// snag tsha btsal ba'i dus ni/ dpyid zla 'bring po lha mo u ma de
254a6
1wI gsang ba'i mkhar 'char ba'i dus so// bcom ldan 'das smyu gu dang 'khor lo de ltar lags na/ 'khor lo chen po bca' ba'i dus gang lags/ dus ni bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'o// las ni sgrub pa'o// rgyu ni gro
254b1
1ga'am shog shog ste/ 'pho ba'i yan lag rdzogs par bri/ mdog ni smug nag dag tu bya'o// drag po'i las la 'khor lo nag/ dbyibs ni zla ba kham pa la// mdog ni nag po lce bzhir bcas// dbus su oM badzra
254b2
1kI li kI la ya// dbus su che ge mo mA ra ya dgod// lce bzhir hA sa ya ra bzhi dgod/ dbus kyi badzra kI li kI la ya dang pos ni// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por gsal ba'o// kI la ya 'og mas lha tshogs su
254b3
1gsal lo// che ge mo yis dmigs pa gsal/ ha sa ya ra na bzlas pa'i mchog/ dbral ba'i 'khor lo 'di bskur ro// dbab pa'i 'khor lo'i dbyings rnams ni// lcum gzhog 'dra ba'i zur brgyad la// steng ma
254b4
1pad+ma 'dab brgyad mdzes/ 'og ni rin chen zur brgyad do// steng gi pad+ma'i lte ba la// dbus su oM badzra kI li kI la ya che ge mo mA ra ya zhes pa bri/ 'khor lo'i 'dab ma'i cha rnams la// A be sha ya zhes pa'i snying
254b5
1po bri// gzugs la dbab pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'o// nya yis gzugs 'dra bzhi po la// 'khor lo'i 'dab ma re re la// dbus su oMbadzra kI li kI la ya che ge mo mA ra ya zhes pa bri// nya 'dra ba bzhi po la/ shI
254b6
1g+h+raM A na ya yi snying po bri// 'dis ni 'ching bar 'gyur ba'o// byad du gzhug pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'o// dar lce khug pa 'dra ba dang// rin chen pad+ma'i sdong po 'dra ba la// dbus su oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ che ge
255a1
1mo mA ra ya zhes pa bri/ mtha' ma rnams la/ dz+wa la pa ya'i sngags bkod pas// thams cad myos shing smra bar 'gyur// smyo ba'i 'khor lo bca' ba'i rim pa'o// dbyibs ni gro ga bcus 'dra
255a2
1dang// zangs kyi mo khab dbyibs 'dra dang// zar ma'i me tog khaphye ba// zla ba tshes pa'i rnam pa 'dra// re re 'khor lo ldeb re yin// dbus su oM kI li kI la ya// che ge mo zhes pa bri// khor lo'i 'dab ma'i cha
255a3
1rnams la// tA tha ya yi sngags rnams bri// rdul du rlog pa'i las su 'gyur ro// rdul du rlog pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'o// rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra'i 'khor lo la// dbus su oM kI li kI la ya che ge mo zhes pa
255a4
1bri// 'khor lo 'dab ma'i cha rnams la/ b+hin+da ya yi sngags bkod pas// zhal du stob pa'i las su 'gyur// zhal du bstab pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa'o// mA ra ya bsad pa'i 'khor lo'i rim pa bstan pa dang/
255a5
1'khor lo bca' ba'i rim pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo bri ba dang/ mA ra ya bsad pa'i dkyil 'khor de ltar lags na gzas pa po 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol du bsgral ba
255a6
1la sngags kyi don du mchis sems dpa' chen po bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' legs so sngags 'di'i don rtogs par dka' bas zhus pa legs so// nyon cig de la yang bzhi ste/ kI la ya sngags kyi
255b1
1phreng ba dang/ kI li kI la ya sngags kyi 'khor lo dang/ kI la ya lha'i sku phyag rgya chen po'i rim pa dang/ kI la ya chos nyid la gnas pa'i rim pa'o// sems dpa' chen po sngags kyi phreng ba la don du mchis/ las
255b2
1kyi sems dpa' nyon cig de la gnyis te/ 'dren par byed pa dang/ zil gyis gnon pa'o// 'dren par byed pa ni/ sems dpa' chen po sngags kyi sems dpa'i thugs ka nas tsit+ta rin chen zur brgyad/ de'i lte
255b3
1ba la zag pa med pa'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa'i rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ de'i lte bar A+oM/ zur brgyad la kI la ya 'bru brgyad/ de'i sngags kyi bdag pos/ oM badzra kI la ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod pas/ lcags kyu
255b4
1dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu bzhi byung ste/ gzas pa po'i gnas mal du/ yaM las rlung gi dal du gyur te/ gnas mal dang gzas pa por bcas pa lcags kyus bkug zhags pas bcing/
255b5
1lcags sgrog gis bsdam/ dril bus dgyes par byas pa ni/ 'dren par byed pa'i rim pa'o// zil gyi gnon pa'i sngags kyi rim pa ni// A+oM laM hUM laM/ zhes brjod pas/ gzas pa po'i glad rgyas su/ ye shes kyi ri
255b6
1rab rtse mo brgyad pa gcig tu gyur te/ s+t+waM b+ha ya nan zhes pas gnon pa'o// mo hA g+ha ya ni ming dang rus su bcas pa'o// hrIHsh+t-IHwi tri ni thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'o// las kyi sems dpa' de ru khrus
256a1

256a2
1lung ji ltar lags/ nyon cig khrus lung gi rim pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ snying po sngags kyi khrus lung dang/ sku phyag rgya chen po'i khrus lung ngo/ /snying po sngags kyi khrus lung ni/ las kyi sems
256a3
1dpa'i dbur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis steng du/ /yi ge a yi phrang ba gsang ba'i mgul du btab pa'o/ /sngags kyi bdag po la yang der ltar ro/ /sgrol ba'i sras mchog ste/ thugs ye shes rtse gcig pa'i rtse mo
256a4
1la a bkod ste/ las kyi sems dpas dril bas/ 'od du zhu ste 'od zer chu rgyun du byung bas/ sgrol ba'i bdag po la thim pas/ slar gzas pa po a thim pas/ kun bzhi la yod pa'i bag chags bsreg pa ni/
256a5
1snying po sngags kyi khrus lung ngo/ /sku phyag rgya chen po'i khrus lung ni/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la gsal bar 'gyur gyi/ phal pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin no/ /sems dpa' chen po ngan sngags
256a6
1kyi 'khor lo rang shes par bya ba la/ don du mchos bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon cig de la rnam pa drug ste/ dang po 'khor lo lha dang phral ba dang/ 'khor lo gnyis as gzugs la dbab pa
256b1
1dang/ 'khor lo gsum pas byad du bcug pa dang/ 'khor lo bhi pas smyo ru bzhug pa dang/ 'khor lo lnga pas rdul du brlag pa dang/ 'khor lo drug pas zhal du bstan pa'o// 'di ni ngan sngags su shes pa'i
256b2
1rim pa'o// sems dpa' chen po sku phyag rgya chen por shes par bya ba la/ don du mchos bshad du gsol/ las kyi sems dpa' nyon gcig don de rtogs par dka' zhing go bar dka' bas zhus ba legs
256b3
1so/ /kI la ya lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por shies par bya ba ni/ phygs bcu du dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi dpal be'u las snying po 'bru dgu'i tshul du gnas pa n i/ sngags kyi sems dap'o// de las
256b4
1kyi sems dpa' zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ smad lcags kyi phur pa zug gsum par byung nas/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga na bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas pa la phyogs bcu dus
256b5
1gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lag tu thugs ye shes rtse gcig pa byin nas dbang bskur nas/ e ma ho/ las kyi sems dpa' chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus ngan gdul dka' ba'i gang zag gis zhing
256b6
1khams su rnams su bsgral ba'i don gyis shig/ khyod ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gdung 'tshob pa yin gyis/ gang zhi bas mi 'dul ba de la mngon spyod kyi phrin las byos shig// sems dpa' chen po khyod ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdung 'tshob pa yin no// zhes gnang ba byin pa ni// kI la ya lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por shes pa'o// sems dpa' chen po lha'i sku phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa de

1gnas pa yin// rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa'i gnas// byol song sgo dngagati mug 'joms// me long ye shes spyan dang ldan// de ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// sbas pa'i dkyil 'khor
271a2
1dbyug pa la// gsang ba rdo rje bum pa ni// rtsa bran 'khor lo'i ga bu'i dkyil// b+ha ga'i 'khor lor rak+ta'i dkyil// gsang ba byang chub sems 'khor ro// 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa// las kyi rigs de don
271a3
1grub nas// yi dwags phrag dog sgo yang 'gegs// dam tshig sgrol ma nan tan ldan// rtag tu de spyod de bsgom pa// rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba yin// de dag 'khor du gang 'thad dgod// so so'i snying po rang sngags
271a4
1bzla// snying sgo dbang gi 'khor lo la// rta mgrin yab yum sgo mas bskor// mdzod spu rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i 'khor dang ldan// brag dang rtsa yi mtshams nyid du// gtsug gtor cho
271a5
1ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi// mtshon cha rnam lngas brgyan par bya// 'di ni gab pa'i gsang ba'o// rang rang 'khor du rigs lnga 'bar// dbu+u la rdzogs pa'i rigs lngas bsrung// thugs la 'bar ba'i srog yang
271a6
1bzhugs// gnyis ldan sku dang gsung thugs ldan// rab tu srog gi gor shar ba'o// de la rtsa rlung gyes pa ni// rtsa gyes pa ru rlung yang gyes// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// dbang po bzhi la gyes pa'i rtsar// rgyu ba la
271b1
1sogs rlung bzhi gnas// lus la rtsa bran stong phrag lhag khyad par gnas te rlung yang khyab// rus mgo gsum brgya drug cu la// rtsa yi khams su de tsam re/ khyab byed rlung du de yang grags// de ru 'od kyi thig le
271b2
1re// de las gyur ba gsung rdo rje// de ni gsung gi rdo rje 'bar// de las gyur ba rdo rjer gnas// de ni thugs kyi rdo rje 'bar// mkhas pas spro bsdu byas pa yis// phar 'phros pas ni dgra bgegs
271b3
1'dul// slar 'dus rang gi bag chags bsreg/ de ni las kyi rdo rje 'bar// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgoms// rtag tu de ltar de gnas pa// sku+u yi rdo rje 'bar ba yin// de
271b4
1la dbang dang byin brlabs pas// yon tan rdo rje 'bar ba'o// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// rigs kyi bdag po yab yum dang// de ltar rdzogs pa'i ku ma ra// kun gzhi'i rnam shes nyid du 'dod// de
271b5
1yang rgyu yi hUM las bsgyur// de yul don gyis rgyas 'debs ma// gnyis su med pa rtsa ba'i dkyil// de yi khyad par byin brlabs las// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog ser sna dang// sgrib
271b6
1pa lung du ma bstan bzhi// de ltar mi dge bcu pa ni// hUM ring bcu yis sa bon las// so so'i rang sngags rten stobs kyis// brjod pas khro bo bcu ru gyur// de yi cha 'dzin shes pa bcu// hUM la brten pa snga ma
272a1
1bzhin// rnam shes lnga dang dbang po lnga// dza la brten nas gnas bsgyur ba// gsod pa'i za byed pa bcur sprul// yul dang dus kyi cha 'dzin lnga// gsod ma bcu ru snga ma bzhin/ khams dang skye
272a2
1mched de ltar ba// phyogs bcu'i khro bo yin par gsungs// phyag gi mchod pa yang bshad pa// rigs lnga yab yum sor mo rnams// byas pa'i bar du phur pa bcug/ gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// de
272a3
1la bstims pas sras gyur pa// phur pa rdzas su rnam par bshad// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// 'dzab dang bzlas pa'i don ni gang// dkyil 'khor don ni ji ltar bsdu// gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal
272a4
1'tshal// 'dzab bzlas rnam pa du+u ma yang// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'dus// phyi yi bsgrub bya bsnyen pa dang// nang gi rang sems sbyang ba dang// gsang ba'i dngos grub blang ba ni/ khyad par 'gro ste bsdus pa'i
272a5
1don// de yi bye brag rnam bshad pa// dkyil 'khor gsum la tha dad re// dgug dang gsad dang gzhom pa'o// kI la ya hUM phaT bar du// gzhug pa'i snying po tha dad do// dgug pa dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi// yang na dza
272a6
1las gyur pa bya'o// gsad pa mA ra ya gsum las// gzhom zhing brdeg pa a ko Ta// gcig gis gcig bskul 'od zer ni// glog 'brug char gyi tshul du'o// de la bsdus pa'i don bshad pa// rgyal ba'i dkyil
272b1
1'khor ma lus ni// sku gsung thugs yon las lngar 'dus// rigs lngar snang ba ye shes dngos// de yi byin rlabs sprul pa ni// ji ltar 'dod pa yid bzhin tshul// khro bo khro mo rnam sprul yang// gud na med de de
272b2
1las sprul// sprul pa rnams ni rgyu las 'dus// rgyu ni rang bzhin byang chub sems// sems nyid yi ge ar snang ba// a mthong chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong// ma g.yos lta ba'i rgyas btab na// dkyil
272b3

272b4
1nas 'khor rnams kyis bstod// legs so legs so bdag po'i mchog/ legs so legs so don gyi gtso// legs so legs so don dang 'tshal// kun gyi bdag la phyag 'tshal 'dud// ces thams cad
272b5
1dbyings nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rdo rje 'bar ba man ngag gi kalpa pa dum bu'i rgyud chung/ 'khor la gtad pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang/ bod kyi mkhas pa chen po
272b6
1bai ro tsA nas bsgyur ba'o// bka' rgyud 'di yi rgyal po ste// rgya che rab zab chos kyi don// 'di yi gzhung gnas rgyas par 'byung// las 'phro can dang 'phrad na smin// 'di don gab cing sbas par
273a1
1'byung//// rgya gar skad du// nA ma badzra dz+wa la tan+t+ra// bod skad du// rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
273a2

273a3

273a4
1pa'i cha byad can// mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa de/ 'og min gyi gnas gzhi dang snying po me tog gis brgyan pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin rin po che lnga las grub pa tshad dpag tu med pa/ dbyibs dang dog dang
273a5
1khyad par du gyur pa/ gru bzhi dang gru chad dang sgo bzhi sgo dang bcas pa/ rta babs dang/ them skas dang bcas pa/ ka ba brgyad kyis rnam par spras pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pas brgyan pa/ lha mo
273a6
1la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis bklubs pa ni/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/
273b1
1dkon mchog dpal dang/ tshe dpag tu med pa dang/ grub pa gdon mi za rnams btsun mo rnams dang bcas pa dang/ gzhan yang sgeg mo ma dang/ phreng ba ma dang/ dbyangs len ma dang/ gar sgyur ma dang/
273b2
1bdug spos ma dang/ me tog ma dang/ mar me ma dang/ dri chab ma dang/ lcags kyu ma dang/ zhags pa ma dang/ lcags sgrog ma dang/ dril bu ma rnams dang/ gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
273b3
1'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po longs spyod par mdzad de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po yang snang bar mdzad pa dang/ gzhan yang dang por nyid kyi dkyil 'khor nang du zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de mi snang bar gyur
273b4
1to// kye/ khyod ni snying rje dang ldan 'gro ba'i gnyen mchog ste// byams pas kun la skyob cing phan mdzad pa// dga' ba'i pad+ma rgyas pa bdag la yod// bde ba chen po btang snyoms bde ba'i gar mdzod cig/ de
273b5
1nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po de zhal gsum phyag drug par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas/ d+hu pe la
273b6
1sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa dang/ me tog ka ni Sh+ka la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
274a1
1gsol to// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba rnams// rab dgyes khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes brjod pas// nyid
274a2
1kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ zil gyis gnon pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// oM ma hA shU'u n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la// bdag dang
274a3
1chos dang rnam rig dang// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// stong nyid ye nas gnas pa las// shes pas mthong ba'i yul min te// gang gis ye shes bskyed 'gyur ba// de yis
274a4
1yang dag rnam par mthong// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ sems bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las// snying rje'i yul ni rnam bsgom
274a5
1ste// chos gcig po 'di rtsa ba'i phyir// chos rnams kun dang 'dra bar gsungs// de bas shes rab snying rje ni// theg pa'i rang bzhin kho na'o// gzhan gyi don du sems bskyed phyir// byams dang dga' dang btang
274a6
1snyoms sogs// rnal 'byor pa yis ldan par bya// sems can don la dmigs pa dang// chos tsam la ni dmigs pa'o// mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa yis// tshad med bzhi pa bsgom par bya// de nas rgyu yi sa
274b1
1bon bsam// hUM gnas bsdu ba brtsam pa dang// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes// de ru yi ge 'bru bsam mo// yaM raM baM laM taM b+h+rUM hUM/ de nas dgyes pa chen po de/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
274b2
1snyoms par zhugs te/ de nyid sngags kyi bdag po chen por byin gyis brlabs so// brlabs ma thag tu zhal gsum phyag drug par snang bar gyur to// de nas de nyid 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
274b3
1par zhugs te// 'khor skul bsdus nas shes rab ma dang dga' bar byas so// de nas yang dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM AHhUM/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// btsun mo
274b4
1yum gyi b+ha ga la// rim pa bzhin du dgod bya ste// gsang ba yum gyi dam tshig rnams// ldan par bya phyir gdon par bya// de nas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa rnams/
274b5
1dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba dang rtsibs dang rtsibs mchan dang/ gru chad dang/ sgo bzhi go rim bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de yang rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi skyod pa dang/ dkon mchog dpal dang/ tshe dpag tu
274b6
1med pa dang/ grub pa gdon mi za ba rnams dang/ dkar po dang/ mthing ga dang/ dmar po dang/ ser po dang/ ljang gu'i mdog tu snang ba dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang/ ral gri
275a1
1rnams phyag dang po na 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma rnams la 'khyud pa/ badzra d+ha ras dbang bskur ba/ mtshan dang dpe byad du bcas pa/ snyan cha dang mgur chu dang/ dpung
275a2
1rgyan dang/ se mo do la sogs pas mdzes par byas pa dang/ sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu la la sogs rang rang gi mdog dang/ lag cha 'dzin pa
275a3
1rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de
275a4
1nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po de bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnas bsrung ba 'di lta bu gsungs so// dngos po
275a5
1med las dngos po'i tshogs// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung bar 'gyur// ngo bo nyid kyis yang dag par// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi khyad par las// rgyu yi dngos po gsal byas
275a6
1te// gnas nas gnas bsrung rnam par brtsam// a yig dang po lnga par ldan// bcu gcig pa yi thig le yis// spyi bo gtsug tu brtag par bya'o// grangs las 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu pa// rig pa cung zad ser
275b1
1ba las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// steng 'og pad+ma lha chen po// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las bskyed// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
275b2
1dbus mthing zhal// phyag gnyis hUM gi rgya bcings te// dang po rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// lhag ma ji ltar 'dod pa yin// snying gar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// hUM/ de las gnod mdzes rgyal po ni// thugs ka nas
275b3
1ni byung gyur te// spyan sngar bka' nod tshul du gnas// rdo rje tho ba g.yas pa ste// g.yon pa na ni zhags pa'o// A+oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+nA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ bid+yA
275b4

275b5

275b6

276a1

276a3

276a4

276a5

276a6

276b1

276b2

276b3

276b4

276b5

276b6

277a1

277a2

277a3
1ldan// de steng laM las byung ba yi// rin chen gru bzhi rin chain brgyan// 'od zer lnga yi phreng bas bskor// rtse mo gcig ni brgyad kyis spras// bya skyibs bya 'dab ldan pa la// rdo rje rgya gram mdzes par
277a4
1gtams// dpung rnam par bzlog pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// nad rnams myur du bzlog pa'i phyir// rgyun du gtor ma bsngo ba dang// mtshams gcod pa yi dus su ni// 'bar ba chen po'i gar dgu dang// ldan pa'i
277a5

277a6

277b1

277b2

277b3

277b4
1bsnyer nas 'dug pa ni snying rje ba'o// rkang pa dor thabs su byas nas/ g.yon tho ba 'dzin pa la g.yas kyi rdo rje dgug cing/ ha ha zhes brjod cing 'thung ba ni rngam pa'o// de nyid las mnyam pa'i phyag rgya bcas
277b5

277b6

278a1

278a2

278a3

278a5

278a6

278b1

278b2

278b5

279a2

279a3
1mtshan// chos 'byung ye shes rang bzhin ni// dri ma med cing zhi ba'o// de ni nang gi 'khor lo nyid// sna tshogs pad+ma rdo rjes brgyan// de yi steng du b+hUM 'khor lo/ rig mar bcas pa'i snang mdzad bskyed// zhal
279a4
1gsum pa la phyag drug ste// zhal g.yas nag cing g.yon pa dmar// rtsa zhal dbus ni dkar po'o// phyag gnyis rig ma 'khyud nas ni// g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri ste// g.yon na rin chen pad+ma'o// gru bzhi pa la
279a5
1sgo bzhi pa// lte ba rtsibs dang bcas pa dang// gru chad bar khyams rin chen shar// them skas rta babs rnams kyis brgyan// sgo khyud bzhi ni mchog tu mdzes// gar dang rin chen pad+ma dang// rin chen pha gus sgo ,
279a6
1'gram byas// dra ba drwa phyed phyed pa dang// mu tig phreng ba ha ra dang// ya phub rdo rje bcu gcig 'bur// rin chen shar bus phyogs rnams brgyan// chun 'phyang rnams dang ldan pa dang// dar bu khyad kyis rnam par
279b1
1spras// chos kyi 'khor lo ri dwags gnyis/ phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes par gnas// gdugs chen gser gyi yu+u ba can// gsal 'tsher mdzes pa'i sor phreng can// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis
279b2
1bklubs// dbyibs dang kha dog khyad par can// tshad rnams dpag tu med pa ste/ gzhal yas brtsegs pa de la bsgom// sna tshogs pad+ma de la bsgom// nyi zla brtsegs pa mnan pa ni// sangs rgyas dam pa rnams
279b3
1kyi gdan// rang gi mtshan dang ldan pa yis// 'dod chags a la sogs yig 'bru// dbus kyi nyi ma'i gdan la sems// ye shes zla ba brtsegs pa bsgom// dkyil na a dang li nyid de/ kha 'thor thabs kyi yi
279b4
1ge ni// shes rab ye shes rnam par spras// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan par byed// shes rab sgra yig bcu drug ni// rnam pa gnyis su gyur pa'o// a A/ i I/ u U/ e A+ai/ o A+au/ aM A/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ ye
279b5
1shes lnga yi rang bzhin las// rigs ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni// cho ga lnga yi spro bsdu yis// ye shes mngon par byang chub pa'o// rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// sku gsung thugs su yang dag
279b6
1ldan// dbang bskur bya ste bsgrub par bya// thabs mkhas thabs dang ldan pa ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom nas ni// thabs dang shes rab yi ger
280a1
1bcas// snying ga'i pad+ma kha sbyar ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// snang mdzad 'khor lo 'dzin pa gnas// lte ba A+oM gyis mtshan pa la// 'od zer mtshon char ldan pa rnams// byung ste nam
280a2
1mkha'i khams khyab pas// rgyal ba'i tshig drangs klong du gyur// sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin la/ kha dog lnga yi rang bzhin ni// sna yi rtse mor brtag par bya// bdag nyid chos kyi phyag rgya las// gzugs rnams
280a3
1mthong bar gyur pa ni// mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas su// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor thim gyur nas// snying ga'i rtse mor brtag par bya// gnyis su med par rab sbyor ba// 'od zer lcags kyu rnam 'phros pas// ye
280a4
1shes dkyil 'khor rgyun bzhugs nas// A+oM gyis 'dzin par byed pa la// phaT kyis 'phangs pas gsang bar 'dus// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni// sna yi rtse mor brtag par bya// byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid
280a5
1ni// ye shes 'ong ba'i rang bzhin las// zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas pas// gsang ba'i dbyings su brtag par bya// ye shes lnga yi dngos nyid ni// phyi nang gsang bar rab brtag pa// gsang ba mchog gi
280a6
1dam tshig yin// nad rnams med cing 'chi ba med// dus min 'chi ba mi 'byung zhing// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// sngags kyi ngo bos brtags pa na// mtshan ma rnams kyang 'byung 'gyur te// byang chub
280b1
1'tshang rgya gdon mi za// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// gsang ba dam pa mchog gi sa// 'da' bar mi byed dam tshig yin// blun po gang zhig 'da' byed pa// de la dngos grub mi 'byung zhing// dug dang
280b2
1mtshon dang nad bgegs kyis// bsad nas sems can dmyal bar skye// gang gis gsang ba mi shes par// dam pa'i don la 'jug pa ni// ldangs pas nam mkha' bsnyeg pa 'dra// rnam par dben don mi shes
280b3
1par// thos pa tsam la 'jug byed pa// gang dag bsod nams mi byed pa// skyes bu chen po de dag brlag/ yang dag don gyi rang bzhin la// gtong ba la sogs rnam brgyan pa// 'gal bar mi bya dgag pa
280b4
1min// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bya// rnam par dben pa rab shes nas// gsang ba'i don la 'jug 'gyur te// de yis yang dag rnam par mthong// sgra yi don la 'jug pa min// don dam tshol la dang por
280b5
1ni// dngos po'i rang bzhin gsungs pa ste// don rnams rtogs shing chags med na// gsang ba dam pa sbyin par bya// dbang skur gnang ba thob nas ni// nyan dang bsam pa la sogs pa'i// bla ma'i rgyud la
280b6
1gnas pa rnams// sbyangs shing rtogs par ma byas na// gcer bu lag pa stong par 'gro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsang chen snying po rnams// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// bla
281a1
1ma'i kha nas brtag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas de
281a2
1bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po dgyes pa chen po de/ 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa 'di gsungs
281a3
1so// rnam par snang mdzad mngon byang chub// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ser ba'i zhal// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang// rdo rje pad+ma rgya gram 'dzin// phyag rgya bzhi dang rab ldan
281a4
1zhing// yan lag bzhi dang gar sbyor bas// cha stod cha smad med pa yi// skya rengs shar ba'i tshe na ni// bsgrub pa chen po brtsams par bya// lha mo klu mo mi mo rnams// bzhin bzang mig gi dkyus ring
281a5
1ba// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa dang// dkar zhing 'jam la 'dod par dga'// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa dang// nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'am rung// rigs ldan pa dang yon tan ldan// mdog gzugs na so
281a6
1ldan pa ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags 'grub pa// mngon du nye bar spyad par bya// rgyal rigs la sogs bu mo la// 'dod pa la sogs mnyes byas nas// theg chen mchog gi snod du 'gyur// sme sha can dang
281b1
1gdol pa dang// smyig ma mkhan dang shan pa'i rigs// btso blag mkhan gyi bu mo rnams// rnyed nas dor bar mi bya'o// gsal ldan ma yi rang bzhin la// yan lag brgyad dang ldan byas te// sngags grub 'dod
281b2
1pa gang yin pas// byin gyis brlab pa rab tu brtsam// snying ga smin mtshams lte ba dang// gsang ba'i gnas dang rkang pa'i bar// nyi ma dang ni zla bar bcas// rin chen zur brgyad pad+ma brgyad// me yi dkyil
281b3
1'khor gru gsum la// phyag rgya bzhi dang rab ldan pa'i// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid gsang las skyes// rigs lnga la ni rab tu dmigs// spyi bo long bu rkang pa'i mthil// a yig rnams kyis them par
281b4
1gtams// gsang ba'i gnas su a dang hUM// gsang ba'i nor bu A+oM bskyed pa// rtse mo phaT ni nag por bsam// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// ye shes sa bon 'phel bar byed// rgyal ba rnams kyi bdag
281b5
1nyid pas// rnal 'byor pas kyang bsgrub par bya'o// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis su// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bsdus te// 'khor rnams thugs la bzhugs pa yis// shes rab ma ni dga' bar bya// oM
281b6
1sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra ga Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// byang chub sems ni byung ba'i tshe// mkhas pas sngags ni phaT ces brjod// a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nut+pan+na twata ta oM AHhUM/ byang chub sems kyi
282a1
1'od zer gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan med de// dkyil
282a2
1'khor thams cad skyed mdzad pa// 'khor rnams sku gsung thugs nyid de// ngo bor bya phyir rim par bya// rgyu yi ngo bo gnas pa rnams// rnam pa gnyis dang yang dag ldan// don dam pa dang kun rdzob bo// de nas
282a3
1bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos// btsun mo'i mkha' rin po che'i khang par byin gyis brlabs te/ rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par byas nas/ phyi dang 'dra ba nyid du gyur to// de nas 'khor sku las
282a4
1bton te/ nyid kyis dkyil 'khor 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid 'di// de bzhin
282a5
1gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// shin tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// gsang ba'i mchod pas mngon par mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho
282a6
1rgyal ba thams cad kyi// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// sku gsung thugs kyis byin rlobs la// rab dgyes khyod kyis bshad du gsol// zhes brjod pas// dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams
282b1
1cad la gzigs nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer byin gyis rlabs so// de nas yang 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor sku la bsdus
282b2
1so// byang chub sems sprin 'phro ba las// rgyal ba thams cad bskyed mdzad pa// yi ge 'khor lo mtshon chen te// sku yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs mdzad pa'o// b+h+rUM yaM aM muM dzaM maM khaM b+h+yaMhaM taM laM maM/ gI nI d+hUM bu A g+ha dzaHhUM
282b3
1baM hoH/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thabs dang shes rab sa bon byung// de 'og yi ge 'brur gyur pa// gsum pa sku+u rab rdzogs byed pa// cod pan yig 'bru rnams kyis brgyan// i ni hUM khaM/ nam
282b4
1mkha'i khams ni ngos gnas pa// sems can rnams ni ma lus pa// 'od zer lcags kyus drangs pa yis// rgyal ba'i sras su zhugs par gyur// gzugs dang myong pa mtshan ma dang// 'du byed rnam par shes pa
282b5
1rnams// rtag pa la sogs sangs rgyas lnga// rim pa bzhin du yang dag gnas// nam mkha' sa chu me rlung rnams// rdo rje spyan ma la sogs lnga// rim pa bzhin du rnam par grags// mig dang rna ba sna dang
282b6
1lce// sgeg mo la sogs rnam pa bzhi// thams cad du ni yang dag ldan// mig la sogs pa'i rnam shes ni// d+hU pe la sogs grags rnams so// rtag par ma yin la sogs pa// dam pa'i sgo srung dam
283a1
1pa'i thugs// yul la sogs pa'i dbang gis na// thabs dang shes rab rnam 'brel ba// gdung rgyud 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid pas// gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig yin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams
283a2
1cad kyi// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ blun po gang zhig 'da' byed na// de la dngos grub mchog med 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyun zhugs nas// rdo rje'i
283a3
1lam byung 'od zer gyis// gsang ba'i dbyings su zhu mdzad do// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// thugs ka nas ni byung gyur te// 'gro ba'i don kun rab mdzad phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar
283a4
1byed// don rnams mdzad nas brtul zhugs kyis// nyid kyi thugs kar thim gyur te// ho oM AHhUM ho/ byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid la// lha mos bskul bas phyag rgya gsal/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed
283a5
1mdzad nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs pa la// gsang ba'i don rnams ston par mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed nas// 'di skad
283a6
1ces gsungs te/ byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dkar dmar [\[]dngas [\]]dang ba'i rang bzhin gzugs// rnam par snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid// mos pa'i dga' ba rin chen 'byung// mtshan mar 'dzin pa
283b1
1'od dpag med// mngon par 'du byed don yod grub// gsal bar 'dzin pa rnam shes gnas// mi bskyod pa yi bdag nyid do// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can// spyan la
283b2
1sogs pa'i bdag nyid can// lam ni sgeg mor bstan pa ste// bcu pa phreng ba ma yi bdag/ bskul ba dbyangs zhes bya ba ste// bskyod pa gar sgyur ma yin no// dri chen spos me'i rang bzhin te// rak+ta me tog mar
283b3
1ni brjod// sha ni mar me kho nar gsungs// dri chu dri chab ma yi bdag/ chags pa lcags kyu zhes bya ste// pad+mar chud pa zhags pa ma/ kha phyed pa ni sgrog yin te// sgra grags pa ni dril bu ma// de bzhin gshegs pa
283b4
