1rigs lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas/ rang rang gi spyan rgyas par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la/ mgrin gcig dang dbyangs gcig tu bstod pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi bdag
283b5
1po mchog/ dkyil 'khor thams cad ston mdzad pa'i// gser gyi mdog dang 'dra ba yi// rdo rje sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// nges don kun gyi bdag nyid can// gsang ba'i don rnams ston mdzad pa// dri med
283b6
1dbyibs dang ldan pa yi// rdo rje gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes kun gyi rang bzhin can// ci yang sa ler mkhyen mdzad pa// mi rtog ye shes dang ldan pa// rdo rje thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bstod
284a1
1pas// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dgyes pa chen pos khyab par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang tha mi dad par gyur cing/ dbyer med pa ni mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid du mthong ste// dngos
284a2
1po thams cad kyi rang bzhin/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang bdag med pa rnams rang bzhin gyis stong/ gzugs la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid tha mi dad ste/ dngos po thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra
284a3
1bar mthong nas/ ci spyod pa'i bya ba la 'jug par gyur te/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa rnams rtag tu sgom par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil
284a4
1'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po de/ sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las gnas bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor
284a5
1snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa 'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus dag tu// gzhal yas brtsegs pa bsgom nas ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
284a6
1dbus su ni/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rnam snang mdzad chen ye shes ni// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// zhal g.yas gnag cing g.yon pa dmar// rtsa zhal dbus ni dkar po ste// shel gyi
284b1
1mdog dang 'dra ba yin// 'khor lo dang po rdo rje rin// g.yas kyi phyag na rnam par bsgom// g.yon pa dril bu pad+mar la// gti mug rnams kyi don mdzad cing// dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil na bzhugs// mi bskyod
284b2
1in+d+ra nI la'i mdog/ zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon pa dmar// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas// dril bu pad+ma ral gri g.yon// zhe sdang rnam par 'joms mdzad cing// shar gyi rtsibs la yang dag
284b3
1bzhugs// rin chen dbang phyug gser gyi mdog/ g.yas pa nag la g.yon pa dmar// dang po rin chen 'khor lo dang// rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ dril bu dang ni pad+ma dang// ral gri 'bar ba g.yon pa
284b4
1na'o// nga rgyal rnams kyi don byed phyir// lho yi rtsibs la rnam par bzhugs// dpag med pad+ma rA ga dmar// g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa ser// pad+ma 'khor lo rdo rje g.yas// dril bu rin chen ral gri
284b5
1g.yon// 'dod chags zad mdzad gzhon nu'i zhal// nub phyogs rab dgyes rgyab tu bzhugs// don 'grub baiDUr+ya gzhon nu'i zhal// zhal g.yas gser la g.yon pa dmar// ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje
284b6
1g.yas// dril bu rin chen pad+ma g.yon// phrag dog rnam par 'dren mdzad cing// byang gi phyogs na rtag par bzhugs// thams cad rang 'dra'i shes rab 'khyud// ral pa'i dbu rgyan snyan cha dang// mgul chu
285a1
1dpung rgyan do shal bcas// se mo do la sogs pa yis// thams cad rgyan dang gos rab can// mdzes par byas shing rnam par bsgom// lA s+ye sgeg mo mdzes pa dkar/ khu tshur 'dzin cing 'gying
285a2
1bag can// snying rje thabs kyis don byed phyir// rtsibs mchan shar gyi ngos su bzhugs// mA le mdzes pa gser bsregs 'dra// phyag na rin chen phreng ba 'dzin// byams dang smon lam don byed phyir// lho yi
285a3
1rtsibs mchan dag tu bzhugs// byi ru dang 'dra gIrti ma// pi wang rgyud ni phyag na bsnams// dga' dang stobs kyis don byed cing// nub kyi rtsibs mchan yang dag gnas// nIrti in+d+ra ljang gu ste// phyag gnyis
285a4
1gar ni bsgyur ba mdzad// btang snyoms ye shes don grub pa// byang gi rtsibs mchan dag tu bzhugs// d+hU pe dkar ser spos phor 'dzin// sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam ldan pas// ser sna 'chal ba'i tshul khrims
285a5
1rnams// don byed mi yi gru la bzhugs// puSh+pe dmar ser me tog 'thor// bzod dang brtson 'grus rnam ldan pas// 'khrul dang le lo can rnams kyi// don byed phyir na bden bral phyogs// A lo dmar ljang
285a6
1mar me ste// bsam gtan pha rol phyin mdzad pas// rnam par g.yeng ba'i don mdzad phyir// rlung gi mtshams su yang dag gnas// dkar ljang gan+d+he dung phor bsnams// shes rab pha rol phyin mdzad pas// gti
285b1
1mug can gyi don mdzad phyir// dbang ldan gra ru rnam par bzhugs// dbu rgyan thams cad rgyan gyis mdzes// thams cad du ni yang dag ldan// gshed mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs// ye shes me long ldan pa
285b2
1yis// phung po'i bdud rnams 'joms mdzad de// shar gyi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// mi thub nag mo sbrul zhags 'dzin// mnyam nyid ye shes ldan pas na// nyon mongs rnam par dag byed cing// dam pa'i sgo
285b3
1srung lho na bzhugs/ khro gnyer dmar zhing lcags sgrog sdom// ye shes 'od zer rtogs pa'i sa// 'chi bdag sde ni 'joms mdzad phyir// nub phyogs sgor ni bzhugs par mdzad// zhal gcig ljang la dril bu
285b4
1'dzin// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'chang// lha yi bdud rnams rnam par sel// byang gi sgor ni rnam par bzhugs// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can 'jigs pas brgyan// dbu skra khams nag gyen du brdzes// phyag
285b5
1gdub zhabs gdub la sogs rnams// lto 'gro sbrul gyis brgyan cing bzhugs/ khro gnyer 'bru tshugs 'jigs par blta/ smin ma sma ra mig kyang ser// zhal gdangs pa la 'jags kyang 'dril// mche ba
285b6
1gtsigs shing hi hi bzhad// dngos po thams cad 'joms mdzad ma// me stag 'phro zhing rnam par bzhugs// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// dkyil 'khor rnams ni thams cad kyang// yan lag bzhi dang rtag
286a1
1tu ldan// sems bskyed pa ni bsnyen pa ste// dom dam dang ni kun rdzob bo// kun rdzob sems bskyed byin brlabs pa// nye bar bsnyen pa zhes bya ste// 'grub tshe rdo rje bskul ba'o// sgrub pa chen po'i
286a2
1mtha' ru ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'o// gtso dang 'khor gyi rang bzhin ni// rang rang bsnyen pa'i gzugs 'dzin te// byang chub mchog ni sgom par byed// gzugs sogs phung po'i rang bzhin
286a3
1ni// b+h+rUM la sogs pa'i yi ge yis// sangs rgyas lnga ru byin gyis brlabs// spyan la sogs pa'i bdag nyid rnams// lus kyi 'byung ba sa bon bskyed// mig la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni// sa bon rnams kyi gsang
286a4
1ba dang/ mchod pa'i lha mo rnams su gsal// lus kyi rtag pa la sogs pa// dam pa'i khro bor byin brlabs pas// nye bar gyur pa zhes bya bar// snying ga mgrin pa spyi bo ru// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam nas
286a5
1ni// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dag/ hUM aM A+oM gyis mtshon pa las// thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs bsgom// de nyid shes rab sku rgyal ma// lha mo rnams kyi 'od tshogs kyis// dus gsum phyogs rnams khyab pa yis// ma
286a6
1lus sangs rgyas ngas mchod nas// bkra shis don byed rnams la ni// rang gi thugs sogs rdo rje yis// de la byin brlabs bskul bar bya/ rdo rje thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum byed
286b1
1pa// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas bya ste// rdo rje thugs dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de la thugs las byung ba yis// byin gyis
286b2
1brlabs pa'i gnas mdzad do// A+oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// rdo rje gsung 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsung byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas byas te// rdo rje gsung dang
286b3
1ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsung bsgom pas// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// de la gsung las byung ba yis// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA wa
286b4
1At+ma ka\u0f85haM// rdo rje sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad de// rdo rje sku dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pas// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i
286b5
1sangs rgyas rnams// de la sku las byung ba yis// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// bsgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// ye shes dpa' bo'i thugs ka
286b6
1yi// 'od kyis mgon po rnams bskul nas// de dag thugs las byung ba yis// rigs mas bdud rtsi bum chu yi// dbang bskur byas te thim gyur nas// rang sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// dbu rgyan rnams la
287a1
1rigs lnga dang// rigs kyi bdag po rnams kyis brgyan// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA A dar+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM ma hA prat+ya be k+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa
287a2
1At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ A+oM mahA sa ma tA dz+nyA swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// A+oM ma hA kr-i t+yA nuSh+ThAn dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par
287a3
1bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gnas khang rdzogs nas su// dkyil 'khor yan lag bzhi ldan pas// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom nas su// snying ga'i pad+mo khasbyor ba// rin chen khang par dmigs nas su// gsang
287a4
1ba'i gnas nas pad+ma gsal// de steng sgra yi lha mo ser// phyag na pi wang rgyud 'dzin ma// bsams nas ye shes thugs 'od kyis// rgyal ba rnams ni skul bar byed// shar sgo'i sgra yi lha mo yis// sgra yi mchod pa
287a5
1rgyun mi gcad// yang dag mthong bas rnam par grol// de bzhin nyid du gang blta ba// de yis sdig pa chen po byang// rnam dag gsal ba'i bdag nyid la// mtha' dang dbus su mi dmigs te// mi dmigs pa
287a6
1nyid dmigs par bya// gang gis ye shes skyes gyur pa// de la 'jigs pa phra ba'ang med// stong nyid ye shes chen pos ni// sgrib pa thams cad gcod byed ste// rdo rje lta bur 'joms par byed// gnyis med ye
287b1
1shes bde ba che// gang gis sngags la dmigs pa yis// snying ga'i pad+ma yang dag bzhugs// phyag rgya bzhi yis lha mo rnams// dgug dang bcings dang bsdams nas ni// dril bu mas ni mnyes mdzad de// sgra
287b2
1mthar stong pa thar pa ste// bde bas sa la gnas par byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// byang chub sems kyi sgra bsgrags pas// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// stong pa'i nga rgyal bskyed par
287b3
1byed// yang dag bde ba rnam par ldan// 'khor ba'i mtha' yas rnam par grol// gang gis dkyil 'khor skyed mdzad pa// stong pa'i nga rgyal chen po dang// ldan par byas te mi dmigs pa// dngos po zil gyis
287b4
1mnan pa yis// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bskyed nas su// sgra rnams ldan pas sgra mthar stong// yod dang med pa rnam par grol// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang// rdo rje lta
287b5
1bu'i ting 'dzin rnams// skyed par byed pa'i rgyu yin pas// kun la khyab pa'i rang bzhin pas// thabs kyi rim pa'i khyad par gyis// skas kyi rim pa lta bur snang// gang rnams dam pa'i don sgrub pa'i// de bzhin
287b6
1nyid la gnas bcas te// gsang ba'i don la zhugs gyur nas// sangs rgyas sa la gnas par 'gyur// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen par gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
288a1
1gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sku yi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis// dkyil
288a2
1'khor gdon pa'i phyir/ sngags kyi snying po rnams sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo// b+hUM bi shwa shung+d+he/ oM dzi na dzi ka lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ hUM badzra D+h-ika mUM d+hA twI shwa rI/ swa rat+na D+h-ika mAM mo ha ra ti/ aM A ro l-ig pyAM rA ga ra
288a3
1ti/ ha pra dz+nyA D+h+r-ika tAM badzra ra ti/ hUM lA s+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA le sa ma ya ho// hrIM gIrti rA ko\u0f85haM/ aM nirti rA ga yA mi/ dzaHd+hu pe pra be sha/ hUM puSh+pe pa A be sha/ baM DI pa su gi rI/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta// hUM badzra d+ha ro ma hA kro tI shwa
288a4
1rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI ni dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT// oM karma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar
288a5
1gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa kun// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas nas// rang byung dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo// bdag nyid thugs kyi 'od zer
288a6
1gyis// mtshon cha tshogs kyis drangs nas ni// mdun du dkyil 'khor gsal bar dmigs// tha dad ma yin dbyer med do// e h+ye hi b+ha wAn/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ e
288b1
1a ra li ho/ dzA dzA dzAH A+oM badzra sa ma ya A+oM/ A+oM badzra sa ma ya aM/ hUM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ swa badzra sa ma ya swa/ ha badzra sa ma ya ha/ A+oM puSh+pe phu a hUM/ oM pra ba sad ka hi// a hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH khaM raM swA hA/ oM AHhUM/ badzra
288b2
1d+hU pa d+hU swA hA/ oM AHhUM/ badzra te pa te swA hA/ oM AHhUM/ badzra gan+d+he gan swA hA/ oM badzra nI wi t+ye swA hA// oM AHhUM/ badzra ma hA sA twa sa ma ya swA hA/ oM a mr-i te i daM swA hA// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ yon
288b3
1tan phrin las rnam brgyan pa// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor ldan// sku yi dbyig tu bdag bsgyur nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ dbang dang byin rlab mthu ldan pa// da lta nyid du bdag la stsol// oM
288b4
1badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya phaT// ces dngos grub gsol bar bya'o// oM badzra A be sha A/ oM aM/ bdag nyid gzugs brnyan dbyer med pas// tha dad min pa lta bur snang// ye shes
288b5
1rnams kyi bdag nyid ni// gnyis med tha dad ma yin te// nyid la rol pas nyid la spyod// bdag nyid mchod pa chen po ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa yin// nyid la rdzogs par longs spyod pa// de
288b6
1yis theg pa chen po mthong// nyid la dbang bsgyur nyid spyod pas// gzhan du spyad par bya ba min// 'gro ba rnams kyis sems bskyed cing// dman pa'i tshogs rnams bsags pa dang// rnam par dben don mi
289a1
1shes pas// spyan drangs mchod bstod tshul bzhin pas// yang dag don la dmigs 'gyur na// gsang ba'i don la dmigs pa ni// ye shes dkyil 'khor rang bzhin te// gsal ba la sogs gang
289a2
1yin pa// mchod dang bstod pa'i bdag nyid can// bdag nyid yang dag gsal gyur na// spyod yul rnams dang maN+Dal la// stong nyid ye shes chen po ni// ye shes rnams kyi rgyu yin te// dri ma med cing 'od gsal
289a3
1bas// ye shes spyan du rnam par grags// ngo bo nyid kyi skur gyur pa// gzugs rnams nyid kyi rgyu yin te// snang ba med cing kun khyab pa// rtag pa rdo rje kun tu 'od// grub pa bskyed par mi bya ste// shes pa'i yul
289a4
1du ma gyur pas// stong nyid ye shes bskyed par bya// rnal 'byor pa yi shes pa rnams// rig pa lnga yi bye brag gis// sa rnams rim par sa sbyangs te// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// mthar thug rtse mo
289a5
1mngon byang chub// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// chos sku bde ba chen po la// ye shes bzhi yi bye brag rnams// gzugs rnams gnyis la yang dag ldan// thugs rjes 'gro don rdzogs par
289a6
1mdzad// mkha' dbyings gzhal yas brtsegs pa ru// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms te// rang gi rig ma rnam par 'khyud// zas su bshang lci la sogs bza'// bde ba'i ros ni tshims byed
289b1
1pas// gsang ba'i pad+mar gnas khang ldan// zla ba'i gdan dang bcas pa la// byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid ni// dkar dmar 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang// bla na med pa'i
289b2
1byang chub sems// stong nyid dam par sgrub pa'i thabs// dngos grub rab mchog grub pa'o// byang chub sems de rgyu nyid nas// yig 'bru phyag mtshan phyag rgyar gsal// gang la dmigs shing 'dzin pa ni// mtshan
289b3
1ma lnga dang yangadag ldan// bla med byang chub thob par bya// sa dang pha rol mthar phyin nas// bde ba chen po rnam par thob// mi rtog thig le la sogs pa// gang la dmigs par zhig gnas pas// yang dag
289b4
1mngon du mi 'gyur te// nor bu 'od la nor bu bzhin// don dam rigs mthun gang bsgrub pa// rjes su dpogs pa shes pa ste// yang dag lam du zhugs pa yin// thos bsam bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// yang
289b5
1dag lam gyi mthar phyin na// mi rtog ye shes skye bar byed// de yis don dam mngon sum mthong// de yangagasang ba'i dbang gis te// 'jig rten tha snyad btags pa ni// mngon sum rjes su dpag pa
289b6
1rnams// bsam pa'i dbang dang dngos po'i dbang// lam dang 'bras bur mi dgos so// rig pa sbyang nas bde chen te// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// yang dag nyid
290a1
1la 'jug blta ba// yang dag bde ba thob par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste
290a2
1drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ bro gar dang spyod pa rnams phyag rgya yin par
290a3
1'dod pas/ yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab pa 'di gsungs so// chos kyi 'byung gnas khyad par las// lha dang lha mo'i ngang nyid du// yan lag thams cad byin brlabs na// bskyod
290a4
1bsgul thams cad phyag rgya yin// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i rol mo rnam 'phros pas// ngag dang lus kyi yod pa rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya yin par grags// rdo rje rigs dang rin chen
290a5
1rigs// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis// gnyis su med par sbyor ba ni// rdo rje thal mo bshad pa yin// lag gnyis sor mos nang du bsnol// gung 'dzub mthe bong mthe'u chung rnams// sor mo rtse sprad srin
290a6
1lag bsgreng// spyi yi dam tshig phyag rgya yin// lag pa sor mo rgyab bsnol te// g.yas kyi mthe bong bkug nas ni// g.yon gyi mthe bong rtse sprad pa// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya yin// sor mo nang du bsnol nas
290b1
1kyang// gung mdzub la sogs rtse sprad nas// srin lag bzhibs te bsgreng ba ni// mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya mchog/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol nas kyang// gung bsgreng rtse sprad mthe bong bkug/ mdzub mo ngos la sbyar ba
290b2
1ni// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis sor mo rgyab tu bsnol// mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang// rtse sprad pad+ma'i tshul du bya// mtheb bkug tshe dpag med pa'i rgya// lag g.yon khu tshur bcangs
290b3
1nas ni// dkur brten g.yas kyi sor mo rnams// thal mo sbyar nas gdengs pa ni// gdon mi za ba'i phyag rgya yin// yum rnams rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// thabs la 'khyud cing zur gyis blta// 'jo bsgeg rang
290b4
1rtags tshul 'dzin pa// dril bu dang pos 'dzin par byed// lag gnyis sor mo rgyab tu bsnol// gung bsgreng rtse mo sprad nas ni// bug bug por ni byas nas ni// dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin/ khu tshur gnyis ni
290b5
1bcangs nas kyang// 'gying bag sku ru 'dzin pa la// g.yon du zur mig blta ba ni// rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// sor mo rgyab tu bsnol nas ni// rna ltag gnyis su bzung na
290b6
1ni// de nyid phreng ba ma yi rgya// g.yon gyi khu tshur bcangs nas ni// sor mo cung zad bsnol ba la/ kha 'gram bzung nas g.yas pa yi// 'dzub mo bsgreng nas 'gyed pa ni// pi wang tshul 'dzin dbyangs ma'i
291a1
1rgya// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// g.yas nas g.yon du skor byed cing// gar thabs sgyur bar byed pa ni// gar sgyur ma yi phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyi khu tshur gnyis/ kha sprod g.yog
291a2
1pa'i tshul byas te// sna yi tha kar bzung ba ni// bdug spos ma yi phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// snyim pa'i tshul du byas ni// snying ga'i thad kar 'dzin pa yin// 'di ni me tog ma yi
291a3
1brgya// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// sor mo bkug nas gung mo bsgreng// thugs kar mdzes pa mar me ma'i// phyag rgya yin par rnam par grags// lag pa g.yas pa thugs kar mnan// g.yon pa dku la
291a4
1brten pa ni// dril bu ma yi phyag rgya zhes// dpa' bo chen pos rnam par bshad// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las// mthe bong gnyis ni rab bsgreng ste// 'dzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bya// gshin rje 'joms
291a5
1pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sor mo rnams// sor mo rgyab tu bsnol nas ni// g.yas su gdengs nas 'phen pa'i tshul// byas pa mi thub ma yi rgya// lag gnyis rgyab ni sprad nas kyang// mthe chung
291a6
1gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis// so sor 'khyud nas bsnams pa ni/ khro gnyer ma yi phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa bskum nas g.yon pa yis// dril bu 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya// ral gcig ma yi phyag rgya zhes// dpa'
291b1
1bos rab tu bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen pos// sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can yin pa'i phyir/ nyid kyi snying
291b2
1po'i rang bzhin spros pa nye bar zhi ba 'di gsungs so// bdag dang sems can skyes bu dang// byed pa po la sogs pa yi// dngos po'i bdag nyid stong nyid ltar// byis pa rdul las dngos por 'dod// chos tsam
291b3
1la ni dmigs par byed// de nyid phyogs chas mi 'grub cing// gcig min du ma ma yin no// de nyid phyir na de stong min// de stong pa ma yin yod med min// mi skye ma yin skye ba'ang med// rtag min chad pa ma
291b4
1yin la// mtshan med smon pa med pa zhes// de la sogs pa rnam par bshad// de bas dam pa'i don nyid ni// rten cing 'brel ba gang byung ba// sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' spangs te// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa// de
291b5
1phyir dri za'i grong khyer 'dra// rten 'brel ngo bo ma skyes pas// skye dang 'gag par mi 'grub ste// yang dag don du mi blta bas// sgyu ma bzhin du rnam par snang// 'jig chags stongs la sogs pa yi// rgyu nyid rten
291b6
1cing 'brel 'byung bas// de bzhin nyid ni med 'gyur te// nam mkha' dang pa'i rang bzhin te// rten cing 'brel 'byung gang mthong ba// de bzhin nyid las bde bar gshegs// kun la khyab par gnas pas
292a1
1na// mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam par 'gyur// dngos po rnams ni stong pa ste// stong pa nyid kyis dngos po la// tha dad ma yin dbyer med pas// gzhan du byas pa ci yang med// srid dang zhi ba'i
292a2
1khyad par ni// cha shas tsam yang yod pa min// gang la goms pa der snang bas// sbyin la sogs pa rnam mi 'gal// gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams// kun gyi rang bzhin chos nyid las// gzugs la
292a3
1sogs pa mthong ba na// chos nyid mthong bas bde bar gshegs// dam pa'i yul du gyur pa na// rnam kun mkhyen pas ma gzigs te// mthong bar bya ba'i rang bzhin dag/ shes rab can gyis rtogs par
292a4
1gyis// 'ga' yang mthong ba med pa ni// de nyid mthong bas chen por bas// stong nyid ye shes chen pos ni// yang dag mthong nas rnam par grol// shes pas mthongaba'i yul med de// lam lnga dag tu tshogs
292a5
1bsags shing// sgrib pa rnam par dag byas te// pad+ma spyan du gyur pa ni// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub// pad+ma can gyi ye shes ni// rang byung ye shes chen po ste// dam pa'i don la 'dus bsgom
292a6
1nas// goms pas 'jug tu rang byunga'achar// goms te sla bar mi 'gyur ba'i// dngos med gang yang yod mi 'gyur// yang dag don gyi rang bzhin las// brjod par bya ba'i dngos po dag/ rdul cha tsam yang med
292b1
1pa'i phyir// ci yang gsung du med pa'o// de ltar shes par byas nas ni// gsang ba'i don la 'jug par bya// gzhal yas brtsegs pa'i dbus su ni// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas// thabs dang shes rab
292b2
1gnyis med pas// lte ba'i steng du yi ge A// bsgom nas snying ga'i pad+mar bzhag/ 'od zer spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis// de ma thag tu bder 'gyur ro// hUM yig zla bar bcas pa ni// rdo rje mtshon cha mchog 'od
292b3
1'bar// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// rgya chen rab zab mdor bsdus pa'o// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bla na med pa sgrub byed pa'i// thabs kyi mchog tu gsungs pa ste// bstan pas yongs su
292b4
1grol bar bya// gsang sngags tshul la mi gnas shing// de bzhin nyid don mi rtogs par// tshig tsam la ni gnas byed de// dad med nyes na phung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
292b5
1dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du dbyer med pa'i dgyes pa
292b6
1chen po des// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor du bzhengs te// sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gzhan gyi don du ri mo'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bzhed nas// zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/[ \u0f72\u0f7e]
293a1
1bzhugs pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pas mchod de/ 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho sangs rgyas kye sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// sku yi
293a2
1dkyil 'khor rab tu dag/ dkyil 'khor rab dga' bshad du gsol// e ma ho chos kyi don 'byung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med pa// gsung gi dkyil 'khor dri ma med// dkyil 'khor dag pa dri ma med pa
293a3
1gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ shes bya la sogs sgrib gnyis grol// ye shes rnams kyis don mdzad pa// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// sku
293a4
1gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'gro ba dag phyir ri mo yi// dkyil 'khor nyams ni dga' bar bshad// ri bo dben pa ri sul yod// chu klung rnams dang 'bab pa dang// me tog nags tshal rnams kyis
293a5
1brgyan// yon tan thams cad ldan pa yi// nyams dga'i gnas su bsam gtan bya// mang du thos shing skyo ba bzod// brtan zhing rdul la blo gros che// bya ba mkhas pa g.yo sgyu med// 'khor dang 'jig dang rnam
293a6
1bral te// sems can kun la mi 'jigs ster// de ni slob dpon yin pa ste// dkyil 'khor pa yi las bya'o// yid gsal spro zhing bya ba mkhas// dad dang brtul zhugs brtson 'grus can// yid ches ser sna
293b1
1rnam grol te// the tshom mi byed dam tshig ldan// slob ma rnams kyi dam tshig yin// dang por sa bzhi brtags nas ni// de yi sta gon bkra shis la// tha mar dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
293b2
1bsgoms nas ni// rig pa'i me tog bor byas te// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya// gos rgyan mdzes par byas pa yi// blo gros can gyi mkhas pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams/ khru bzhi
293b3
1pa'am khru brgyad pa// bcu drug nyi shu rtsa lngar byas// sor bzhi pa nas bzung nas ni// ji srid dpag tshad rgyang grags par// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis ni// tshad rnams nges par ma gsungs so// gtsang
293b4
1ma'i spu dang a shwata shun// tshad ma rab tu mdzes pa yi// tshon sna lnga skud bu chos bkal// de yis dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// rang gi rigs kyi sa bon rnams// thig skud ye shes lnga ldan pas// nyi shu rtsa lngar
293b5
1dbye ba nyid// bdag nyid bdag po'i gzugs bsgoms la// dza las nyi ma zla ba'i mig/ de yis mtshon char grangs nas ni// dkyil 'khor rnams la thim par bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi dri yis ni// bskus nas de
293b6
1nas btung bar bya// rdo rje las rab ljang gu ni// karma badzra ha zhes dbyung// thig skud ye shes lnga ldan pa// lte bar khu tshur g.yon gyis mnan// las kun byed par bzung nas ni// nam mkhar btab pa rang
294a1
1bzhin dang// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed// gzugs brnyan gsal phyir sa thig gdab// oM badzra sa ma ya su tra ma ti kra ma hUM// shar nas nub bltas lho nas byang// phyi yi phyogs
294a2
1bzhir rab tu gnas// me dang bden bral mtshams gnas shing// grwa bzhi'i thig ni rab tu gdab// dbus su phur pa btab byas te// mu khyud zlum por bskor nas kyang// gra bzhi la sogs sgo bzhir ldan// twa
294a3
1ra Na bzhis klub pa'o// rdul tshon rnams ni bri bar bya// de la rigs rnams sa bon las// lha yi rang bzhin ldan byas te// 'od zer lcags kyus drangs pa rnams// tshon gyi phye ma lnga las thim// ye shes lnga yi
294a4
1bdag nyid can// dkyil 'khor nang du 'dug nas kyang// dkar po la sogs rnam pa lnga// 'dul ba'i cho ga ji bzhin du// dbang ldan phyogs nas bri bar bya// g.yas g.yon mnyam po rgyun mi gcad// tshon gyi phye
294a5
1ma sna lnga yi// dkyil 'khor sdug gur bri bar bya// shar du in+d+ra nI la'i steng// lho dang nub tu ser dang dmar// byang du ljang gu ldan pa ste// dbus su dkar po bri bar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang// pad+ma
294a6
1ral gri la sogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rab tu dmigs// sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon gyis// tshe dpag med dang mi bskyod dang// rigs kyi bye brag shes byas la// rang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su
294b1
1dgod// dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang rnams ni// rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// sdig bshags skyabs su song nas ni// pad+ma'i
294b2
1gdan la me tog gtor// yon phul ye shes spyan phye nas// dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid bstan// rgyal ba rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes chu yis gang ba yi// phyi nang gsang ba bum pa yis// slob ma bdag
294b3
1po'i gzugs su bya// dbu rgyan rdo rje dril bu sogs// bdag po'i dbang ni bskur nas kyang// rigs rnams kun dang ldan par bya// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang// ral gri las rnams dbang du bskur ro// sha
294b4
1khrag dri chen dbang bskur ro// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// rnal 'byor pas ni spyad par bya// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/ sha chen ba lang khyi sha rnams/ khams kyi zas su bza' bar bya// ma dang bu mo
294b5
1sring mo las// rtag tu 'dod pa spyad par bya// gtsang sme rtog pa dang bral na// de nyid rig pa'i brtul zhugs yin// 'di la mi bya ci yang med// bza' bar mi bya ci yang med// de nyid sangs rgyas kun dang
294b6
1'dra// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ro// dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras// longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong/ ci yang gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// bla na med pa'i
295a1
1byang chub sems// bdud rtsi rnams dang gang ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i gsang ba'i lam phyung nas// slob ma rnams su thim par bya// de 'di rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dbang bskur ba yi thabs mchog
295a2
1ste// gang gis bla med sgrub pa na// rtag tu 'bral bar mi bya'o// shes rab thabs su gar sbyor bas// gsang ba rnams dang ldan byas te// slob mar dbang bskur chen po sbyin// dngos grub mchog tu gyur pas
295a3
1na// rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bde ba chen po grub pa'i thabs// mnyam med rnyed par thob gyur te// sa dang pha rol phyin pa yi// lam gyi mchog tu gyur pas
295a4
1na// rang byung ye shes chen po ni// da lta nyid du mthong bar 'gyur// dus min 'chi ba mi 'byung zhing// phyi nang nad rnams sel bar byed// 'khrug dang sdug bsngal brgyad po rnams// 'jigs shing mya ngan 'ching ba
295a5
1med// yams nad 'tshe ba mi 'byung zhing// pha rol dmag tshogs 'jigs par byed// da lta bde dang phyi ma bde// thams cad kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// rtag tu spang bar mi bya ste// 'das na dmyal bar ltung bar
295a6
1'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams bsgom nas// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod de// 'gro ba'i don rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir// sbyin bsreg las rnams rdzogs par bya// gru bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor
295b1
1la// hom khung khru gang tshad du bya// zabs su khru gang kha khyer rnams// sor ni bzhi pa'i tshad du bya// zlum po gru bzhi zla gam gdengs// gru gsum dkar ser dmar dang nag/ me 'od nges la rdo rje kha// rin chen
295b2
1pad+ma thod pas brgyan// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang// pad+ma ral gri la sogs pa// khung gi mthil du lhag par dgod// shar du khri ste ku sha lho// nub tu pad+ma gru gsum byang// shing gi lha ste mdog dkar
295b3
1la// mchod yon rnams kyis mnyes byas la// me yi gra nas gcad par bya// zhi rtse rgyas par dbang gi sbom// drag po drung pa dag la bya// dri dkar sbrang rtsi tsan+dan dmar/ khrag spos sbyar te bskur bar bya// bsreg
295b4
1shing khru do yam shing sor// bcu gnyis pa yi tshad du bya// dkar ser dmar dang nag po'o// 'o ma tsan+dan mngar gyur pa// dug shing tsher ma can la sogs// so so'i mtshan dang sbyar ba yin// dgang gzar blug
295b5
1gzar so so'i dbyibs// yu+u ba khru gang tshad du bya// dgang gzar sor bzhi sor gnyis zabs/ kha ran sor gcig dkyil rin chen// ngos la'ang yi ge 'bar ba bsgom// blugs gzar sor gnyis sor gcig
295b6
1zabs/ kha khyer sor gcig dkyil rdo rje// ngos la yi ge rnam bsgom nas// gtun khung rang rang dbyibs dang mdog/ ri rab ri bdun mtsho dang bcas// dngul phye 'bras chen dkar po dang// gser zangs
296a1
1lcags dang 'bras chen thug/ dung dang khrag la sogs pa yis// so so'i gtor ma mdzes par bya// gser dngul zangs lcags so so'i shing// mgo bo rgyan mdud rtse mo rnams// zlum po gru bzhi zla
296a2
1gam zur// dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsgom bya ste// mtshan mar bcas pa'i gzugs brnyan la// bkug nas phur pa btab nas ni// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// rgyan chas lnga dang ldan pa yis// yo byad
296a3
1bsangs gtor byas nas ni// ku sha bting nas yam shing la// me spar yi ge gsum pos sbyangs// dkyil 'khor zhal du gyur pa'i me// sa bon mar gyis byug par bya// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// dang po
296a4
1rang rtags shes rab 'khyud// g.yas gnyis bgrang 'phreng skyabs sbyin la// g.yon pa gun+de rig pa 'dzin// de nas ye shes dam pa'i me// bos nas mchod phul gnyis su med// me lha rnams kyi gzhal yas
296a5
1khang// dam pa'i 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu dbul// mar khu til dang dar ba dang// 'bras dang zho dang ku sha rnams// rim par phul te las rnams bstan// mchod dang bstod pa
296a6
1tshul bzhin bya// dbang bskur ba yi rim pa dang// sbyin sreg las rnams byed don du// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cha byad rnams// slob dpon gyis ni bgyer bar bya// slob mas khyer na dam tshig nyams// bla ma spang
296b1
1bar mi bya ste// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang// nam kyang spang bar mi bya'o// dka' thub kyis ni mi gdung ste// bla ma brnyas par bya ba min// gang gis bla ma brnyas byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad brnyas pa
296b2
1yin// dug dang tsha ba'i rims nad dang// gdon bgegs mkha' 'gro'i 'tshe ba dang// tshogs bdag drag pos bsad nas ni// dmyal ba rnams su nges par bsreg/ de bas rin chen bla ma la// rin chen rnams
296b3
1dang lus kyi bar// rjes su rig pa de la dbul// bdag po phyag rgya mnyam bzhag la// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bskyed bya ste// mgrin pa snying ga lte ba gsang// chu dang rdo rje me rlung rnams// rim pa bzhin du yang
296b4
1dag ldan// rlung gis me ni sbar byas pas// dbang chen gnas su chu bdag bskyed// bza' ba'i kha zas bye brag rnams// rim bzhin du ni mchod nas kyang// pad+ma la ni pad+ma can// thal ba mthar ni rnam par
296b5
1rtags// phung po bud shing bsregs nas ni// bla med dam pa'i me sbar la// dam pa'i 'khor lo rnams bsgom nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod par bya// rims drug gis ni mi tshugs shing// nad do cog
296b6
1las thar bar byed// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang// myur du thob par gdon mi za// ma ning bzlas pa byed 'dod pas// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi rang bzhin la// rtag tu 'bral bar ma byed cig/ bdag
297a1
1po'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa yis// rang gi rig ma ldan byas nas// rig ma dang ni dam tshig byas// gsang ba'i pad+mar me tog brlan// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i// gsang ba'i ri bong me nyid
297a2
1sbyang// de yi mkha' dbyings dkyil 'khor nas// ye shes bdud rtsi chu rgyun gyis// rgyal ba thams cad rtag tu mchod// rgyal ba ma lus thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs su byin rlobs shing// sras kyi dam par
297a3
1de 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ dngos po 'joms shing zad par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gnas spar ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// bkra shis pa dang gdul
297a4
1bya dang// zhing du gyur pa'i bdag nyid la// snying gi pad+ma las byung ba// 'od zer 'bar ba'i mtshon cha yis// rnam par shes pa ldan byas te// de nyid gsum gyis rnam sbyangs nas// nyi zla'i steng du yang dag
297a5
1bzhag/ he ru kar ni gsal byas nas// hUM hUM hUM gis nga rgyal bya// lcags kyu gri nag 'bar ba 'chang// tsit+ta nang gi lus nyid la// sbyang ba rnams kyi rnam snang mdzad// dkyil 'khor kun dang bcas pa la// rlung
297a6
1dang nyi zla'i steng du bzhag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang gi/ dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod byas te// sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phangs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su byas// de ni de ma thag tu
297b1
1yang// las kyi sgrib pa dag gyur nas// bde ba can gyi zhing khams su// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// sras dang spun dgongs dngos grub ster// nyes pa ma lus rnam dag nas// de nyid sangs
297b2
1rgyas kun dang mnyam// go 'phang bla na med pa thob// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ dgyes pa chen po nyid dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi don dang/ spros pa rnams tha mi dad
297b3
1cing dbyer med pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ni dben pa'o// zhi ba'o// bde ba dang ldan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi
297b4
1rang bzhin can no// zhing khams rnam par dag pa'o// snang ba ni dam pa'i yul du ma gyur pas/ kun tu brtag pa'o// dam pa'i yul ni de'i rang bzhin pas// yang dag pa'i bden pa'o// zhes gsungs nas// de
297b5
1dag gi thabs 'di lta bu gsungs so// rig mar bcas pa'i sems kyis ni// rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes rnams// rgyun zhugs yi ge phaT kyis 'phangs// slar yang phaT kyis ye shes nyid// klad pa'i steng du
297b6
1'phangs par gyur// tsa na ka dang nas kyi 'bru// phra mo'i thig la yang ting 'dzin rdzogs par bsgom// de ni bde ba chen po yi// thabs su rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bla na
298a1
1med pa thob par byed// yang dag don la gang blta ba// yang dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs// de nyid mtshan mar dmigs gyur na// glang po rnyed bzhin rjes tshol 'dra// de bzhin gshegs
298a2
1pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan sku gsung thugs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po
298a3
1rnam par snang mdzad kyi de kho na nyid kyi phrin las rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ tshogs kyi mchod pa 'di gsungs so// gsang ba'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// sangs rgyas dkyil
298a4
1'khor bsgoms nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// mchod pa bla na med pas mchod// thams cad bdag nyid bde chen sku// yang dag brjod med longs spyod mdzad// mi rtog ye shes 'khor lo
298a5
1bskor// sku gsung che la phyag 'tshal lo// snying gi pad+ma las byung ba// nam mkha'i khams kyi bud med rnams// gdan dang rgyan rnams sna tshogs dang// spos phor la sogs mtha' yas pa// spyan la sogs pa'i
298a6
1rang bzhin la// lha tshogs mdzes pa phul te thim// 'jig rten khams rnams ji snyed pa// rin chen rnams kyis bkang nas ni// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// sha khrag dri chen rdo rje chu// byang chub sems
298b1
1su bcas pa rnams// rta sha khyi sha ba glang sha/ glang chen sha dang sha chen dang// sna tshogs sha rnams thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// rgyal ba'i tshogs
298b2
1rnams rgyun zhugs nas// gsang ba'i pad+mar byung nas ni// shes rab so so'i ba spu nas// lha mo rnams kyi 'od tshogs rnams// byung nas rgyal ba mnyes mchod de// rgyun zhugs ka niSh+ka ra ste// rdo rje las byung ma li
298b3
1ka/ u ni ka ni sa bon 'phangs// gsang ba'i pad+mar me tog rlan// ka ra bi kha zhes gsungs te// lha mo rnams ni thams cad kyis// mchod pas dngos grub rab tu ster// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin
298b4
1pas// byang chub sems kyi nyi zla ste// srin mtheb gnyis kyis blangs nas ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// rdo rje pad+mar rab ldan te// sangs rgyas dkyil
298b5
1'khor ma lus la// dgyes pa'i ros ni tshims byed pa// reg pa'i sbyor ba dbul bar bya// rtag tu rgyal ba mnyes mchod nas// tshogs bsags sgrib pa rnams sbyangs nas// rang byung bla na med pa 'char// rlung
298b6
1me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bdud rtsi A+oM gyis mtshon pa de// sku gsung thugs dang yang dag ldan// dri ma med cing mdangs 'char ba// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun rnams// de yis ye shes sems dpa'
299a1
1mchod// rdo rje gsum gyi bdag nyid can// rdo rje gsum du rnam bsgoms te/ kha dang lce yi dam tshig kyang// rdo rje gsum du ldan byas te// bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin la// rdo rje gsum du byin
299a2
1brlabs te// zos na rdo rje gsum thob 'gyur// rang bzhin gyi ni sbyor sgrol dang// thal chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang// dbang po yul dus sbyor sgrol dang// mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol rnams// rnal 'byor pas
299a3
1ni spyad par bya// sbyor ba nyid na sgrol ba ste// sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// bza' dang btung dang gos brgyan dang// bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams dang// gdugs dang ba dan mdzes pa rnams// bro dang
299a4
1gar thabs bskyod rnams dang// glu tshig snyan par byas pa yis// rgyal ba thams cad mchod par byed// me tog la sogs mdzes pa yis// mngon shes drug dang ldan par 'gyur// rin chen bdun la sogs pa
299a5
1yis// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// dri ma lnga po dag gyur nas// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis// mi snang ba yi bdag por
299a6
1'gyur/ khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub mchog ni 'grub par byed// ba lang sha yi dam tshig gis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// glang po'i sha yi dam tshig gis// rdo rje'i rigs mchog dam
299b1
1par 'gyur// sha chen dag gi dam tshig gis// don rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// bud med thams cad mchod pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ster// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yis// rdo rje
299b2
1'dzin par bdag nyid 'gyur// rig pa sbyor ba'i mchod pa yis// thams cad bdag nyid chen por 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi bdud rtsis ni// ngan song sbyang zhing rnam rtog med// a li ka li'i mchod pa
299b3
1yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par byed// bza' btung gos rgyan mchod pa yis// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gdugs la sogs pa'i mchod pa yis// yid bzhin rin chen ldan par bya// bro
299b4
1gar bskyod pa'i phyag rgya yis// nam mkha' chu la sogs pa la// 'chags shing rab tu thogs pa med// glu tshig sgra yi mchod pa yis// chos kyi gsung yang thob par byed// mchod pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyis// mi
299b5
1snang la sogs dngos grub dang// mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis bstod do// rnam par snang
299b6
1mdzad mchog gi dpal// me long ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// gzugs dang gti mug rnam dag pa// rdo rje sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// tshe dpag med pa bde ba che// ye shes so sor rtog pa 'chang// 'du shes 'dod
300a1
1chags rnam par dag/ rdo rje gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mi bskyod mchog gi dbang// stong nyid ye shes chen po ste// de yi rnam shes zhe sdang 'joms// rdo rje thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje
300a2
1rin chen 'byung gnas dpal// mnyam nyid ye shes thob byed pa// myong dang nga rgyal dag byed pa// yon tan sku khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gdon mi za ba mchog gi dpal// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes 'chang// phrag
300a3
1dog 'du byed rnam par dag/ phrin las sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos// gsang ba lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ man ngag dam pa 'di
300a4
1gsungs so// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid can// gsang ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'i// bum pa'i
300a5
1rtse mor rnam par bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
300a6
1la mchod pa dang bstod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ rnam par snang mdzad dgyes pa chen po des/ shin tu sbyor
300b1
1ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu gsang ba'i don rnams thabs ma nor ba 'di lta bu gsungs so// bskyed dang rim par 'brel ba dang// rdzogs dang rim par 'brel ba yis// gsang ba'i
300b2
1dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rab bsgom ste// sku yi dkyil 'khor ldan byas la// bdag gi de nyid kho na de// byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang// 'khor lo bzhi dang sdom pa bzhi// ldan
300b3
1par byas te sngags bsgrub pa// thabs dang shes rab bde ba nas// gyen du rgyu dang thur du rgyu// rnam pa bcu pa gnyis su 'gyur// srog dang rtsol ba las byung ba'i// rim pa rlung gi de kho na// sngags la dmigs pa
300b4
1zhes bya ba// sngags kyi de kho na nyid do// de la bdag gi de kho na nyid ni// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gnas khang rdzogs byas te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su
300b5
1rgyal ba rnams// rim pa gnyis kyis rdzogs byas te// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa la// snying gar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// rang gi bdag po'i cod pan can// thabs dang shes rab rnam 'brel te// yan lag
300b6
1bzhi ni shin tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bskyed byas nas// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan par bya// bdag gi de nyid rim gyis ni// rlung gi de nyid yang dag 'jug/ dang po rang nyid byin brlabs nas// dkyil
301a1
1'khor kun dang ldan pa la// sbyor ba'i cho ga las byung ba'i// 'khor lo bzhi rnams rab tu dmigs// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo che// pad+ma pad+ma las byung
301a2
1ba// sa bon yi ge rnams kyis mtshan// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// sems dpa' rnams kyi yi ge dang// lte ba la ni yi ge ho/ haM yang// de nyid 'gog pa mya ngan 'das// bde ba chen po rdo rje'i sku// dang
301a3
1po bum pa'i dbang du gsungs// lam gyi 'bras bu'i tshul 'chang ba// rigs bzhi'i sa bon phyogs dag tu// ngag gi lam gyi lte bar hrIH/ denyid lam du gsungs pas na// longs spyod mdzad pas longs spyod
301a4
1sku// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang yin no// bden pa bzhi yi rang bzhin dang// thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig pas// lte ba'i steng na yi ge hUM// thabs dang shes rab bsdud par byed// de nyid rnam pa kun 'byung
301a5
1ba// chos kyi sku yi bdag nyid pas// gsum pa shes rab ye shes so// thun mong mtshan dang ldan pa yi// rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur bas na// phyogs mtshams dag gi rigs kyi rnams// sa bon gnyis kyis mtshan
301a6
1ma las// lte bar A+oM yig rnam par bsam// sdug bsngal bdag nyid ldan pas na// sprul pa'i don rnams rab mdzad pa// bzhi pa'i don nyid 'byin pa'i dbang// bden pa bzhi yi bye brag gis// chos dang ye
301b1
1shes rnam ldan pa'o// yan lag bzhi pa'i rang bzhin dang// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs pa// cho 'phrul bzhi dang rnam ldan pas// dgongs don 'brel ba rab sgrub bo// rim pa gnyis dang rab ldan
301b2
1zhing// brjod pa thams cad 'dus pa yin// lus kyi rtsa ni ji snyed pa// sum brgya drug cu ldan pa la// rnam pa drug tu bstan pa yin// de nyid gsum gyi bdag po ste// thabs dang shes rab bde chen rtsa// de kho na
301b3
1nyid gsum du 'dus// bdud rtsi lnga yi bdag nyid pas// bdud rtsi lnga ni 'byung bar byed// de nyid bdud rtsi lngar 'gyur ro// 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin dang/ kha dog lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// gyen dang thur du rgyu
301b4
1ba'i rlung// srog dang rtsol ba zhes bya ste// rnam pa bcu pa gnyis su 'gyur// de yis 'byung ba'i rim pa yis// gsang ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// sngags kyi de nyid yang dag 'jug/ zung 'jug ting 'dzin
301b5
1gnas gyur na// gang du bslab par mi bya'o// sngags kyi de nyid 'dir gsungs pas// rnal 'byor rnams kyis shes par gyis// gang la sangs rgyas gnas gyur pa// de nyid gsang ba dam pa ste// de bzhin
301b6
1gshegs pa'i spyod pa yin// rnal 'byor rnams kyis de shes na// yang dag don la zhugs pa yin// stong nyid ngo bor gnas pa yin// tshad med bzhi yang zil gyis gnon// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyis
302a1
1ni// ye shes bde ba thob par byed// phyag rgya bzhi dang yan lag bzhi// de ltar chos kyi sku dang ni// thun mong mchog tu gsungs pa yin// de nyid sa bon bdag nyid pas// phra mo'i thig le gsal
302a2
1bar byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub chen po bla med pas// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor bas// sngags la dmigs pa thob par 'gyur// sngags la dmigs pa'i bdag nyid kyis// stong
302a3
1nyid ye shes thob par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas// yang sngags bsgom pa 'di gsungs so// sngags la dmigs pa'i lus kyis ni// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin dag/ sbyor ba'i
302a4
1lhums su 'phangs pas te// pad+ma zla ba kha sbyar ba// de yi tshangs pa'i bu ga nas// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// dbug ni thig le nyid du bzhag/ yang na sngags la dmigs pa yis// byang chub sems kyi
302a5
1rang bzhin dag/ gsang ba'i gnas su zhu bar byed// 'od zer rnams kyis rang bzhin gyi// byang chub sems ni zhu mdzad de// mi rtog ye shes skye bar byed// lus dang ngag dang sems rnams ni// sngags la
302a6
1dmigs pa'i mtshan ma dag/ 'dar zhing sprugs par 'bar ba dang// bar snang dag la gnas par byed// de nyid zhu bar gyur pa dang/ khams kyi zas dang rnam bral te// mi rgod dbugs ni zhi ba dang// dal bar
302b1
1'gyur ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas smig sgyu lta bu dang// du ba srin bu me khyer 'dra// mar me'i tshul dang nam mkha' bzhin// brtan nas chos sku bde ba che// ye shes sku mchog de nyid 'bar// zla ba drug dang
302b2
1bcu gnyis dang// bco brgyad dag gis 'grub par 'gyur// gang tshe des kyang ma 'grub na// drag shul tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// blo dman rnams kyis bsgrubs gyur kyang// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par
302b3
1'gyur// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// bskyed pa'i zhing du rnam par grags// gang gis thos dang klog pa dang// 'chad par byed dang sems pa dang// tshul bzhin sems pa 'chang ba rnams// ngan song las ni
302b4
1rnam par grol// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang gis 'di la mnyam bzhag na// rnam par shes pa ye shes 'gyur// zab mo'i don la snang 'gyur te// sku gsung bde ba mngon byang chub// de bzhin
302b5
1gshegs pa thams cad la// 'di la gshegs pa'i gnas med de// 'das dang da ltar ma byon rnams// chos kyi sku la dam mi 'da'// chos kyi sku yi yon tan chen po ni// thams cad du ni snang bar byed// ces
302b6
1brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gnas par gyur te/ longs spyod par mdzad cing byang chub par mdzad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gzigs par mi
303a1
1'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskyod pa med cing mi brjod pa dang/ mi rtog pas mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ rtogs pa'i gnas med do// dus thams cad du snang ba'i lam las 'das pa dang/
303a2
1kun la khyab pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid du mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar
303a3
1ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba man ngag gi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dgyes pa chen pos/ dpung rnam par bzlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
303a4
1'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang klu dang lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ gnod sbyin
303a5
1dang/ yi dwags dang/ dri za dang/ sha za dang/ 'byung po dang/ skem byed dang/ brjed byed dang/ smyo byed dang/ mkha' 'gro la sogs pa thams cad gti mug 'di dag gis rgyu 'bras kyi don la ma rtogs shing/
303a6
1mtshan ma med pa dang rnam par bral te/ mtshan ma la mngon par chags pas/ ngan song gsum du yang bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal zhing mi bde ba nyams su myong nas/ las dang las kyis rim par srin po
303b1
1chen po rnams su skyes te/ rgyu mi mthun pa'i dbang gis shin tu gzings shing sdang ba dang mi sdug pa dang dri ba dang/ dregs pa can la sogs pa'i gzugs su gyur nas/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid/
303b2
1mdangs 'phrog par bgyid/ gnod par bgyid/ sdug bsngal bar bgyid/ bred skad 'don par bgyid/ yid mi bde bar bgyid/ 'khrugs pa dang mya ngan du bgyid/ srog dang bral bar bgyid/ 'joms par
303b3
1bgyid/ de'i slad du/ dregs byed rnams zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du rnam par bsgyur na/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa
303b4
1chen pos/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad pa ni/ zhing khams 'bar ba'i klong na/ rdo rje gzhon nu nyid rdo rje rgyas 'debs ma dang/ sgyu ma'i skur bzhengs te/ gnyis su med par bzhugs
303b5
1so// gzhan yang dpal khrag 'thung hUM kA' ra dang/ rnam par rgyal ba dang/ gshin rje'i gshed po dang/ rta mgrin dang/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa
303b6
1dang/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang/ stobs po che rnams/ rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang/ rdo rje snyems ma dang/ rdo rje dur khrod bdag mo dang/ rdo rje gtum mo dang/ rdo rje skul byed ma dang/ rdo rje sder mo dang/ rdo
304a1
1rje gtun khung ma dang/ rdo rje mda' snyems ma dang// rdo rje gsod ma dang/ rdo rje bskyod ma rnams dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// gzhan yang skul ba'i phra men ma phag gis mgo can dang/
304a2
1stag gi mgo can dang/ sha ba'i mgo can dang/ byi la'i mgo can dang/ seng ge'i mgo can dang/ g.yag gi mgo can dang/ gzig gi mgo can dang/ spyang ki'i mgo can dang/ dred kyi mgo can dang/ dom gyi
304a3
1mgo can dang/ smig bu'i mgo can dang/ bya rgod kyi mgo can dang/ 'ug pa'i mgo can dang/ pu shud kyi mgo can dang/ pha wang gi mgo can dang/ phya rog gi mgo can dang/ khwa yi mgo can dang/ zer mo'i mgo
304a4
1can dang/ byi ba'i mgo can rnams dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ khro bo gleng gzhi'i le'u ste bcu
304a5
1gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po nyid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad nas/ srid pa gsum gyi dregs pa can 'dul ba'i phyir/ mi g.yo ba'i
304a6
1ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa la/ 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje sgrub mdzod cig/ srid pa'i rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo bsgrub par
304b1
1'dod// ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rje gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs
304b2
1mdzad nas// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir stsol cig/ ces brjod pas/ slar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs pa la/ zhing dang spyod yul gyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod de/ phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces
304b3
1gsol to// rdo rje 'jigs byed gzhon nu'i sku// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// gdug pa chen po'i mdog 'dra ba// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon pa
304b4
1dmar// rtsa zhal dbus ni mthing nag zhal// rdo rje dgra s+t+wa rdo rje g.yas// me dpung phur pa zhags pa g.yon// glang chen ko rlon ya ba kor// gdug pa sbrul gyis rnam par brgyan// gcan gzan stag gi
304b5
1sham thabs can// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhon nu nyid zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// dam pa'i don du bsgom
304b6
1pa ni// srid gsum rang bzhin med pa ste// dngos po rnams su rnam par bsgrags// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med pa'o// A+oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM// phyi dang nang 'dir gnas pa
305a1
1rnams// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las// kun rdzob don du sems bskyed phyir// snying rje yul ni snyoms par byed// rgyu yi sa bon nges pa las// 'di las sprul pa'i khro bo ni// rdo rje rigs la
305a2
1sogs pa ste/ khros pas zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog gcod byed pa'o/ khro bo rnams ni thams cad kyi// byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las// hUM b+h+rUM oM b+h+rUM traM b+h+rUM hrI b+h+rUM ha b+h+rUM// des ni de ma thag tu
305a3
1yang// mtshon chen rab tu 'bar ba rnams// phyogs mtshams kun tu rnam par gtams// nam mkha'i khams kyi rdo rje sku// ba spu bu ga thams cad nas// rdo rje 'byung ba byung nas ni// phyogs mtshams kun tu
305a4
1'degs par byed// sku stod me ri 'bar ba dang// de yis rnam par g.yos pa dang// chu yis g.yos pa'i nang du ni// chos kyi 'byung gnas dri med pa'o// mtshon chas de ma thag tu yang// lha klu gnod sbyin dri sa
305a5
1dang// yi dwags 'byung po dregs byed rnams// 'dar zhing rab tu brgyal ba dang// rnam par tshig nas bros 'gyur te// mod khrag skyug cing 'gas par byed// phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ni// brgyal zhing rab tu myos
305a6
1gyur nas// 'dar zhing rab tu skyug par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ de dag thams cad brgyal ba bslang ba'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs kyi bdag por byas te/ phyogs mtshams bsrung
305b1
1bar byas nas/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dbang mnos te/ mna' bor nas/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang/ bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su gyur pa dang/ bka' bsgo ba nyan par
305b2
1dam bcas shing mnas bor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen pos/ btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
305b3
1pa// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// bar khyams sgo khyud ldan pa la// rta babs rnams kyis mdzes par brgyan// ha ra ha ra phyed nyi zla// dril bu dar dpyangs 'phan la sogs// thod sbrul la sogs
305b4
1brgyan pa la// pad+ma nyi mar bcas pa dang// phyogs skyong rnams kyang gdan du byas// dkyil 'khor thams cad bskyed bgyid pa// de yi dbus su bsam par bya// mdun du hUM kA ra bsgoms la// rgyab tu stobs
305b5
1chen gzhag par bya// shar du rnam par rgyal ba ste// lho dang nub tu gshin rje dang// rta mchog nyid ni bsgom par bya// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa byang nyid du'o// me yi gra la dbyug pa ste// mi g.yo ba ni bden bral
305b6
1phyogs// rlung mtshams gzhan gyis mi thub la/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni// dbang ldan mtshams su yang dag gnas// rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma// sprul pa'i phra men ma rnams ni// g.yas dang g.yon
306a1
1gyi phyogs na gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gzhi yi ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas
306a2
1bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal khrag 'thung rngam pa chen po gzi brjid dang ldan pa des/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa
306a3
1'di gsungs so// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gnas khang rdzogs byas nas// lte ba'i dbus su nyi ma la/ khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes// 'jigs byed rdo rje gzhon nu nyid// zhal gsum
306a4
1phyag ni drug pa ste// zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon pa dmar// rtsa zhal dbus ni mthing nag zhal// rdo rje dgra s+t+wa rdo rje g.yas// me dpung zhags pa g.yon na bsnams// sku stod glang chen ko rlon dang// sku smad
306a5
1stag gi sham thabs can// dang po'i phyag gnyis shes rab 'khyud// dbu la thod skam phreng ba dang// thod rlon rnams kyi do shal byas// mi yi rus pa rgyan dang bcas// phyag dang zhabs dang snyan la sogs// lto
306a6
1'phye dag gis rnam par brgyan// dom dred pags pas dkris pa dang// mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba dang// smin ma sma ra mig kyang ser// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags kyang 'dril// thod khrag 'thung zhing ha
306b1
1ha bzhad// zhing la 'bru tshugs bltas nas ni// zhal nas khrag 'bab hi hi bzhad// zhag gi thig le tshom bur bcas// thal ba rak+tas mtshan pa dang// 'jigs pa'i dpung yang 'jigs par byed/ khro bo'i dkyil
306b2
1'khor bsgom par bya// snying gar ye shes dam tshig gnas// de nas 'dod chags chen po yis// gsang ba'i pad+ma rgyas mdzad nas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dang// gsang ba'i dbus su thim par bya// byang
306b3
1chub sems kyi sprin dag las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ni// thugs ka nas ni byung gyur te// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor nyid du zhugs// A+oM badzra ku mA ra ma hA kro ta hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta hUM kA ra hUM/ gardzagardza
306b4
1hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta ha ya grI ba hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro
306b5
1ta nI la daN+Da hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ A+oMbadzra kro ta Ar+ya A tsa la hUM/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta a pa ra dzi ta hUM// tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta ma hA ba la
306b6
1hUM/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ sarba ma ma hUM sarba yo gi nI ha ha a phaT a swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed gzhon nu'i tshul// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// dbus kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi// gdan la brkyang bskum
307a1
1tshul gyis bzhugs// steng phyogs hUM mdzad ka ra ni// zhal g.yas ser zhing g.yon yang dmar// dbus zhal sku ni dmar po'o// dang po gnyis ni rig mar 'khyud// 'khor lo ral gri g.yas pa
307a2
1na// rin chen pad+ma g.yon pa na// 'og tu stobs chen bzhag pa ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus gnag sku// dang po rig mar 'khyud pa dang// g.yas pa tri shul ral gri 'dzin// g.yon pa rin chen
307a3
1pad+ma'o// rnam par rgyal ba dkar ba ste// g.yas pa nag cing dmar ba'i mdog/ rang gi rig ma dang pos 'khyud// dbyug pa dkar po ral gri g.yas// rin chen pad+ma g.yon pa yin// shar gyi rtsibs su gzhag
307a4
1par bya// lho phyogs gshin rje 'joms pa ni// zhal g.yas gnag cing g.yon pa dmar// rtsa zhal dbus ni ser ba ste// phyag gnyis rang gi shes rab 'khyud// g.yas pa tho ba ral gri la// g.yon pa rin chen
307a5
1pad+ma'o// nub phyogs rta mgrin dbus kyi zhal// dmar zhing dkar ba sngo ba g.yon// phyag gnyis 'khyud pa rig ma la// pad+ma dang ni ral gri g.yas// 'khor lo rin chen g.yon yin te// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa zhal
307a6
1gsum ljang// g.yas dang g.yon ni dkar dang dmar// dang po gnyis ni rig ma la// 'khyud cing rgya gram ral gri 'dzin// rin chen pad+ma g.yon pa ste// byang du brkyang bskum tshul gyis gnas// me yi phyogs su
307b1
1dbyug sngon can// zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon pa dmar// sku zhal dbu ma dkar la ser// dang po gnyis ni khro mor 'khyud// g.yas pa dbyug pa ral gri ste// g.yon gnyis rin chen pad+ma'o// mi g.yo mgon ni
307b2
1bden bral phyogs// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dmar ser zhal// dang po gnyis ni rig ma 'khyud// 'khor lo ral gri g.yas pa na// rin chen pad+ma g.yon pa na// dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa// g.yas pa
307b3
1dkar zhing g.yon pa dmar// dmar ljang dang pos rig ma 'khyud// rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa g.yon// rin chen pad+ma 'dzin pa ste// rlung gi mtshams su yang dag gnas// dbang ldan grar ni gzhag bya ba/ khams
307b4
1gsum rgyal ba zhal gsum pa// zhal g.yas g.yon pa dkar dang dmar// sku dang dbus ni ljang skya yin// phyag gnyis rig mar 'khyud pa la// lcags kyu ral gri rin chen pad// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag tu
307b5
1bsgom/ khro bo dag ni thams cad kyang// rgyan cha rdo rje 'jigs byed 'dra/ khro mo rnams ni rigs kyi mdog/ rang rang lag cha 'dzin par byed// phra men rnams kyi mgo dang sku// ci yang 'gyur zhing sna tshogs thogs/
307b6
1khro rgyal ye nas yin pas na/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas ni/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rnam 'phros te// nam mkha'i dbyings su brtan par gnas// de nas dpal chen khro bo'i rigs// bskul ba'i phyir ni sngags
308a1
1'di brjod/ oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ A+oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ A+oM badzra sa ma ya ho/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byang sems ho yi bar bzhag ste// chos sku byang chub sems su gnas// sgyu ma'i
308a2
1phyag rgya 'od 'bar te// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas la// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bar bsnyen// bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po yis// gsang ba'i phyag rgya rgyas mdzad de// rjes su sbyar ba brtsam par bya// de nas
308a3
1dkyil 'khor thams cad ni// nam mkha'i dbyings su brtan par gnas// de yi ye shes lnga bdag nyid// gsang ba'i bum pa las byung ba// 'khor lo bzhi la rab tu dmigs// gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur
308a4
1ba// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa ste// bla na med pa thob par byed// rgyab kyis phyogs shing 'dun pa med// blun pos mi shes log par blta// gshis ngan dag tu shi gyur nas// 'o dod 'bod cing ltung bar 'gyur// de
308a5
1bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
308a6
1gshegs pa rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po des/ mchod pa'i sprin mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir/ mchod pa dang bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di
308b1
1gsungs so// bdag po'i phyag rgya mnyam gzhag la// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo// A+oM badzra kro ta shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra A gats+tsha ya/ A ga ts+tsha ya/
308b2
1pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ sarba DA ki nI hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang// dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol/ khro bo chen po gshegs
308b3
1nas kyang// rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang// kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// phyag dang snyan dang rgyan la sogs// mchod pa bla na med pas mchod// sangs rgyas
308b4
1dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod de// bdug pa me tog mar me dang// dri chab bshos dang yi gar 'ong// rtsub cing tsha ba rnam sbyar te// dkyil 'khor kun la dbul bar bya// 'bul
308b5
1bar bdud rtsi rang bzhin dag/ sku gsung thugs su rab ldan pas// sku gsung thugs su byin rlabs te// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod// oM AHhUM ma hA sa ma ar+g+haM pra tI ts+tsha hUM/ de bzhin nyid du rab
308b6
1gnas pas// thugs rje chen po 'byung bar byed// bdag dang sems can bsgral ba yin// reg pa sbyor ba mnyam bzhag na// bdag nyid mnyes par tshim par bya// phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid kyis// yum gyi
309a1
1gsang ba'i pad+ma ru// bde ba thugs kyi rang bzhin las// lha mo rnams su spros nas kyang// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod par bya// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
309a2
1rnams kyis/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mnyes byas na// mnyes byas ma lus rnam dag nas// lha mo rnams su spros nas kyang// dkyil 'khor dngos grub rab mchog sgrub par byed/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa
309a3
1can// bkug nas ba ling sbyin par bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang zas lnga la// ming dang mtshan mar bcas nas ni// bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab// rdul du byas te tshogs la dbul/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams
309a4
1cad la// sna tshogs sha rnams phul byas na// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur// de nas ar+g+haM mchod par bya// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen 'khor
309a5
1bcas spyan drangs te// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor 'khyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas rnams// ma lus gshegs shing
309a6
1mnabs su gsol// mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni// nag por byas te dbul bar bya// ma tshogs rnams la bstab pa ni// skra bcing gcer bur phyung nas ni// thal ba rak+ta zhag gis mtshan/ khro bo'i ngang
309b1
1du tshul brdung ba/ kha nas zhag dang khrag 'dzag pa// lag pa thod khrag thogs nas ni// hi hi bzhad cing spyugs pas gdab// so so rnams kyi ming phyung nas// bos nas zhal du bstab par bya// de nas khro bo'i
309b2
1dkyil 'khor la// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod do// hUM/ rang bzhin rnam dag dbyings nas bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul bston// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pa// gdug pa 'dul phyir sku sprul pa// 'jigs
309b3
1byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes brjod pas dgyes pa chen po de nyid mnyes par gyur te// sngags kyi spyod pa 'di gsungs so// ji bzhin gsungs pa'i dbang sogs ldan// byang chub spyod pa'i rnal
309b4
1'byor pas// byang chub sems ni mi spang zhing// rdo rje phyag rgya la sogs dang// dam pa'i chos kyang mi smad cing// nam kyang spang bar mi bya'o// mi shes pa'am blun pa la// gsang ba bstan par bya ba
309b5
1min// bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas ni// dka' thub kyis kyang gzir mi bya// rtag tu sdom pa bskyang ba ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga za// dkon mchog la gnod gsad par bya// gsang ba'i bud med 'dod
309b6
1pa spyad// byang chub sems ni ma byin blang// gsang ba'i don du rdzun nyid smra// sbyor ba'i rgyud las ci bsngags pa// de ltar rim pa bzhin du bsrung// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni/ ma traM rnams kyi
310a1
1gzugs brnyan la// dgug cing bstim pa byas nas kyang/ khro bo'i nga rgyal hUM bsgom ste// lcags kyu gri nag 'bar ba yis// tsit+ta phyung nas sbyar byas te// mgo bo snying ga lte ba dang// gsang ba'i
310a2
1las bzhi so so rnams// go rim bzhin du 'jug par bya// gdug pa can rnams gdul bya'i phyir// thams cad thams cad ci bde bar// thams cad thams cad bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
310a3
1kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las// mchod pa'i sprin rnam par 'phro ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gzhon nu/ dpal khrag
310a4
1'thung rngam pa chen pos bdug pa can bsgral ba'i phyir/ bsad pa las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phrin las phun tshogs pa 'di gsungs so// dang po sa gzhi yongs brtags
310a5
1nas// bskrad dang mtshams bcad rdzogs byas te// gsang ba dbyings kyi dbus dag tu/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// phur pa byin gyis brlab pa brtsam// rdo rje phur pa'i khro bo dag/ thugs ka
310a6
1nas ni byung gyur te// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// A+oM badzra kI la kI la ya sarba big+h+nAn baM hUM hUM phaT// spyi bor gzhal med bsam nas kyang// hUM mdzad dkyil 'khor brtan par
310b1
1bzhugs// 'og tu stobs can bzhag pa ste// rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i// phyogs rnams kun tu brtan par gnas// rtse mo ngos dang bcas pa la// ma tshogs rnams ni bzhag pa yin// bde bar
310b2
1gshegs pa rnams kyis byin rlobs shing// me stag 'phro zhing gzi brjid 'chang// e yi gdan la nges par bzhag/ nyung dkar rgyal pos brdeg pa dang// gu gul tshil chen gyis bdug ste// mchod pa rnams kyang
310b3
1dbul bar bya// gang 'dod las rnams bcol byas la// rang rang mdun du bzhag pa yin// gzhan yang rdo rje phur pa bcu// gru chad gru gsum bskor bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// mchod pa
310b4
1rdzogs dang ba ling bsngo// mngag gzhug gsum pa'i sbyor ba dag/ snying gar ma yi dkyil 'khor la// yi ge dza ni gzhag bya ste// 'od zer lcags kyus drangs nas ni// gzugs sam ri mor thim par bya// phyag rgya
310b5
1bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis// dgug cing sdom dang dgug par bya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badzra a ku sha hUM/ dza dza dza/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ pra be sha ya hUM/ A be sha ya a a/ gzugs brnyan rnams ni zhing chen gyi// thal ba ske tshe
310b6
1lan tshwa dang/ khre dang ju tshe srub ma'i lo// phub ma grog mkhar sa rnams la// rak+ta bdud rtsis sprus nas kyang// smug nag snying gar ming rus gdags// dkyil 'khor lho nub gru chad la// 'brub khung gru gsum
311a1
1byas nas ni// nang du gan rkyal bzhag par bya// bkug nas phebs par gyur pa dang// gu gul tshil chen bdug pa dang// rdo phye dug dang khrag las kyang// gtor ma rnams ni za ru gzhug/ phra
311a2
1men rnams dang mgyog ma rnams// glo snying za zhing dbang po 'thog/ de ltar nyams par byas nas ni// bstod pa byas nas gnyis med bstim// de nas bzlas pa byed 'dod na// bdag nyid las kyi ting 'dzin
311a3
1zhugs// snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de nas bzlas pa'i yig 'bru 'am// hUM yig rnam par bsam nas ni// phur pa'i khro bo'i gzugs byung ste// phyogs bcu dag tu gshegs nas kyang// 'gro
311a4
1ba'i don rnams rdzogs byas te// rdo rje phur pa la thim bya// 'bum phrag gcig gam sa ya'am// bye ba bzlas te dbang bskur na// ting 'dzin bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te// gzir mnan byas la gsad par
311a5
1bya// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i dus la bab// phyag brnyan chen po'i dus la bab// shwa na mu+u kha'i dus la babs// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// mthu rtsal phyung ba'i dus la
311a6
1bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob pa// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gdug cing sdang ba'i dgra bgegs dang// bdag [\[]bdud [\]]dang bar du gcod
311b1
1pa rnams/ khro bo chen po'i byin rlab kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang// lus ngag rdul du bshigs nas kyang// sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod// oM
311b2
1laM hUM laM/ s+t+waM b+ha nan// mo hA ga ya b+ha ga wAn// shri badzra hUM kA ra hUM phaT// badzra kI li kI la ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sarba big+h+nAM/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ A+oM badzra kro ta hUM kA ra phaT/ hUM kA ra hUM a
311b3
1a a/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ A be sha ya a/ dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar
311b4
1gyis// rings par khur la smra ru chug/ phob gcig rnam par gzir bar gyis// nga yi dbang du gyur nas ni// bsgo ba'i bka' rnams nyan par gyis/ hUM pa ra bid+yAn hUM phaT/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha hUM phaT/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM
311b5
1phaT/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya ra ha sa ya ra hi daN+Da hUM phaT// shI g+h+raMa na ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya hUM phaT/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya hUM phaT/
311b6
1b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha ya hUM phaT/ bran dang pho nya bka' nyan tshogs/ khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad khas blangs dam bcas bzhin// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// ha na ha na badzra// da ha da ha badzra// pa
312a1
1tsa pa tsa badzra// ma tha ma tha badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ su ru su ru badzra/ mu ru mu ru badzra// ka taM ka ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te a pa ra dzi te mA ra se na pra marda ni hUM phaT// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las
312a2
1ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren rnams// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// hUM ma ma pa shaM ku ru ma taM
312a3
1nya ka ra i nan// ta ti ma ma karma shI g+h+raM kA ra ya hUM// gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// lha'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// nga la bar du gcod pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// sarba A na ya
312a4
1hUM// ta thA ya ta thA ya hUM// rdungs shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// dam las 'da' byed sdig chen rnams// rdo rje me dbal snying bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlogs/ khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung
312a5
1du// rdo rje tho bas brdung byas nas// lha yang rung ste bsgral bar bya'o// kha thaM/ rdo rje phur pa gdab bya ba// bdag nyid khros pa'i nga rgyal can// shin tu gsal bar byas nas ni// gzas pa po yang gsal byas
312a6
1te// rdo rje phur pa mchog 'od 'bar// shin tu 'jigs pa gsal byas la// rang gi sngags ni brjod bya ste// thal mo sbyar thabs gsor nas kyang// ting 'dzin khugs par gyur pa dang// snying ga mgo bo lte ba
312b1
1dang// dpung pa gnyis dang brla gnyis la// phur pa'i khro bo rdzogs byas te// g.yon pas rke nas bzung nas ni// g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i tho bas brdeg/ oM na maHsa man+ta/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra nAn/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta
312b2
1ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tAM phaT// kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pA ya ti/ sarba big+hAM/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM a ko Ta ya mu+u da ga ra hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM/ A+oM
312b3
1badzra kro ta yak+sha kha kha khA hi khA hi// 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang/ kha 'gram gnyis su bzung byas te// rdo rje gnod sbyin khros pa yis// yid kyi yul du bstabs nas
312b4
1ni// 'khor lo la sogs mtshon cha yis// gzugs brnyan phye mar gdab par bya// A+oM hrIHSh+t-IHwi kr-i ta ya nan hUM phaT// thod pa gzhung dang bcas pa yi// hom khung gru gsum sgo can du// raM zhes bya bas me spar
312b5
1te// ye shes me lha bos nas kyang// ngang du 'khor lo bsgom nas ni// gdug pa can rnams bsreg par bya// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rjes gtam byas
312b6
1nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin gshegs// 'od zer rnams kyis drangs nas ni// thams cad thugs kar thim par 'gyur// rlung du
313a1
1gyur pas oM AHhUM// bde ba chen po'i rtsa nyid nas// dam tshig rin chen gsum po dang// rim par byung nas sna bug ni// g.yas nas g.yon du zhugs pa la// spyi bor tshon gang ma rag par// yi
313a2
1ge 'bru gsum tshon re bas// hUM nyid zhu ba a la thim// a nyid oM gyi bdag nyid zhu// byang chub sems su gcig pa ni/ kha dog gsum gyi rin po che// 'od zer spro bsdu'i sbyor ba yis// zhi ba nyid du 'gyur ba
313a3
1yin// gsang ba'i gnas ni thams cad du// rim pa min pa ma yin pa'i// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu dmigs/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// byang chub gzhol zhing mang du thas// dad pa
313a4
1brtson 'grus rab ldan pas// lha nyid nye bar gyur pa la// dam tshig ma nyams brtul zhugs can// drag shul sgrub par 'dod pa yi// rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgrub par bya// ma mo'i gnas dang sdong gcig
313a5
1dang// ri bo ri sul rnams su ni/ khros pas bsgrub pa rab tu bya/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom nas ni// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa rnams// gsang ba'i pad+mar bcug nas ni// zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i
313a6
1tshe// drag shul gyis ni bsgrub par bya// mi yi rus pa las byas pa'i// bcu gnyis pa yi tshad rnams la/ khro ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom nas ni// gcig gam bcu gcig rtsa gcig par// bdag nyid gang sgrub
313b1
1'dod pa yis// gang la bya ba'i gzugs nyid kyi// mtshams dang dam tshig rdzogs pa'am// bsnyen pa tshang nas gdab par bya// rdul du byas la tshogs la dbul// bcu gnyis bdun yang nyi shu rtsa gcig
313b2
1dang// rtsa lnga dgu dang mar gying ngo// nam dang nyi ma'i gung rnams la// brtul zhugs can gyis bsgrub na ni// zla ba gcig gis nges pa ru// 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
313b3
1kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las// phrin las phun sum tshogs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la// rdo rje gzhon nu'i 'khor 'bum
313b4
1phrag du mas mngon par bstod pa// bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// nyon mongs 'ching bar byed pa'i phyir// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mtshan ma thams cad rnam 'joms pas/ khro gnyer glog
313b5
1stong 'gyu ba ste// yon tan thams cad rgyas mdzad pa'i// smin ma sma ra mig kyang ser// log par blta ba'i tshogs rnams la// sdang mig btsug nas gtum par mdzad// mche ba zang yag gtsigs pa ni// skye
313b6
1bzhi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul// zhal gdangs rngam pa'i cha lugs kyis// 'khor ba ril ming mdzad pa po// sgra sgrogs hi hi'i gad rgyangs can// gdug pa can rnams nyams par byed// spyugs pas mthor zhing
314a1
1g.yeng ba la// zhal nas bdud dang srin po sogs/ khrag 'bab 'khor ba'i zhag gis bskus// zhe sdang 'joms mdzad stag lpags can// gdug pa sbrul gyis rnam brgyan pa// gti mug
314a2
1'joms mdzad glang chen ko rlon gos// 'dod chags zad mdzad rig ma 'khyud// gdug pa 'joms pas mthing nag zhal// nyon mongs ma gos chags pas dgyes// g.yas g.yon dkar dang dmar ba'i
314a3
1zhal// ye shes lnga bdag rdo rje thogs// mtshan ma sreg mdzad me dpung can// zhags pas mi gtong 'ching ba la// rdo rje dgra s+t+was 'joms pa'o// rdo rje ngan song gsum dag 'jig/ phur pas bdud kun
314a4
1'joms pa yin// rdo rje che mchog stobs po che// 'jigs pa chen po 'jigs par byed// dga' ba chen po mgu bar byed// yon tan thams cad 'byung bar byed/ khros pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar
314a5
1byed// thams cad kun gyi bdag po'o// zhes bstod pas/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas/ thams cad kyang gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bzhugs pa la snying po ngo mtshar rmad
314a6
1du gyur te/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'di lta bu gsungs so// gsang ba'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu/ khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ste// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya
314b1
1mdud rtse zur gsum// ngos rnams khro bor rnam bsgoms te// btab na lha yang rlag mdzad pas// gzugs sam ri mo bris nas ni// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa la// bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab// de
314b2
1nas gang du bya ba'i gnas// ma mo'i gnas dang chu klung dang// lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung// dkyil 'khor 'og la sogs pa ru// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur pa yis// sngags bzlas gru gsum brkos
314b3
1nas ni// thod pa kha sbyar nang du ni// gong gi gzugs brnyan bcu gnas kyang// phur pa rnams kyis spyi bo ru// ri rab gling bzhi bris nas ni// steng du don yod grub pa ni// yi ge hUM las bskyed byas
314b4
1te// rtag tu brtan par bzhugs par bya// bdag nyid 'bar ba'i gar la sogs// stang stabs rdzogs nas bro brdung bya// rdo rje brjid gnon phyag rgya yis// phur pa rnams ni byin ldan te// bgegs lus rnam
314b5
1par mi g.yo'o// slob dpon dag la brnyas byed dang// dam tshig gnyen po 'dral ba dang// rnal 'byor spun la 'khu ba dang// rnal 'byor bar du gcod pa rnams// gnod byed ma lus gtan mas phyung/ khro
314b6
1bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas pas// gdug pa can la sogs pa rnams/ mnan dang gzir dang bskrad pa dang// rdul du byas la tshogs la dbul// dam tshig can gyi bdag po rnams// bos nas las rnams
315a1
1ma lus bcol// bgegs rnams myur du gzhom pa dang// bsod nams dam pa 'phel bya'i phyir// rgyun du ba ling sbyin par bya// snod bcud gdug pa can rnams te/ khro bo khro mo rnam bsgoms
315a2
1te// thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis/ dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bskrad pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// dur
315a3
1khrod 'bar ba'i dbyings nyid du/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom nas ni// ma traM rnams kyi gzugs brnyan la// kun tu rdo rje phur pas gdab// de yi gsang ba'i gnas dag tu// hom khung gru gsum sgo can
315a4
1la// gtsang thod rgyan gyis mdzes brgyan pas// byin za dge ba raM spar te// drang srong rnams ni g.yab mos bod/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// dang po me sbyang spyan drangs te// gdan dang sku khrus
315a5
1bsil bar bya// las la gzhug cing brtan bzhugs gsol// phyag dang mchod pa tshul bzhin bya// bstod nas gshegs su gsol ba dang// rang gi dkyil 'khor dag la thim// bdag nyid khros par byas pa
315a6
1yis// yang na zla ba'i dkyil du bzhag/ rnam shes hUM gis bsdus brdungs te// ye shes rlung gis 'phen par byed// de yis phyogs bcur 'phros par bsam// ma rungs pa ni tshig bsam nas// de ma thag tu
315b1
1bder 'gyur ro// gsang ba'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom nas kyang// gzugs brnyan dag ni byas nas kyang// bkug nas de yi gzugs nyid la// ral gris dum bur gtubs
315b2
1nas kyang// dum bu dum bur chad bsam na// 'chi'am yang na skam par 'gyur// zin pa'i sems can bsrung ba ni// skud pa nag pos bcings nas kyang// dgug cing bstim pa rnams byas te// ral gri dgra
315b3
