1s+t+wa mtshon cha yis// de nyid dum bur gcad par bya// rdul du byas nas bsreg par bya// dkyil 'khor rnams la mchod par bya// phyin chad bgegs rnams bsrung don du/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par
315b4
1bya// 'debs byed yi ge lnga po rnams// gnas lnga dag tu rnam bkod de// lus bsrungs khros pa thams cad kyis// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad gtams// mi rtog zhig nas ldan byas te// de yis dub par gyur
315b5
1pa dang// rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa bya// spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// lha de nyid du rtag tu bsgom// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// yang dag don gyi snying po bas// rtag tu 'bral bar mi bya'o// de
315b6
1bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bstod pa dang/ mnan pa dang bsgral ba la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i rim pa rnams bstan pa'i
316a1
1le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems pa' rnams la/ sngags kyi rgyal po
316a2
1bstan pa'i gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// 'da' dka' de bzhin mi gshigs pa// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig yin// phyogs bcu
316a3
1dus bzhi rang bzhin dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang gi rtog pa phra rgyas kyis// so sor smin cing sdug bsngal ba// grol bar bya phyir bla med rnams// bstan phyir rdzogs longs spyod par
316a4
1bstan// 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu// mgon po bdag nyid chen po ngas// rdo rje 'khor lo bskor ba rnams// ljags kyi dbang por bkram nas ni// kun gyi don du gsungs pa ni// de bzhin gshegs
316a5
1pa thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang// rnal 'byor rnams kyis brtan por gzung// 'gro ba'i skye bo ji snyed par// yi ge 'bri mchod sbyin pa dang// nyan pa dang ni klog pa
316a6
1dang// 'chad dang kha ton byed pa dang// de sems pa dang sgom pa rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba// rgyal ba rnams kyis rab
316b1
1bsngags pa'i// yon tan thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// sa yi khyad par bgrod nas ni// bde ba chen por 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba
316b2
1rnams// rtogs shing 'dzin par byed pa dang// rtag tu 'chang ba gang yin pa// de nyid nga dang 'dra bas na// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang rnams dang// gsang ba'i don ni bstan pa yin// dngos po rnams kyi dam
316b3
1tshig kyang// mthong zhing thos nas rtogs shes yin// dam pa rnams kyi dam pa mchog/ de bzhin nyid du gnas bcas nas// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba rnams// ji ltar brjod kyang chos mchog ste// de bzhin
316b4
1nyid las nyams pa med// de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin pas// de la de bzhin gnas mi bya// gang gis de bzhin gnas gyur na// de bzhin mthong bas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid
316b5
1la// btsal ba med pa'i btsal sems te// dmigs pa med pa'i dmigs pa dang// sgom du med pa'i sgom pa yis// shes rab gsum gyi bdag nyid can// sa rnams ye shes bskyed 'gyur bas// yang dag
316b6
1mthong nas lhun gyis 'grub// de bzhin gshegs pas rab bsngags pas// 'phags dang byis pa'i skye bo dang// rang dang gzhan gyi skye bo rnams// gang zhig 'di la dad 'gyur na// dam pa 'di dag gnas pa
317a1
1yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig dang dbyangs gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po mchog/ spyan
317a2
1ras dri med 'od mdzad pa// bdag cag kun gyis mthong bas na// dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// yang dag rtogs shing 'dzin pa la// rab tu mos pas dus
317a3
1gsum du// dpa' bo chen po bzhin phyag 'tshal// byang chub 'phags dang gzhan rnams kyis// don 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang// rtogs nas smra bar byed pa la// ston pa bzhin du bdag 'tshal lo// gang
317a4
1gis ming tsam 'dzin pa yi// don 'di sgrub par byed pa na// g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pas// dpa' bo bzhin du bdag phyag 'tshal// dpa' bo'i bstan pa bla med pa// yi ge med pa'i gsung mchog
317a5
1ste// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin la// ston pa bzhin du bdag phyag 'tshal// zhes brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po des/ nyid kyi dkyil
317a6
1'khor gyis shin tu mnyes par gyur te/ dngos po thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje la zhugs te// cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
317b1
1pa thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyang sku gsung thugs rdo rje la zhugs so// zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin du dbyer
317b2
1med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun
317b3
1pa'o//// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam pa'i gsang chen ces bya ba'i rgyud/ rnal 'byor gyi ma chen mo de kho na nyid stong phrag brgya pa las/
317b4
1rdo rje 'bar ba'i rgyud ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa rdzogs
317b5
1so//// dge'o//
